1b1(brgyad stong): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya aSh+Ta swA ha sri kA pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA/
1b2(brgyad stong): bod skad du/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa/ bam
1b3(brgyad stong): po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'phags pa
2a1(brgyad stong): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad
2a2(brgyad stong): bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod kyi phung
2a3(brgyad stong): po'i ri la bzhugs te/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po
2a4(brgyad stong): dag dang thabs cig go/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa
2b1(brgyad stong): med pa/ dbang du gyur pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa/ glang po chen
2b2(brgyad stong): po bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ rang gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad
2b3(brgyad stong): payang dag par kun shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems thams cad kyi dbang dam pa'i
2b4(brgyad stong): pha rol tu son pa thob pa sha stag ste/ gang zag gcig ma gtogs pa ni 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
2b5(brgyad stong): bo'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab
3a1(brgyad stong): ' byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las brtsams
3a2(brgyad stong): teji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba
3a3(brgyad stong): de bzhin du khyod spobs par byos shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/ ci tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di
3a4(brgyad stong): bdag nyid kyi rang gi shes rab kyi spobs pa'i stobs bskyed pa dang / rang gi shes rab kyi spobs pa'i stobs byin gyis brlabs pas
3a5(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar ston par 'gyur ram/ 'on te sangs rgyas kyi mthus
3a6(brgyad stong): yin snyam mo/ / de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i de lta bu'i tshul gyi sems kyi rtog
3b1(brgyad stong): pa de sems kyis shes nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams ni gang ci smra ba dang ston pa dang / nye bar sdor pa dang / rjod par
3b2(brgyad stong): byed pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag par gsal bar byed pa de dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu'i mthu yin par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas
3b3(brgyad stong): chos gang bstan pa'i chos bstan pa de la slob pa na de dag gis chos nyid de mngon sum du byas nas 'dzin to/ / de dag gis chos nyid de mngon sum du byas shing bzung nas gang dang gang 'chad pa dang gang dang gang
3b4(brgyad stong): ston pa dang gang dang gang nye bar ston pa dang / gang dang gang rjod par byed pa dang / gang dang gang gsal bar byed pa dang gang dang gang yang dag par gsal bar byed pa de dag thams cad chos nyid dang mi 'gal
3b5(brgyad stong): yin no/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu de dag 'di ltar chos nyid de nye bar ston pa rnams chos nyid dang mi 'gal ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas chos bstan pa'i rgyu mthun pa'o// de nas sangs rgyas
3b6(brgyad stong): kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / gang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
3b7(brgyad stong): pa las brtsams te/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du khyod spobs par byos shig ces bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan
4a1(brgyad stong): 'das byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' zhes brjod pa gang lags pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba 'di chos gang gi tshig bla dgas lags
4a2(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i chos de bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo / / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos de yang
4a3(brgyad stong): bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo / / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'am byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyang bdag gis ma 'tshal ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong shes rab kyi pha rol tu
4a4(brgyad stong): byin pa yang ma 'tshal ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das 'on kyang
4a5(brgyad stong): yang gal te 'di ltar smras pa dang bstan pa dang nye bar bstan pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems mi 'gong kun tu mi zhum bag mi tsha bag 'khums par mi 'gyur/ 'di'i yid phyir phyogs par
4a6(brgyad stong): mi bgyi/ bcom zhing phyir phyogs par mi 'gyur/ mi dadang / kun tu mi skrag/ kun tu skrag pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur na/ 'di nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
4a7(brgyad stong): pa la rjes su bstan par bgyi ba lags so/ / 'di nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir par rig par bgyi'o// 'di nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams pa lags so//
4b1(brgyad stong): gal te de ltar gnas na de nyid 'di'i gdams pa dang rjes su bstan pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu/
4b2(brgyad stong): phyin pa bsgoms pas/ ci ltar bslabs na/ 'di byang chub kyi sems des kyang rlom sems su mi bgyid pa de ltar bslab par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar sems de ni sems ma mchis pa ste/
4b3(brgyad stong): sems kyi rang bzhin ni 'od gsal ba lags so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor yang ci sems gang sems med pa'i sems de yod
4b4(brgyad stong): dam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu yang ci sems med pa nyid gang yin pa'i sems med pa nyid de la yod pa nyid
4b5(brgyad stong): dam med pa nyid yod pa 'am dmigs par yang 'gyur ram/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni med do// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gal te sems med pa de la yod pa 'am med
4b6(brgyad stong): pamed cing mi dmigs na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di skad du sems gang sems med pa'i sems de yod dam zhes smras pa'i khyod kyis brgal ba gang yin pa de ci rig par 'gyur ram/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan
4b7(brgyad stong): pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor sems med pa nyid de yang gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems med pa de ni 'gyur ba med pa
5a1(brgyad stong): rnam par rtog pa med pa'o/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ji ltar yang khyod bcom ldan 'das kyis
5a2(brgyad stong): nyon mongs pa med pa la gnas pa'i mchog tu gsungs pa ltar ston pa legs so legs so/ / de bas na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi
5a3(brgyad stong): ldog par nye bar brtag par bya'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar yang rig par bya'o// nyan thos kyi sa la slob par 'dod pas kyang shes rab kyi
5a4(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya bklag par bya kun chub par bya rab tu gdon par bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslab par bya'o// rnal 'byor
5a5(brgyad stong): du bya'o/ / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la slob par 'dod pas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid mnyan par bya gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya bklag par bya kun chub par bya rab tu gdon par bya'o// shes
5a6(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslab par bya'o/ / rnal 'byor du bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'i sa la slob par 'dod pas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid mnyan par bya gzung bar bya/ bcang
5a7(brgyad stong): bar bya bklag par bya kun chub par bya rab tu gdon par bya'o/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad thob par bya ba'i phyir rnal 'byor
5b1(brgyad stong): du bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang la bslabs shing rnal 'byor du bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad rgyas par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
5b2(brgyad stong): 'di nyid las bstan to/ / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la slob par 'dod pas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid mnyan par bya gzung bar bya bcang bar bya ba klag par bya kun chub par
5b3(brgyad stong): bya rab tu gdon par bya'o/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad thob par bya ba'i phyir rnal 'byor du bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na
5b4(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid las ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang la bslab par bya ba dang rnal 'byor du bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rgyas par bstan to/ / de nas bcom
5b5(brgyad stong): ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i ming gang lags pa 'di nyid bdag gis ma 'tshal ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
5b6(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang ma 'tshal ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das bdag gis byang chub sems dpa'i ming 'di nyid ma 'tshal ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma
5b7(brgyad stong): mthong / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang ma 'tshal ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la gdams shing rjes su bstan
6a1(brgyad stong): par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das gang bdag gis dngos po ma 'tshal ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ ming tsam gyis 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes 'du ba dang
6a2(brgyad stong): 'god par bgyid pa ni bdag gi glo ba la gcags lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das 'on kyang ming de yang gnas pa ma lags shing mi gnas pa yang ma lags la gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags shing gnas pa dang
6a3(brgyad stong): bral ba ma lags pa yang ma lags so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// de ltar ming de gnas pa ma lags shing mi gnas pa yang ma lags la gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags shing
6a4(brgyad stong): gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags pa yang ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo bshad pa dang bstan pa dang nye bar bstan pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
6a5(brgyad stong): po'i sems mi 'gong kun tu mi zhum bag mi tsha/ bag 'khums par mi 'gyur 'di'i yid phyir phyogs par mi bgyid bcom zhing phyir phyogs par mi 'gyur/ mi dngang kun tu mi skrag kun tu skrag pa dang ldan par mi
6a6(brgyad stong): 'gyur zhing lhag pa'i bsam pas mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar rig par bgyi'o/ / phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas pa
6a7(brgyad stong): ste mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis legs par gnas pa lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu
6b1(brgyad stong): phyin pa la bsgom pas gzugs la gnas par mi bgyi'o/ / de bzhin du tshor ba la ma lags 'du shes la ma lags 'du byed rnams la ma lags rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/
6b2(brgyad stong): gal te gzugs la gnas na gzugs mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so// de bzhin du gal te tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang gal te rnam par shes
6b3(brgyad stong): pa la gnas na rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
6b4(brgyad stong): su 'dzin pa ma lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du bgyid pa yang ma lags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa yang ma lags so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
6b5(brgyad stong): pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur na yongs su mi bzung ba yongs su bzung bas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gzugs yongs
6b6(brgyad stong): su gzung ba ma mchis so/ / de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa yongs su gzung ba ma mchis so// gzugs yongs su gzung ba ma
6b7(brgyad stong): mchis pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs ma lags/ / de bzhin du tshor ba gang lags pa dang 'du shes gang lags pa dang 'du byed rnams gang lags pa dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su gzung ba ma mchis
7a1(brgyad stong): pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes par lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yang yongs su gzung ba ma mchis so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
7a2(brgyad stong): chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyad par bgyi'o/ / 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/
7a3(brgyad stong): yangs pa mdun du bgyis pa tshad med par nges pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags pa'o// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de yang yongs su gzung ba ma mchis te/ mtshan mar gzung ba ma
7a4(brgyad stong): lags so/ / gal te mtshan mar gzung bar gyur na kun tu rgyu phreng ba can 'di la dad par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ kun tu rgyu phreng ba can thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'di la mos nas dad pas rjes su 'brang zhing phyog
7a5(brgyad stong): gcig pa'i ye shes kyis zhugs so/ / de zhugs nas kyang gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin to// de bzhin du tshor ba ma lags/ 'du shes ma lags 'du byed rnams ma lags rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin
7a6(brgyad stong): to/ / de la shes pa de dga' ba dang bde bar yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // shes pa de nang gi gzugs kyi yin par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // shes pa de phyi rol gyi gzugs kyi yin par
7a7(brgyad stong): yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / shes pa de phyi nang gi gzugs kyi yin par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / shes pa de gzugs las gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // de bzhin du shes pa
7b1(brgyad stong): de nang gi tsher ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams kyi ma yin/ shes pa de nang gi rnam par shes pa'i yin par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / shes pa de phyi rol gyi rnam par shes pa'i yin par yang dag par rjes
7b2(brgyad stong): su mi mthong / shes pa de phyi nang gi rnam par shes pa'i yin par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / shes pa de rnam par shes pa las gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ tshig gi rnam grangs 'di
7b3(brgyad stong): la kun tu rgyu phreng ba can mos so/ / de thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'di la thams cad du dad pas rjes su 'brang zhing chos nyid tshad mar bgyis te 'di ltar mos pa zhes bgyi'o// nges chos gang yang yongs su ma
7b4(brgyad stong): bzung ngo / / gang gzung ba'am btang bar bgyi ba'i chos de gang yang ma dmigs so// de mya ngan las 'das par yang rlom sems su mi bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
7b5(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rig par bgyi ste/ gang gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin/ de bzhin du gang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang gang rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin la
7b6(brgyad stong): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams yongs su ma rdzogs par bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba
7b7(brgyad stong): / de bas na bcom ldan 'das 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rig par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
8a1(brgyad stong): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pas 'di ltar nye bar brtag cing 'di ltar nges par bsam par bgyi ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
8a2(brgyad stong): phyin pa 'di gang yin shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gang gi yin/ ci chos gang med pa dang mi dmigs pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam zhes/ gal te de ltar nye bar brtags de ltar nges
8a3(brgyad stong): bar bsams na/ mi 'gong kun tu mi zhum bag mi tsha/ bag 'khums par mi 'gyur 'di'i yid phyir phyogs par mi bgyid/ bcom zhing phyir phyogs par mi 'gyur/ mi dngang kun tu mi skrag
8a4(brgyad stong): kun tu skrag pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar rig par bgyi'o/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la
8a5(brgyad stong): 'di skad ces smras so/ / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di ltar gang gi tshe gzugs nyid gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid dang bral ba de bzhin du gang gi tshe tshor ba nyid dang 'du shes nyid dang 'du byed rnams nyid dang de bzhin du 'di ltar
8a6(brgyad stong): gang gi tshe rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid dang bral ba gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid dang bral ba/ gang gi tshe thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
8a7(brgyad stong): kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ngo bo nyid dang bral ba yin na/ de ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar rig par bya/ de skad ces smras pa dang /
8b1(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin mo de bzhin te/ shA ri'i bu gzugs nyid gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'o// de bzhin
8b2(brgyad stong): du tshor ba nyid dang 'du shes nyid dang 'du byed rnams nyid dang de bzhin du rnam par shes pa nyid kyang tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu
8b3(brgyad stong): phyin pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni
8b4(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dang yang bral ba'o/ / mtshan nyid ni mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid dang yang bral ba'o// mtshan nyid kyi gzhi yang mtshan nyid kyi gzhi'i ngo bo nyid dang yang bral ba'o// ngo bo nyid ni
8b5(brgyad stong): ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang yang bral ba'o/ / de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor yang ci byang chub sems
8b6(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'di la slob par 'gyur ba de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no de de bzhin
8b7(brgyad stong): te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'di la slob par 'gyur ba de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu chos thams cad
9a1(brgyad stong): ni nges par 'byung ba med cing ma skyes pa'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i du de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nye bar 'gyur
9a2(brgyad stong): ro/ / ci lta ci ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nye bar gyur pa de lta de ltar sems can yongs su smin pa'i phyir/ lus dang sems yongs su dag pa dang mtshan yongs su dag pa dang sangs rgyas kyi
9a3(brgyad stong): zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas dang nye bar yang 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni thams cad mkhyen
9a4(brgyad stong): pa nyid la nye ba yin no/ / gzhan yang tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po las brtsams te 'di skad ces smras so// gal te gzugs la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod
9a5(brgyad stong): do/ / gal te gzugs kyi mtshan ma la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te gzugs mtshan ma'o snyam du spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te gzugs kyi skye ba la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal
9a6(brgyad stong): te gzugs kyi 'gag pa la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / gal te gzugs kyi 'jig pa la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te gzugs stong pa'o snyam du spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bdag spyod do snyam
9a7(brgyad stong): du spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bdag byang chub sems dpa'o snyam du spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bdag byang chub sems dpa'o snyam na da dmigs pa nyid la spyod do// de bzhin du gal te tshor ba dang
9b1(brgyad stong): 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang gal te rnam par shes pa la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / gal te rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma'o
9b2(brgyad stong): snyam du spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / gal te rnam par shes pa'i skye ba la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa'i 'gag pa la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa'i
9b3(brgyad stong): 'jig pa la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / gal te rnam par shes pa stong pa'o snyam du spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bdag spyod do snyam du spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bdag byang chub sems dpa'
9b4(brgyad stong): snyam du spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bdag byang chub sems dpa'o snyam na dmigs pa nyid la spyod do// gal te yang de 'di snyam du gang de ltar spyod pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ste de ni shes
9b5(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom par byed pa yin no snyam du sems na de mtshan ma nyid la spyod pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni thabs mi mkhas par rig par bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang
9b6(brgyad stong): ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin/ de skad ces smras pa
9b7(brgyad stong): dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs la mi spyod/ gzugs
10a1(brgyad stong): kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod/ gzugs mtshan ma'o snyam du mi spyod/ gzugs kyi skye ba la mi spyod/ gzugs kyi 'gag pa la mi spyod/ gzugs kyi 'jig pa la mi spyod
10a2(brgyad stong): gzugs stong pa'o snyam du mi spyod/ bdag spyod do snyam du mi spyod/ bdag byang chub sems dnga'o snyam du mi spyod/ bdag byang chub sems dpa'o snyam du dmigs pa la mi spyod pa dang / de bzhin du
10a3(brgyad stong): gal te tshor ba la ma yin/ 'du shes la ma yin/ 'du byed rnams la ma yin/ gal te rnam par shes pa la mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma la mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma'o snyam du mi
10a4(brgyad stong): spyod/ rnam par shes pa'i skye ba la mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa'i 'gag pa la mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa'i 'jig pa la mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa stong pa'o snyam du mi spyod/ bdag spyod do snyam du mi spyod/
10a5(brgyad stong): bdag byang chub sems dpa'o snyam du mi spyod/ bdag byang chub sems dpa'o snyam du dmigs pa la mi spyod cing / gal te yang de 'di snyam du gang de ltar spyod pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ste
10a6(brgyad stong): de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom par byed pa yin no snyam du mi sems pa ste/ de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de spyod kyang
10a7(brgyad stong): spyod do snyam du nye bar mi rtogs/ mi spyod do snyam du nye bar mi rtogs/ spyod kyang spyod la mi spyod kyang mi spyod do snyam du nye bar mi rtogs/ spyod pa yang ma yin la mi spyod pa yang ma yin pa'o snyam du nye bar mi rtog
10b1(brgyad stong): spyad par bya'o snyam du yang nye bar mi rtogs/ spyad par mi bya'o snyam du yang nye bar mi rtogs/ spyad par bya ba yang yin la spyad par mi bya ba yang yin no snyam du nye bar mi rtogs/ spyad par bya ba yang ma yin la spyad
10b2(brgyad stong): par mi bya ba yang ma yin pa nyid do snyam du nye bar mi rtogs so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni nye bar ma rtogs shing ma zin pas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin
10b3(brgyad stong): chos thams cad len pa med pa zhes bya ba ste/ yangs pa mdun du byas pa tshad med par nges pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'o// ting nge 'dzin 'dis gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
10b4(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ / de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus gnas brtan tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//
10b5(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das gang ting nge 'dzin 'dis gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par
10b6(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa lags so/ / de ni ting nge 'dzin de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / ting nge 'dzin des kyang rlom sems su mi bgyid/ bdag ni mnyam par gzhag pa ste/ bdag ting nge
10b7(brgyad stong): 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug go/ / bdag ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par gzhag pa'o// bdag ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa'o snyam pa de lta bu de la thams cad nas thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad ma
11a1(brgyad stong): mchis so/ / 'di skad ces gsol pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin gang gis gnas na
11a2(brgyad stong): b yang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin de
11a3(brgyad stong): bstan par nus sam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu des ni ting nge 'dzin de yang mi shes yang dag par mi shes so// tshe dang ldan
11a4(brgyad stong): pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor mi shes yang dag par mi shes zhes zer ram/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mi shes yang dag par mi shes zhes zer ro//
11a5(brgyad stong): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de med pas na mi shes yang dag par mi shes so// ting nge 'dzin de yang mi shes yang dag par mi shes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs
11a6(brgyad stong): so zhes bya ba byin te/ ji ltar yang khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus spobs pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis ston pa ni rab 'byor legs so legs so// rab 'byor de de bzhin no de de
11a7(brgyad stong): bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni de bzhin du 'di la bslab par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
11b1(brgyad stong): la slob bo/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
11b2(brgyad stong): slob pa lags sam/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na shes
11b3(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin no/ / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
11b4(brgyad stong): chen po de ltar slob na chos gang la slob pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
11b5(brgyad stong): po de ltar slob pa ni chos gang la yang mi slob bo/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu chos de dag ni byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pas ci ltar mngon par chags pa de bzhin du yod pa ma yin no//
11b6(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'o na de dag ci ltar mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu ci ltar med pa de bzhin du yang dag par yod de de ltar med pa de'i
11b7(brgyad stong): phyir ma rig pa zhes bya'o/ / de dag la byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pa rnams mngon par chags te/ de dag gis chos thams cad med pa la brtags so// de dag gis de la brtags nas mtha'
12a1(brgyad stong): gnyis la zhen pas chos de dag mi shes mi mthong ste/ de'i phyir de dag med bzhin du chos thams cad la rtog go// brtags nas mtha' gnyis la mngon par chags so//
12a2(brgyad stong): bangon par chags pa de'i gzhis dani bas pa la gnas nas 'das pa'i chos la rnyog go// ma'angs pa'i chos la rtog go// daltar byung ba ma chis la rtog sa// de dag gis brtags nas ming da gzug
12a3(brgyad stong): la mngon par zhen to/ / de dag gis med pa'i chos thams cad la brtags so// de dag gis med pa'i chos de dag thams cad la brtags pas lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mi shes mi mthong ngo //
12a4(brgyad stong): lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ma shes ma mthong bas khams gsum las nges par mi 'byung / yang dag pa'i mtha' khong du mi chud de de'i phyir de dag byis pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o// de dag chos
12a5(brgyad stong): bden pa la yid mi ches so/ / shA ri'i bu yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni chos gang la yang mngon par zhen par mi byed do// de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das
12a6(brgyad stong): la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
12a7(brgyad stong): bka' stsal ba/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lhor slob na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob ste/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na chos tham
12b1(brgyad stong): cad la slob bo/ / shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slod par 'gyur thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nye bar 'gyur thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
12b2(brgyad stong): nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang zhig 'di skad du 'dri ste ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'a di thams cad
12b3(brgyad stong): m khyen pa nyid la slob par 'gyur ram thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nye bar 'gyur ram thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram zhes de skad du yongs su 'dri na bcom ldan 'das de la ji ltar bstan
12b4(brgyad stong): par bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces rab 'byor de bas na 'dir khyod nyid la dri bar bya yis khyod kyis ci nus pa de bzhin du ston
12b5(brgyad stong): cig ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
12b6(brgyad stong): rab 'byor pa di ji snyam du sems sgyu ma de gzhan la gzugs de gzhan nam de bzhin du sgyu ma de gzhan la tshor ba de gzhan nam 'du shes de gzhan nam 'du byed rnams de gzhan nam/ rab 'byor de ci snyam du
12b7(brgyad stong): sem sa sgyu ma de gzhan la rnam par shes pa de gzhan nam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags te sgyu ma de gzhan la gzugs de gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das
13a1(brgyad stong): gzugs nyid sgyu ma lags so sgyu ma nyid gzugs lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du sgyu ma de gzhan la tshor ba de gzhan dang / 'du shes de gzhan dang 'du byed rnams de
13a2(brgyad stong): gzhan yang ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams nyid sgyu ma lags so sgyu ma nyid tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams lags so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma de gzhan
13a3(brgyad stong): la rnam par shes pa de gzhan yang ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa nyid sgyu ma lags so sgyu ma nyid rnam par shes pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
13a4(brgyad stong): 'di ji snyam du sems nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di rnams la 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i 'du shes dang kun shes pa dang rnam par rig pa dang tha snyad 'di yin nam/ de skad ces bka'
13a5(brgyad stong): stsal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin te bde bar gshegs pa de de bzhin no// bcom ldan 'das byang
13a6(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa des ni sgyu ma'i skyes bu ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bslab par bgyi'o/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/
13a7(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po de dag nyid sgyu ma'i skyes bur gzung bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis gzugs ni sgyu ma lha
13b1(brgyad stong): bur gsungs te/ gzugs gang lags pa de yang dbang po drug dang phung po lnga po de dag lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams sgyu ma lta
13b2(brgyad stong): bur gsungs shing bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par shes pa yang sgyu ma lta bur gsungs te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa gang lags pa de yang dbang po drug dang phung po lnga po de dag
13b3(brgyad stong): lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bstan pa 'di thos na dngang zhing kun tu skrag la kun tu skrag pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur ram/
13b4(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu song bar gyur na ni/ dngang
13b5(brgyad stong): zhing kun tu skrag la kun tu skrag pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / rab 'byor gal te theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi lag tu song bar gyur
13b6(brgyad stong): na ni mi dngang kun tu mi skrag kun tu skrag pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur ro/ / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
13b7(brgyad stong): ldan 'das yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang rnams lags par rig par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang de dag la pha rol tu phyin
14a1(brgyad stong): pa rnams 'doms shing rjes su ston pa rnams dang / gang de dag la bdud kyi las rnams nye bar ston pa ste/ bdud kyi nyes pa ni 'di lta bur rig par bya/ bdud kyi nyes pa ni 'di dag
14a2(brgyad stong): yin/ bdud kyi las ni 'di dag yin par rig par bya/ bdud kyi las 'di dag khyed kyis rtogs nas spang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ste/ rab 'byor 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go
14a3(brgyad stong): cha chen po bgos pa theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams su rig par bya'o/ / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'dra
14a4(brgyad stong): la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis gang 'di skad du rab 'byor 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa theg pa chen po /
14a5(brgyad stong): la yang dag par zhugs pa theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams su rig par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das gang yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dang/
14a6(brgyad stong): chen po zhes bka' stsal pa de la byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i gzhi'i don gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka'
14a7(brgyad stong): stsal to/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don ni gzhi'i don med pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad kyi
14b1(brgyad stong): chags pa med pa la slob bo/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad rjes su rtogs pa'i don du chags pa med pa na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
14b2(brgyad stong): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ rab 'byor byang chub don du gnyer bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang yang
14b3(brgyad stong): 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das rgyu ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
14b4(brgyad stong): bka' stsal pa/ sems can gyi phung po chen po dang sems can gyi ris chen po'i mchog nyid du bya'o snyam pa ste/ don des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// de nas
14b5(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang don gang gi slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi bar spobs so// bcom
14b6(brgyad stong): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu da de'i dus la bab par shes na spobs par gyis shig/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bdag tu lta ba dang sems can du lta ba dang srog tu lha
14b7(brgyad stong): ba dang gang zag tu lta ba dang / 'byung bar lta ba dang 'jig par lta ba dang / chang par lta ba dang rtag par lta ba dang / rang gi lus la lta ba chen po 'di lta bu la segs pa'i lta ba de dag spang ba'i slad du
15a1(brgyad stong): chos bstan to snyam ste don des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol
15a2(brgyad stong): to/ / bcom ldan 'das pa dag kyang don gang gi slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi bar spobs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de'i dus la
15a3(brgyad stong): bab par shes na spobs par gyis shig/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das de byang chub kyi
15a4(brgyad stong): sems thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems zag pa med pa'i sems/ mnyam pa med pa'i sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags
15a5(brgyad stong): pa'i sems gang lags pa'i sems de la yang ma chags yongs su ma zin to/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems de ni zag pa ma mchis pa yongs su ma zin pa'o//
15a6(brgyad stong): de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems zag pa ma mchis shing yongs su ma zin pa gang lags pa'i sems de la yang ma chags shing yongs su ma zin te/ don des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
15a7(brgyad stong): chen po zhes bgyi ba'i grangs su mchi'o/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i rgyus sems de la yang ma chags shing
15b1(brgyad stong): yongs su ma zin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems med pa'i phyir sems de la yang ma chags shing yongs su ma zin to// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab
15b2(brgyad stong): 'byor yang ci sems gang sems med pa'i sems de yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu yang ci sems med pa de la yod pa'am med pa yod pa 'am dmigs par 'gyur
15b3(brgyad stong): ram/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gal te sems med pa de la gang yod pa 'am/ med pa med cing
15b4(brgyad stong): mi dmigs na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ji ltar 'di skad du sems gang sems med pa'i sems de yod dam zhes zer/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci ltar yang khyod bcom
15b5(brgyad stong): ldan 'das kyis nyon mongs pa med pa la gnas pa'i mchog tu gsungs pa ltar ston pa legs so legs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa gang po byams ma'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//
15b6(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das sems dpa' chen po sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba gang lags pa 'di ni sems dpa' de go cha chen po bgos pa sems dpa' de theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa theg pa chen po la yang
15b7(brgyad stong): dag par gnas pa lags te/ de'i slad du sems dpa' chen po sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba'i grangs su mchi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//
16a1(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das go cha chen po bgos pa go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bgyi ba 'di gsungs na/ bcom ldan 'das ci tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen/
16a2(brgyad stong): popo bgos pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du bdag gis sems can gzhal du med pa yongs su mya
16a3(brgyad stong): ngan las bzla bar bya'o bdag gis sems can grangs med pa yongs su mya ngan las bzla'o snyam la/ gang gis gang yongs su mya ngan las bzlas pa'i sems can de dag kyang yod pa ma yin no snyam ste/
16a4(brgyad stong): des sems can de snyed pa de dag yongs su mya ngan las zla bar byed la gang yongs su mya ngan las bzlas pa dang gang gis yongs su mya ngan las bzlas pa'i sems can yang 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no// de ci'i
16a5(brgyad stong): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor dper na sgyu ma byed pa mkhas pa 'am sgyu ma byed pa'i nye gnas kyis lam po che'i bzhi mdor
16a6(brgyad stong): skye bo'i tshigs chen po mngon par sprul te mngon par sprul nas skye bo'i tshogs chen po de mi snang bar byas na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ de la yang gang gis gang yang bsad pa 'am shi ba'am bshig pa
16a7(brgyad stong): 'am mi snang bar byas pa yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
16b1(brgyad stong): s ems dpa' chen pos sems can gzhal du med grangs med pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las zlo bar byed do gang yongs su mya ngan las bzlas pa dang gang gis yongs su mya ngan las bzlas par 'gyur ba'i sems
16b2(brgyad stong): can yang 'ga' zhig yod pa ma yin no/ / gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bstan pa 'di lta bu 'di thos nas mi dngang kun tu mi skrag/ kun tu skrag pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur na 'di tsam
16b3(brgyad stong): gyis rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de go cha chen po bgos par rig par bya'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
16b4(brgyad stong): l dan 'das kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba de ltar na bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni go cha ma mchis pa bgos pa lags par rig
16b5(brgyad stong): par bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni go cha med pa bgos par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab
16b6(brgyad stong): 'byor thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni ma byas pa rnam par ma bsgyur ba mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o/ / sems can gang dag gi don du go cha 'di bgos pa'i sems can de dag kyang ma byas pa rnam par ma bsgyur
16b7(brgyad stong): kha mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o/ / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin no// bde bar
17a1(brgyad stong): gshegs pa de de bzhin no/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed
17a2(brgyad stong): rnams dang / bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de bzhin du tshor ba'i de
17a3(brgyad stong): bzhin nyid dang / 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid dang / 'du byed rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de nas tshe dang
17a4(brgyad stong): ldan pa gang po byams ma'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba zhes zer ram/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du
17a5(brgyad stong): byed rnams dang tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba zhes zer ram/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba zhes zer ram/ de bzhin du
17a6(brgyad stong): tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid dang 'du byed rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba zhes zer ram/ tshe dang
17a7(brgyad stong): ldan pa rab 'byor 'on te gzugs gang ma bcings ma grol ba zhes zer ba'i gzugs de gang yin/ de bzhin du tshor ba de gang yin/ 'du shes de gang yin/ 'du byed rnams de gang yin/ tshe dang
17b1(brgyad stong): ldan pa rab 'byor rnam par shes pa gang ma bcings ma grol ba zhes zer ba'i rnam par shes pa de gang yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ma bcings ma grol ba zhes zer ba'i gzugs kyi
17b2(brgyad stong): bzhin nyid de gang yin/ de bzhin du tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid dang / 'du byed rnams kyi de bzhin nyid de gang yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i /
17b3(brgyad stong): bzhin nyid ma bcings ma grol ba zhes zer ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid de gang yin/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa gang po byams ma'i bu la 'di skad ces
17b4(brgyad stong): so/ / tshe dang ldan pa gang po gang gi tshe sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i gzugs gang yin pa de ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de bzhin du sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i tshor ba gang yin pa dang / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i 'du shes gang yin pa
17b5(brgyad stong): dang / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i 'du byed rnams gang yin pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa gang po gang gi tshe sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i
17b6(brgyad stong): gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ / de bzhin du sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid dang / 'du byed rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang
17b7(brgyad stong): pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa gang po sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yang dag pa ma yin pas na ma bcings ma grol ba'o//
18a1(brgyad stong): dben pas nam bcings ma grol ba'o// ma skyes pas nam bcings ma grol ba ste/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha chen po bgos pa theg pa
18a2(brgyad stong): chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa'i go cha chen po go cha med pa'o/ / de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa gang po byams ma'i bu cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das
18a3(brgyad stong): la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos par gyur pa theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs shing theg pa chen
18a4(brgyad stong): po la yang dag par gnas par 'gyur ba'i theg pa chen po de ni gang lags/ theg pa chen po de la ji ltar yang dag par zhugs par rig par bgyi ba 'am/ theg pa chen po des gang nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba
18a5(brgyad stong): 'am/ theg pa chen po de la gang gis yang dag par zhugs pa'am/ theg pa chen po des gang du gnas par 'gyur ba'am/ theg pa chen po des gang zhig nges par 'byung bar 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol
18a6(brgyad stong): ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor theg pa chen po zhes bya ba 'di ni gzhal du med pa'i tshig bla dgas so// rab 'byor gzhal du med pa
18a7(brgyad stong): zhes bya ba 'di ni tshad med pa'i phyir ro/ / rab 'byor gang yang 'di skad du theg pa chen po de la ji ltar yang dag par zhugs par rig par bgyi ba 'am/ theg pa chen po des gang nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'am/
18b1(brgyad stong): theg pa chen po de la gang gis yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ theg pa chen po des gang du gnas par 'gyur ba 'am/ theg pa chen po dri gang zhig nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhes zer ba ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi
18b2(brgyad stong): sgo nas yang dag par zhugs nas/ khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhing mi dmigs pa gang yin pas yang dag par zhugs te thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas par 'gyur la byang chub sems dpa'
18b3(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po nges par 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'on kyang gang nas kyang nges par 'byung ba med gang gis kyang yang dag par ma zhugs gang du yang gnas par mi 'gyur mod kyi gnas pa med pa'i tshul gyis thams cad
18b4(brgyad stong): mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur la/ theg pa chen po des gang yang nges par ma phyung nges par 'byung bar yang mi 'gyur nges par phyung ba yang med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang nges par 'byung ba dang / gang
18b5(brgyad stong): gis nges par 'byung ba'i chos de gnyis ka yang med cing mi dmigs te/ de ltar na chos thams cad med cing mi dmigs pa la chos gang zhig chos gang gis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
18b6(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po theg pa chen po zhes bgyi ba 'di ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan
18b7(brgyad stong): nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba la rjod do/ / nam mkha' ltar mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir de ni theg pa chen po'o// ji ltar ram mkha' la sems can gzhal du ma mchis grangs ma mchis tshad ma mchis pa'i go ska
19a1(brgyad stong): mchis pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po la yang sems can gzhal du ma mchis grangs ma mchis tshad ma mchis pa'i go skabs mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs
19a2(brgyad stong): 'dis na 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po'o/ / 'di la 'ong ba yang ma mthong 'di la 'gro ba yang ma mthong zhing 'di la gnas pa yang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das
19a3(brgyad stong): 'di ltar theg pa chen po 'di la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs phyi ma'i mtha' yang mi dmigs dbus kyang mi dmigs te/ bcom ldan 'das theg pa de ni dus gsum du mnyam pa'o// de bas na theg pa chen po theg pa chen po
19a4(brgyad stong): zhes bgyi'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rab 'byor leg so legs so// rab 'byor de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ de ltar na 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
19a5(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po yin no/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis 'di la bslabs pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob par gyur to// rjes su thob bo rjes su 'thob
19a6(brgyad stong): par 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa gang po byams ma'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gnas brtan rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i slad du byin gyis brlabs pa
19a7(brgyad stong): 'di ni theg pa chen po bshad par bya bar sems lags so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'gal bar
19b1(brgyad stong): theg pa chen po ston par ma gyur lags grang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin te rab 'byor khyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la theg pa chen po rjes su mthun par ston to// de skad ces
19b2(brgyad stong): bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi mthus lags so// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems
19b3(brgyad stong): dpa' sngon gyi mthar yang nye bar ma rtogs byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar yang nye bar ma rtogs byang chub sems dpa' dbus su yang nye bar ma rtogs so/ / nye bar ma rtogs pa de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gzugs
19b4(brgyad stong): mu ma mchis pas na byang chub sems dpa' yang mu ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o/ / de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa mu ma mchis pas na byang chub sems dpa' yang mu
19b5(brgyad stong): ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o/ / gzugs byang chub sems dpa'o zhes nye bar ma rtogs te 'di yang ma mchis mi dmigs so// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa byang
19b6(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa'o zhes nye bar ma rtogs te/ 'di yang ma mchis mi dmigs so// bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis byang chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad nas thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad mi dmigs
19b7(brgyad stong): bas bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i ming 'di gang la yod pa'i chos de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong mi dmigs
20a1(brgyad stong): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong mi dmigs te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos de thams cad nas thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad yang dag par rjes su ma
20a2(brgyad stong): mthong zhing ma dmigs na chos gang zhig chos gang gis chos gang la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas shes bgyi ba 'di ni ming tsam mo// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
20a3(brgyad stong): zhes bgyi ba 'di yang ming tsam mo/ / bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba 'di yang ming tsam mo// ming de yang mngon par ma grub ste/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bdag bdag ces brjod kyang
20a4(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das bdag shin tu mngon par ma grub pa bzhin no/ / de ltar chos thams cad ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa la gang zhig gzung du ma mchis shing mngon par ma grub pa'i gzugs de gang lags/ tshor ba dang 'du shes
20a5(brgyad stong): dang 'du byed rnams de gang lags/ gang zhig gzung du ma mchis shing mngon par ma grub pa'i rnam par shes pa de gang lags/ de ltar chos de dag thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni mngon par ma
20a6(brgyad stong): grub pa lags la/ gang chos thams cad kyi mngon par ma grub pa gang lags pa de yang chos ma lags te/ des na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par ma grub pas mngon par ma grub pa la ci zhig gdams shing rjes
20a7(brgyad stong): su bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das mngon par ma grub pa las gzhan na chos thams cad dam sangs rgyas kyi ches sam byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam gang byang chub tu spyod pa yang mi dmigs so//
20b1(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar bshad cing de ltar bstan te de ltar nye bar bstan pa la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi 'gong kun tu mi zhum bag mi tsha/ bag 'khums par mi 'gyur/ 'di'i
20b2(brgyad stong): yid phyir phyogs par mi bgyid bcom zhing phyir phyogs par mi 'gyur/ mi dngang kun tu mi skrag kun tu skrag pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
20b3(brgyad stong): spyod pa'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nye bar rtog pa'o//
20b4(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par sems pa'o zhes de ltar rig par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'
20b5(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chos 'di dag nye bar rtog pa de'i tshe/ gzugs nye bar mi rtogs gzugs nye bar mi 'dzin/ gzugs skye bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / gzugs
20b6(brgyad stong): 'gag par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / de bzhin du tshor ba ma yin 'du shes ma yin/ 'du byed rnams ma yin/ rnam par shes pa nye bar mi rtogs/ rnam par shes pa nye bar mi 'dzin/ rnam par shes pa skye
20b7(brgyad stong): bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / rnam par shes pa 'gag par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar gzugs kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs ma lags
21a1(brgyad stong): gzugs kyi 'jig pa ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs ma lags te/ des na skye ba ma mchis pa dang / gzugs shes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / gnyis su
21a2(brgyad stong): bgyir ma mchis so/ / des na 'jig pa ma mchis pa dang gzugs shes bgyi ba 'di yang gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su bgyir ma mchis te/ gang yang 'di skad du gzugs shes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis
21a3(brgyad stong): ba'i grangs su gtogs so/ / de bzhin du 'di ltar tshor ba'i gang lags pa dang / 'du shes kyi gang lags pa dang / 'du byed rnams kyi gang lags pa dang / 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa gang
21a4(brgyad stong): lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags/ rnam par shes pa'i 'jig pa ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags te/ des na skye ba ma mchis pa dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba 'di yang
21a5(brgyad stong): gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so/ / des na 'jig pa ma mchis pa dang rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba 'di yang gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su bgyir ma mchis te/ gang yang 'di skad du rnam
21a6(brgyad stong): par shes pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su gtogs so/ / bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du nye bar rtog na/ de'i tshe gzugs nye bar
21a7(brgyad stong): mi rtogs gzugs nye bar mi 'dzin gzugs skye bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / gzugs 'gag par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / de bzhin du tshor ba ma yin 'du shes ma yin 'du byed rnams ma yin/ rnam par
21b1(brgyad stong): shes pa nye bar mi rtogs/ rnam par shes pa nye bar mi 'dzin/ rnam par shes pa skye bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / rnam par shes pa 'gag par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // de ci'i slad du zhe na/
21b2(brgyad stong): 'di ltar gzugs kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs ma lags/ gzugs kyi 'jig pa ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs ma lags te/ des na skye ba ma mchis pa dang gzugs shes bgyi ba 'di
21b3(brgyad stong): ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so/ / des na 'jig pa ma mchis pa dang / gzugs shes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su bgyir ma mchis te/ gang yang 'di skad
21b4(brgyad stong): du gzugs shes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su gtogs so/ / de bzhin du 'di ltar tshor ba'i gang lags pa dang / 'du shes kyi gang lags pa dang / 'du byed rnams kyi
21b5(brgyad stong): gang lags pa dang / 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags/ rnam par shes pa'i 'jig pa ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa
21b6(brgyad stong): ma lags te/ des na skye ba ma mchis pa dang rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba 'di yang gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// des na 'jig pa ma mchis pa dang rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi
21b7(brgyad stong): ba 'di yang gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su bgyir ma mchis te/ gang yang 'di skad du rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grang su gtogs so// // 'phags
22a1(brgyad stong): pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa/ bam po gnyis pa/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// de'i
22a2(brgyad stong): phyir tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis ji skad smras pa'i don bdag gis shes pa de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yang skye ba med pa yin no/ / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te yang byang chub sems dpa' yang skye ba
22a3(brgyad stong): med pa yin na byang chub sems dpa' dka' ba spyad pa spyod pa'am sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir sdug bsngal gang yin pa de dag nyams su myong ba'i don du spro ba yang ci zhig yod/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang
22a4(brgyad stong): ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dka' ba spyad pa spyod par mi 'dod do// gang zhig
22a5(brgyad stong): dka' ba'i 'du shes kyis spyod pa de ni byang chub sems dpar yang mi 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dka' ba'i 'du shes bskyed nas ni sems can gzhal du med grangs med pa'i don bya bar mi
22a6(brgyad stong): nus so/ / 'on kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nyid du byas nas de sems can thams cad la mar 'du shes pa dang / phar 'du shes pa dang / bur 'du shes pa dang / bu mor 'du shes bskyed par byas shing
22a7(brgyad stong): de bzhin du skyes pa dang / bud med dag la 'du shes de dag byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do// de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
22b1(brgyad stong): chen pos sems can thams cad la mar 'du shes pa dang / phar 'du shes pa dang / bur 'du shes pa dang / bu mor 'du shes pa dang / bdag nyid kyi bar du yang 'du shes bskyed par bya ste/ ji ltar bdag ni thams
22b2(brgyad stong): c ad nas thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad sdug bsngal thams cad las thar par bya ba de bzhin du sems can thams cad thams cad nas thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad sdug bsngal thams cad las
22b3(brgyad stong): thar par bya'o zhes de ltar sems can thams cad la yang 'du shes bskyed par bya ste/ bdag gis sems can 'di dag thams cad yongs su mi btang ngo // bdag gis sems can 'di dag thams cad sdug bsngal gyi
22b4(brgyad stong): phung po dpag tu med pa las thar par bya'o/ / bdag gi lus brgyar gtubs kyang chung ngu na 'di dag la bdag gis gnod sems kyang mi bskyed do snyam du de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems
22b5(brgyad stong): bskyed par bya'o/ / gal te sems de ltar gnas na dka' ba byed pa'i 'du shes su spyod pa ma yin no// dka' ba byed pa'i 'du shes su gnas pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
22b6(brgyad stong): d pa' sems dpa' chen pos ci nas kyang bdag ni thams cad nas thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad med cing mi dmigs pa de bzhin du chos thams cad thams cad nas thams cad rnam pa thams cad du
22b7(brgyad stong): thams cad med cing mi dmigs pa de ltar sems bskyed par bya zhing de ltar na nang dang phyi'i chos thams cad la 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/ / gal te sems de ltar spyod na dka' ba'i 'du shes can du spyod
23a1(brgyad stong): pa ma yin dka' ba'i 'du shes can du gnas pa ma yin no/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus gang yang 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' yang skye ba med pa yin no zhes smras pa de ni de nge
23a2(brgyad stong): bzhin no/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' ni skye ba med pa'o// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor yang ci byang chub sems dpa' nyid skye ba med dam 'on te byang
23a3(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa'i chos rnams kyang skye ba med/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams kyang skye ba med do// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
23a4(brgyad stong): yang ci byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams kho na skye ba med dam 'on te thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba med/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba med do//
23a5(brgyad stong): shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor yang ci thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kho na skye ba med dam/ 'on te thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams kyang skye ba med/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang
23a6(brgyad stong): ldan pa shA ri'i bu thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams kyang skye ba med do/ / shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor yang ci thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams kho na skye ba med dam 'on te so
23a7(brgyad stong): so'i skye bo yang skye ba med/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu so so'i skye bo yang skye ba med do// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor yang ci so so'i skye bo nyid skye ba med dam/ 'on
23b1(brgyad stong): te so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyang skye ba med/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyang skye ba med do// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab
23b2(brgyad stong): 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' yang skye ba med/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams kyang skye ba med/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba med/ thams
23b3(brgyad stong): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams kyang skye ba med/ so so'i skye bo yang skye ba med so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyang skye ba med pa yin na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'o na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos thams
23b4(brgyad stong): cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su theb pa yin nam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kho bo na mi skyes pa'i chos la thob
23b5(brgyad stong): par mi 'dod la mngon par rtogs pa yang ma yin te/ ma skyes pa'i chos kyi sa thob pa ma skyes pa 'thob par yang mi 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor yang ci ma skyes pa'i chos kyi thob pa
23b6(brgyad stong): skyes pa 'thob par 'gyur ram/ 'on te skyes pa'i chos kyis thob pa ma skyes pa 'thob par 'gyur/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu yang cim skyes pa'i chos skyes pa yin nam/ 'on te ma
23b7(brgyad stong): skyes pa'i chos ma skyes pa nyid yin/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor yang ci skye ba'i chos nyid mi skye ba yin nam 'on te mi skye ba'i chos mi skye ba yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa
24a1(brgyad stong): shA ri'i bu skye ba'i chos sam mi skye ba'i chos shes smra bar mi spobs so/ / shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod kyis skye ba med pa yang smra bar mi spobs
24a2(brgyad stong): sam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu skye ba med pa nyid rjod pa yin la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu skye ba med pa nyid so sor snang ba yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu skye ba med pa
24a3(brgyad stong): nyid spobs pa yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de kho na bzhin du shin tu so sor snang ba nyid do// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces
24a4(brgyad stong): smras so/ / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ni chos ston pa'i nang na mchog tu bzhag par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gnas brtan tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ni gang dang gang nyid la yongs su dri ba
24a5(brgyad stong): byas pa de dang de nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhing chos nyid las kyang mi g.yo la chos nyid dang 'gal bar yang mi byed do/ / de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa sha
24a6(brgyad stong): ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos mi gnas pa'i chos can rnams kyi chos nyid ni 'di yin te de dag ni gang dang gang nyid la yongs su dri ba byas pa de dang
24a7(brgyad stong): de nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / chos nyid dang 'gal bar yang mi byed la chos nyid las kyang mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar yang chos thams cad mi gnas pa'i phyir ro// de skad
24b1(brgyad stong): ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor legs so legs so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
24b2(brgyad stong): rnams kyi chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid ni theg pa thams cad pa chos thams cad
24b3(brgyad stong): la mi gnas pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin no// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ltar bshad cing
24b4(brgyad stong): 'di ltar bstan pa dang 'di ltar nye bar bstan pa la sems zhum par mi 'gyur ba dang nem nur du mi 'gyur ba dang rmongs par mi 'gyur ba dang / sems gzhan du mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
24b5(brgyad stong): chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gnas pa 'dis gnas shing yid la byed pa 'di dang ma bral ba yin no zhes rig par bya'o/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces
24b6(brgyad stong): smras so/ / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gnas pas gnas pa gang yin pa de ci ltar yid la byed pa dang ma bral bar 'gyur
24b7(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yid la byed pa dang ma bral ba yin na de lta na ni de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gnas pa dang bral bar 'gyur ning / tshe dang
25a1(brgyad stong): l dan pa rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa dang ma bral na de lta na ni de yid la byed pa de dang bral bar
25a2(brgyad stong): 'gyur ro/ / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yid la byed pa dang ma bral yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gnas pa dang ma bral ba nyid du 'gyur
25a3(brgyad stong): na de lta yin du zin na sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gnas pa dang ma bral bar 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can thams cad kyang yid la byed pa dang ma bral bar
25a4(brgyad stong): gnas so/ / de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu legs so legs so// 'on kyang khyod la
25a5(brgyad stong): yang klan kar 'gyur te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus ni don 'di nyid yang dag pa'i tshig tu brjod par yang yongs su bzung ba yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems can ngo
25a6(brgyad stong): bo nyid med pas na yid la byed pa ngo bo nyid med par rig par bya'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems can dngos po med pas na yid la byed pa dngos po med par rig par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
25a7(brgyad stong): bu sems can dben pas na yid la byed pa dben par rig par bya'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems can bsam gyis mi khyab pas na yid la byed pa bsam gyis mi khyab par rig par bya'o// tshe dang
25b1(brgyad stong): ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems can mngon par rdzogs par byang ma chub pas na yid la byed pa mngon par rdzogs par byang ma chub par rig par bya'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems can yang dag pa ji lta ba ma yin
25b2(brgyad stong): pa'i don du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pas na yid la byed pa yang dag pa ji lta ba ma yin pa'i don du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par rig par bya'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
25b3(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po ni de lta bu'i ngo bo'i yid la byed pa 'di dang gnas pa 'dis gnas par 'dod do/ / 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi spyod pa'i
25b4(brgyad stong): le'u zhes bya ba ste dang po'o/ / / de'i tshe yang lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris kyi lha'i bu bani khri dang lhan cig tu 'khor de nyid du 'dus te 'khod par gyur to// 'jig
25b5(brgyad stong): rten skyong ba bzhi yang rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu nyi khrir bcas pa dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa yang tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu khrir bcas pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu lnga stong yang
25b6(brgyad stong): 'khor de nyid du 'dus te 'khod par gyur te/ lha rnams kyi rang gi las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i 'od gang yin pa de thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid dang sangs
25b7(brgyad stong): rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis zil gyis mnan to/ / de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa rab 'byor lha'i bu stong phrag mang po
26a1(brgyad stong): 'khor 'dir 'dus te 'khod pa 'di rnams 'phags pa rab 'byor las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nye bar bstan pa/ dang gdams pa dang rjes su bstan pa nyan par 'dod na/
26a2(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya/ ji ltar bslab par bya/ ci ltar
26a3(brgyad stong): rnal 'byor du bya/ gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka de'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid dang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis nye bar bstan par bya ste/ lha'i
26a4(brgyad stong): bu gang dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa de dag gis sems bskyed par bya'o/ / gang dag yang dag pa nyid du nges pa la zhugs pa de dag ni bla na med
26a5(brgyad stong): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i skal ba med do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag gis 'khor ba'i rgyun las mtshams bcad pas de dag yang dang yang du 'khor zhing bla na
26a6(brgyad stong): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i skal ba med do/ / 'on kyang gal te de dag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na de dag la yang rjes su
26a7(brgyad stong): yi rang bar bya'o/ / kho bo ni de dag gi dge ba la bar chad mi byed de khyad par du 'phags pa'i chos rnams las ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i chos rnams la lhag par dmigs par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan
26b1(brgyad stong): 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor legs so legs so// khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la spro ba skyed pa gang yin pa de ni rab 'byor yang khyod
26b2(brgyad stong): legs so/ / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' drin gzo
26b3(brgyad stong): babar bgyi ste bka' drin mi gzo bar mi bgyi'o/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi drung du bcom ldan
26b4(brgyad stong): ' das sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa nyid kyis bdag cag rnams kyi don du byang chub kyi phyir tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa na nyan thos gang dag gis pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan
26b5(brgyad stong): t e de la bcom ldan 'das kyis spyad pas bla na med pa'i ye shes bskyed pa de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rjes su yongs su bzung
26b6(brgyad stong): bar bgyi zhing rjes su yongs su bskor bar bgyi'o/ / yang dag par yongs su bzung bar bgyi zhing yang dag par yongs su bskor bar yang bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di la
26b7(brgyad stong): b dag cag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rjes su yongs su bzung zhing rjes su yongs su bskor ba dang yang dag par yongs su bzung zhing yang dag par yongs su bskor bas myur
27a1(brgyad stong): du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la smras pa/
27a2(brgyad stong): kau shi ka de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya ba ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o//
27a3(brgyad stong): kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos stong pa nyid la gnas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya ste/ kau shi ka de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos go cha
27a4(brgyad stong): chen po bgos par 'gyur bar bya'o/ / gzugs la gnas par mi bya'o// tshor ba la ma yin 'du shes la ma yin 'du byed rnams la ma yin/ rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bya'o// mig
27a5(brgyad stong): la gnas par mi bya'o/ / gzugs la gnas par mi bya'o// mig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bya'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa la gnas par mi bya'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa las
27a6(brgyad stong): byung ba'i tshor ba la gnas par mi bya'o/ / de bzhin du rna ba dang sna dang / lce dang lus dang yid la gnas par mi bya'o// sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg dang chos rnams dang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nas yid
27a7(brgyad stong): kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar dang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i bar la gnas par mi bya'o sa'i khams la gnas par mi bya'o/ / chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang rlung
27b1(brgyad stong): gi khams dang nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams la gnas par mi bya'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la gnas par mi bya'o// yang dag par spong ba dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang
27b2(brgyad stong): dbang po dang stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang lam la gnas par mi bya'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la gnas par mi bya'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras
27b3(brgyad stong): bu dang dgra bcom pa nyid la gnas par mi bya'o/ / rang sangs rgyas nyid la gnas par mi bya'o// sangs rgyas nyid la gnas par mi bya'o// de ltar na gzugs so zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de ltar na
27b4(brgyad stong): tshatshor ba'o zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes so zhes bya ba dang 'du byed rnams so zhes bya ba dang / de ltar na rnam par shes pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de ltar na mig go zhes bya ba nas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa
27b5(brgyad stong): lalas byung ba'i tshor ba'o zhes bya ba'i bar du gnas par mi bya'o/ / de ltar na sa'i khams so zhes bya ba nas rnam par shes pa'i khams so zhes bya ba'i bar du gnas par mi bya'o// de ltar na dran pa nye
27b6(brgyad stong): bar gzhag pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o/ / de ltar na yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang dbang po dang stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so zhes bya ba dang de ltar na lam gyi yan
27b7(brgyad stong): lag go zhes gnas par mi bya'o/ / de ltar na rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de ltar na lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o zhes bya ba dang de ltar na phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/
28a1(brgyad stong): zhes bya ba dang / de ltar na dgra bcom pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de ltar na rang sangs rgyas so zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de ltar na sangs rgyas so zhes gnas par mi
28a2(brgyad stong): bya'o/ / gzugs rtag pa dang mi rtag pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa rtag pa dang mi rtag pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o//
28a3(brgyad stong): gzugs pade ba dang sdug bsngal ba'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// gzugs
28a4(brgyad stong): stong pa dang mi stong pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o/ / de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa stong pa dang mi stong pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// gzugs padag
28a5(brgyad stong): dang bdag med pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o/ / de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa bdag dang bdag med pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// gzugs sdug pa dang
28a6(brgyad stong): mi sdug pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o/ / de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa sdug pa dang mi sdug pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// gzugs stong pa'o zhes nye bar
28a7(brgyad stong): dmigs pas gnas par mi bya'o/ / de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa stong pa'o zhes nye bar dmigs pas gnas par mi bya'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i
28b1(brgyad stong): 'bras bu 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o/ / de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang dgra bcom pa nyid 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba'o//
28b2(brgyad stong): zhes gnas par mi bya'o// rang sangs rgyas nyid 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// sangs rgyas nyid 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// rgyun
