28b3(brgyad stong): tu zhugs pa sbyin pa'i gnas so zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o/ / rgyun tu zhugs pa de ltar thogs na srid pa lan bdun pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba sbyin pa'i gnas so zhes
28b4(brgyad stong): gnas par mi bya'o/ / lan cig phyir 'ong ba yongs su mthar ma phyin pa'i phyir 'jig rten 'dir lan cig phyir 'ongs nas sdug bsngal mthar byed par 'gyur ro zhes gnas par mi bya'o// phyir mi 'ong ba sbyin
28b5(brgyad stong): pa'i gnas so zhes gnas par mi bya'o/ / phyir mi 'ong ba 'jig rten 'dir phyir mi 'ong bar de nyid du yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// dgra bcom pa nyid sbyin pa'i gnas so zhes
28b6(brgyad stong): gnas par mi bya'o/ / dgra bcom pa 'di nyid du phung po'i lhag ma ma lus par mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro zhes gnas par mi bya'o// rang sangs
28b7(brgyad stong): rgyas sbyin pa'i gnas so zhes gnas par mi bya'o/ / rang sangs rgyas ni nyan thos kyi sa las 'das nas sangs rgyas kyi sa ma thob par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro zhes gnas par mi
29a1(brgyad stong): bya'o/ / sangs rgyas ni sbyin pa'i gnas so zhes gnas par mi bya'o// sangs rgyas ni so so'i skye bo'i sa las 'das pa dang nyan thos kyi sa las 'das pa dang rang sangs
29a2(brgyad stong): rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas gzhal du med grangs med pa'i sems can rnams kyi don mdzad de/ gzhal du med grangs med pa'i sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong yongs su mya ngan las bzlas
29a3(brgyad stong): gzhal du med grangs med pa'i sems can rnams nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su nges par mdzad cing sangs rgyas kyi sa la bzhugs te/ sangs rgyas kyi
29a4(brgyad stong): m dzad pa mdzad nas phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su sangs rgyas kyi yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro zhes des 'di ltar yang
29a5(brgyad stong): gnas par mi bya'o/ / de nas yang tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te sangs rgyas ni so so'i skye bo'i sa las 'das pa dang / nyan thos kyi sa las 'das pa dang / rang sangs
29a6(brgyad stong): rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas gzhal du med grangs med pa'i sems can rnams kyi don mdzad de/ gzhal du med grangs med pa'i sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong yongs su mya ngan las bzlas/ gzhal
29a7(brgyad stong): d u med grangs med pa'i sems can rnams nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su nges par mdzad cing sangs rgyas kyi sa la bzhugs te sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad
29b1(brgyad stong): n as phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su sangs rgyas kyi mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro zhes des 'di ltar yang gnas par mi bya na de sa yang ji
29b2(brgyad stong): ltar 'di la gnas par bya ci ltar bslab par bya snyam pa dang / de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis shes nas tshe dang ldan pa
29b3(brgyad stong): shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ji snyam du sems de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ci zhig la gnas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA
29b4(brgyad stong): ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni ci la yang gnas pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa
29b5(brgyad stong): d gra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi thugs ni shin tu mi gnas pa ste de ni 'dus byas kyi khams la yang mi gnas la 'dus ma byas kyi khams la yang mi gnas te de las bzhengs pa yang ma
29b6(brgyad stong): yin no/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di lta bu
29b7(brgyad stong): nyid du gnas par bya zhing 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'ga' zhig la gnas pa ma yin zhing mi gnas pa yang ma yin la mi ma
30a1(brgyad stong): #/ par gnas pa ma yin zhi pami mthur par mi gnas pa yang ma yin pa de bzhin du gnas par bya'o snyam pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa ci lta ba de bzhin du gnas par bya'o snyam zhing de bzhin du bslab par//
30a2(brgyad stong): bya'o snyam pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa ci lta ba de bzhin du gnas na mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis legs par gnas pa yin no snyam du 'dis de ltar bslab par bya'o// 'di la byang chub sems
30a3(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar gnas par bya zhing de bzhin du bslab par bya ste/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gnas pa 'dis gnas
30a4(brgyad stong): shing yid la byed pa 'di dang ma bral ba yin no/ / de nas 'khor de'i nang nas lha'i bu kha cig 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ gnod sbyin rnams kyi gnod sbyin gyi skad dang gnod sbyin gyi sgra dang /
30a5(brgyad stong): gnod sbyin gyi tshig dang gnod sbyin gyi gtam du byas pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi rab tu brjod pa gang yin pa de dag smras pa ni shes par rung gi/ gnas brtan rab 'byor gang 'chad pa dang rab tu brjod pa dang ston
30a6(brgyad stong): pa dang nye bar ston pa 'di ni shes par yang mi rung ngo snyam mo/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus lha'i bu de dag gi sems kyi rtog pa'i ngo bo nyid de lta bu sems kyis yongs su shes
30a7(brgyad stong): nas lha'i bu de dag la smras pa/ lha'i bu dag shes par mi rung shes par mi rung zhes bya ba de ni 'di ltar 'di la cung zad kyang smos pa med de/ 'di la cung zad kyang thos pa med do// de nas lha'i bu de dag yang
30b1(brgyad stong): 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ e ma'o 'phags pa rab 'byor 'dis ni gsal bar byed par 'gyur ro// e ma'o 'phags pa rab 'byor 'dis ni gsal bar byed par 'gyur te/ 'phags pa rab
30b2(brgyad stong): 'byor ni ring ba bas kyang ches ring du 'jug pa 'phags pa rab 'byor 'di ni phra ba bas kyang ches phra ba zab pa bas kyang ches zab par 'jug pas ston cing 'chad do snyam mo/ / de nas yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe
30b3(brgyad stong): dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i bu de dag gi sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/ lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu dag de lta bas na gang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par
30b4(brgyad stong): 'dod pa dang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la gnas par 'dod pa des bzod pa 'di la ma brten par mi 'grub bo/ / de bzhin du sbyar te gang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'dod pa dang / lan cig/
30b5(brgyad stong): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la gnas par 'dod pa dang / gang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'dod pa dang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la gnas par 'dod pa dang / gang dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'dod pa dang /
30b6(brgyad stong): dgra bcom pa nyid la gnas par 'dod pa dang / gang rang byang chub thob par 'dod pa dang / rang byang chub la gnas par 'dod pa des bzod pa 'di la ma brten par mi 'grub bo// gang bla na med pa yang
30b7(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'dod cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas par 'dod pa des bzod pa 'di la ma brten par mi 'grub bo/ / de nas yang lha'i bu de dag
31a1(brgyad stong): 'di snyam du sems te/ 'phags pa rab 'byor 'di la chos nyan pa rang bzhin ci lta bu zhig btsal bar bya snyam pa dang / de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa rab
31a2(brgyad stong): 'byor gyis lha'i bu de dag gi sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis shes nas lha'i bu de dag la smras pa/ lha'i bu dag kho bo la chos nyan pa ni sgyu ma dang sprul pa lta bu dag btsal bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir
31a3(brgyad stong): zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag ni nyan par mi 'gyur mngon du byed par mi 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i bu de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa rab 'byor yang ci sems can
31a4(brgyad stong): de dag sgyu ma lta bu yin gyi de dag sgyu ma ni ma yin nam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu dag sems can de dag ni sgyu
31a5(brgyad stong): ma lta bu lha'i bu dag sems can de dag ni rmi lam lta bu ste/ lha'i bu dag de ltar na sgyu ma dag sems can dag ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// de ltar na rmi lam dang sems can de dag ni
31a6(brgyad stong): gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ / lha'i bu dag chos thams cad kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa yang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang
31a7(brgyad stong): sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o/ / de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang phyir mi 'ong ba dang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa yang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o// /
31b1(brgyad stong): dgra bcom pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o// rang sangs rgyas kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o// rang sangs rgyas nyid kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
31b2(brgyad stong): rgyas kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o/ / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o// de nas lha'i bu de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces
31b3(brgyad stong): smras so/ / 'phags pa rab 'byor yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o zhes zer ram yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o/
31b4(brgyad stong): zhes zer ram/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu dag mya ngan las 'das pa yang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bur smra na chos gzhan lta ci smos/ lha'i bu de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa rab
31b5(brgyad stong): 'byor mya ngan las 'das pa yang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o zhes zer ram tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ lnga'i bu dag bdag ni gal te mya ngan las 'das pa las khyad par du 'phags pa'i
31b6(brgyad stong): chos gzhan zhig yod kyang de yang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o zhes smra'o/ / lnga'i bu dag de ltar na sgyum dang mya ngan las 'das pa 'di ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// de ltar na rmi lam dang mya
31b7(brgyad stong): ngan las 'das pa 'di ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang tshe dang ldan pa gang po byams ma'i bu dang tshe dang ldan pa lto rings chen po dang tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya
32a1(brgyad stong): @na chen po dang tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po dang nyan thos chen po gzhan dag gis byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag du ma dang thabs cig tu tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan rab 'byor la/ 'di skad ces smras so/
32a2(brgyad stong): / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar bstan pa 'di la su dag yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gnas brtan de
32a3(brgyad stong): dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ / tshe dang ldan pa dag phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sam/ lta ba phun sum tshogs pa'i gang zag rnams sam/ dgra bcom pa
32a4(brgyad stong): zag pa zad pa gang yin pa de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar bstan pa 'di la yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis gnas brtan de dag la 'di skad ces
32a5(brgyad stong): smras so/ / tshe dang ldan pa dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar bshad pa 'di la yang dag par 'dzin pa su yang mi 'byung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'di la chos gang yang ma smos
32a6(brgyad stong): chos gang yang yongs su snang bar ma byas/ chos gang yang ma bzhag go// de bas na ci ltar 'di la chos gang yang ma smos chos gang yang yongs su snang bar ma byas chos gang yang ma bzhag pa de bzhin du
32a7(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar bstan pa 'di la yang dag par 'dzin pa gang yang mi 'byung ngo / / de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ 'phags pa rab 'byor gyis de ltar
32b1(brgyad stong): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa la bdag gis kyang mchod pa'i don du 'di ltar me tog dag mngon par sprul te/ 'phags pa rab 'byor la mngon par gtor ro snyam mo// de ras lha rnams kyi dpa
32b2(brgyad stong): po brgya byin gyis de'i tshe me tog dag mngon par sprul nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la mngon par gtor to/ / de nas gnas brtan tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la rjes su
32b3(brgyad stong): brjod pa'i phyir 'di snyam du sems te/ yang 'di ltar lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis mngon par gtor ba'i me tog 'di dag ni bdag gis sngon chad sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lnga'i gnas na
32b4(brgyad stong): yang yod par ma mthong ste/ me tog 'di dag ni sprul pa'o// 'di ltar lha rnams kyi dbang pos mngon par gtor ba'i me tog 'di dag ni shing dang gel ba dang 'khri shing las skyes pa ma yin gyi yid
32b5(brgyad stong): las byung ba'i me tog go snyam pa dang / de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis shes nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so//
32b6(brgyad stong): 'phags pa rab 'byor me tog 'di dag ni ma skyes pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid las skyes pa'i me tog ni gang yang med de shing dang gel ba dang 'khri shing las skyes pa yang ma yin no// de nas
32b7(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/ / kau shi ka gang khyod 'di skad du me tog 'di dag ni ma skyes pa ste/ me tog 'di dag ni yid las skyes pa ma
33a1(brgyad stong): yin gyi/ shing dang gel ba dang 'khri shing las skyes pa yang ma yin no zhes zer na/ kau shi ka gang ma skyes pa de ni me tog ma yin no// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po
33a2(brgyad stong): brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ e ma'o 'phags pa rab 'byor ni shes rab zab ste ming dang tshig tu btags pa de yang ston la de dang 'gal bar yang mi byed/ de nyid kyang gsal bar byed cing de
33a3(brgyad stong): nyid kyang nye bar ston to snyam mo/ / de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa rab 'byor de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ 'phags
33a4(brgyad stong): pa rab 'byor ci skad du nye bar ston pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis 'di la bslab par bya'o/ / de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha
33a5(brgyad stong): rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/ / ko'u shi ka de de bzhin no de de bzhin te de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa 'di la bslab par bya'o// kau shi ka byang chub
33a6(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la mi slob bo/ / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la mi slob phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la mi slob dgra bcom
33a7(brgyad stong): pa nyid la mi slob bo/ / rang sangs rgyas nyid la mi slob/ sangs rgyas nyid la mi slob ste/ gang sa 'di dag la mi slob pa de ni sangs rgyas nyid dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob
33b1(brgyad stong): ngo/ / gang sangs rgyas nyid dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos gzhal du med grangs med pa la slob bo// gang sangs rgyas kyi chos gzhal du med grangs med pa
33b2(brgyad stong): la slob pa de ni gzugs 'phel bar bya ba dang / 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo// de bzhin du de tshor ba la ma yin 'du shes la ma yin 'du byed rnams la ma yin de rnam par shes pa 'phel bar
33b3(brgyad stong): bya ba dang 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo/ / gang gzugs 'phel bar bya ba dang / 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa dang gang tshor ba la ma yin 'du shes la ma yin 'du byed rnams la ma yin gang rnam
33b4(brgyad stong): par shes pa 'phel bar bya ba dang 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa de ni gzugs yongs su gzung ba dang dor bar bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo/ / de bzhin du de tshor ba la ma yin 'du shes la ma yin 'du byed
33b5(brgyad stong): rnams la ma yin de rnam par shes pa yongs su bzung ba dang dor bar bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo/ / chos 'ga' zhig yongs su gzung ba'i phyir yang mi slob ste/ skye ba'i phyir mi slob nub pa'i phyir mi slob
33b6(brgyad stong): ngo/ / gang chos 'ga' zhig yongs su gzung ba'i phyir mi slob cing skye ba'i phyir mi slob nub pa'i phyir mi slob pa de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yongs su gzung ba'i phyir mi slob cing skye ba'i phyir mi slob
33b7(brgyad stong): nub pa'i phyir mi slob ste/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob cing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas
34a1(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang chos 'ga' zhig yod
34a2(brgyad stong): su gzung ba'i phyir mi slob cing skye ba'i phyir mi slob nub pa'i phyir mi slob pa de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yongs su gzung ba'i phyir mi slob cing skye ba'i phyir mi slob nub pa'i phyir mi slob na/ tshe dang
34a3(brgyad stong): ldan pa rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob cing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ tshe dang ldan pa rab
34a4(brgyad stong): 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang chos 'ga' zhig yongs su gzung ba'i
34a5(brgyad stong): p hyir mi slob cing skye ba'i phyir mi slob nub pa'i phyir mi slob pa de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yongs su gzung ba'i phyir mi slob cing skye ba'i phyir mi slob nub pa'i phyir mi slob sangs rgyas kyi chos
34a6(brgyad stong): rnams kyang yongs su gzung ba'i phyir mi slob cing skye ba'i phyir mi slob nub pa'i phyir mi slob ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni thams
34a7(brgyad stong): cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob cing thams cad mkhyen po nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags
34b1(brgyad stong): pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang las btsal bar bya/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
34b2(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi le'u las btsal bar bya'o/ / de skad ces smras pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces
34b3(brgyad stong): smras so/ / 'phags pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar 'phags pa rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'chad pa gang yin pa 'di su'i mthur rig par bya 'di su'i byin gyi rlabs su rig par bya/ tshe dang
34b4(brgyad stong): ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/ kau shi ka tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'chad pa gang yin pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthur rig par bya/ 'di ni de bzhin
34b5(brgyad stong): gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs su rig par bya'o/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ko'u shi ka gang 'di skad du 'phags
34b6(brgyad stong): p a rab 'byor gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'chad pa gang yin pa 'di su'i mthur rig par bya 'di su'i byin gyi rlabs su rig par bya zhes zer ba ni kau shi ka bdag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
34b7(brgyad stong): ba 'chad pa gang yin pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthur rig par bya'o/ / 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs su rig par bya'o// kau shi ka gang yang 'di skad du byang chub sems
35a1(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang las btsal bar bya zhes zer ba ni/ ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi
35a2(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa gzugs las btsal bar mi bya/ gzugs las gzhan du yang btsal bar mi bya'o// de bzhin du tshor ba las ma yin 'du shes las ma yin/ 'du byed rnams las ma yin/
35a3(brgyad stong): rnam par shes pa las btsal bar mi bya rnam par shes pa las gzhan du yang btsal bar mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka 'di ltar gzugs ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ gzugs
35a4(brgyad stong): las gzhan na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ / de bzhin du tshor ba ma yin 'du shes ma yin 'du byed rnams ma yin/ rnam par shes pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin rnam par shes pa
35a5(brgyad stong): las gzhan na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ / de skad ces smras pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa rab
35a6(brgyad stong): 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa chen po'o// 'phags pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad ma med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
35a7(brgyad stong): 'phags pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 'phags pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas
35b1(brgyad stong): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ de de bzhin no ko'u shi ka de de bzhin te/ kau shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa chen po'o//
35b2(brgyad stong): kau shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad ma med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// kau shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// kau shi ka/
35b3(brgyad stong): 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs che ba'i phyir kau shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin
35b4(brgyad stong): pa chen po'o/ / de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa che ba'i phyir kau shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa chen po'o// gzugs tshad
35b5(brgyad stong): ma med pa'i phyir ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad ma med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa tshad ma med pa'i phyir
35b6(brgyad stong): kau sho ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad ma med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / gzugs tshad med pa'i phyir ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad med pa'i pha
35b7(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa'o/ / de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa tshad med pa'i phyir kau shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
36a1(brgyad stong): gzugs mtha' yas pa'i phyir ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dpa' du byed rnam
36a2(brgyad stong): dang rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / ko'u shi ka de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa chen po zhes bya bar mngon par
36a3(brgyad stong): chags par mi byed do/ / de bzhin du tshad ma med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du tshad med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba dang de bzhin du mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes bya bar mngon
36a4(brgyad stong): par chags par mi byed do/ / ko'u shi ka de lta bas na 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa chen po'o// 'di ni tshad ma med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 'di ni tshad med pa'i pha rol tu phyin
36a5(brgyad stong): pa'o/ / ko'u shi ka 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// ko'u shi ka dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
36a6(brgyad stong): ko'u shi ka sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// ko'u shi ka yang ci ltar na dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir 'di lta ste shes
36a7(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin zhe na/ ko'u shi ka 'di ltar chos thams cad kyi thog ma dang dbus dang tha ma mi dmigs te de bas na ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu
36b1(brgyad stong): phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ ko'u shi ka rnam grangs 'dis dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// ko'u shi/
36b2(brgyad stong): ka gzhan yang gang gi phyir 'di ltar chos thams cad mtha' yas mu med de/ de rnams kyi thog ma 'am dbus sam tha ma yang mi dmigs te/ de bas na ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni
36b3(brgyad stong): mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka gzugs kyi thog ma 'am dbus sam tha ma yang mi dmigs so// ko'u shi ka de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam
36b4(brgyad stong): par shes pa'i thog ma 'am dbus sam tha ma yang mi dmigs te/ ko'u shi ka rnam grangs 'dis kyang dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin
36b5(brgyad stong): pa'o/ / ko'u shi ka gzhan yang sems can mtha' yas mu med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can la thog ma 'am dbus sam tha ma yang mi dmigs so// ko'u shi ka de bas na sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir 'di lnga ste/
36b6(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa rab 'byor ji ltar na
36b7(brgyad stong): sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ko'u shi ka bgrang ba dang mi ldan pa 'am/
37a1(brgyad stong): bgrang ba mang pos sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin no// brgya byin gyis smras pa
37a2(brgyad stong): 'phags pa rab 'byor 'o na ci ltar sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya/ gnas brtan rab 'byor
37a3(brgyad stong): gyis smras pa/ ko'u shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/ 'di lta ste sems can sems can zhes bya ba 'di chos gang gi tshig bla dwags yin/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa rab 'byor
37a4(brgyad stong): 'di lta ste/ sems can sems can zhes bya ba 'di ni chos kyi tshig bla dgas kyang ma yin chos med pa'i tshig bla dgas kyang ma yin te ming du btags pa 'di ni glo bur du byung ba'o// ming du btags
37a5(brgyad stong): pa 'di ni dngos po med pa'o/ / ming du btags pa 'di ni bdag gi ba med pa'o// 'di lta ste/ sems can sems can zhes ming du btags pa 'di ni dmigs su med pa'o// gnas brtan
37a6(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ko'u shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems 'di la sems can du yongs su bstan par byas pa gang yang yod dam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin
37a7(brgyad stong): no/ / rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ko'u shi ka gang la sems can du yongs su bstan par byas pa 'ga' zhig med pa de la sems can mtha' yas pa yod dam/ ko'u shi ka gal te de bzhin gshegs pa
37b1(brgyad stong): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bskal pa gad+hA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du yang bzhugs te/ mtha' las 'das pa rnam par rig par byed pa'i dbyangs dang gsung dbyangs zab mos
37b2(brgyad stong): sems can sems can zhes tshig tu brjod du zin kyang de la sems can gang yang skyes pa 'am skye bar 'gyur ba'am skye ba 'am 'gag pa 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ba 'am 'gag pa yod dam/ brgya byin
37b3(brgyad stong): gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can thog ma nas dag pa'i phyir dang thog ma nas yongs su dag pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/
37b4(brgyad stong): ko'u shi ka rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// ko'u shi ka de ltar yang sems can mtha'
37b5(brgyad stong): yas pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas par rig par bya'o// de nas dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa dang /
37b6(brgyad stong): drang srong dang bcas pa dang / skyes pa dang bud med kyi tshogs dang bcas pa rnams kyis lan gsum du ched du brjod pa ched du brjod de/ e ma'o chos e ma'o chos e ma'o chos rnams kyi chos nyid de bzhin
37b7(brgyad stong): gshegs pa 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni 'phags pa gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis legs par smras pas brjod cing bstan te bshad la rab tu bzhag go/ / bcom ldan 'das deng slan chad bdag cag ni byang chub
38a1(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang ma bral ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
38a2(brgyad stong): pa'i gnas pa 'dis gnas pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs par lags par 'dzin to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang skye dgu'i bdag po dang
38a3(brgyad stong): bcas pa dang drang srong dang bcas pa dang skyes pa dang bud med kyi tshogs de rnams la bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ lha'i bu dag gang gi tshe rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor na mar me can zhes
38a4(brgyad stong): bya ba'i tshong dus kyi dbus su mar me mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi drung na nga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang ma bral bar gyur pas/ de'i tshe
38a5(brgyad stong): mar me mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ bram ze'i khye'u khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi bskal pa grangs med pa na shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de bzhin
38a6(brgyad stong): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang rkang par ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten rig pa skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams
38a7(brgyad stong): kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ro zhes nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu de dag gis 'di skad ces bcom ldan
38b1(brgyad stong): 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du sgrub par byed pa dang rjes su yongs su 'dzin par byed pa ngo mtshar to/ / bde bar
38b2(brgyad stong): gshegs pa shin tu ngo mtshar to zhes gsol to/ / 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las/ brgya byin gyi le'u zhes bya ste gnyis pa'o// // 'phags pa shes rab kyi
38b3(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa/ bam po gsum pa// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor der lha'i bu gang dag 'dus te 'khod par gyur pa dang dge slong dang dge slong ma
38b4(brgyad stong): dang dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor gang dag 'dus te 'khod par gyur pa dang / lha'i bu de rnams 'dus te 'khod par gyur par mkhyen cing 'khor bzhi po thams cad 'dus shing 'khod par yang mkhyen
38b5(brgyad stong): nas/ 'dod pa na spyod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang 'od gsal dang dge chung dang 'og min gyi lha'i bu rnams dbang du bzhag ste/ lha rnams kyi dbang po
38b6(brgyad stong): brgya byin la sogs pa 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang tshangs pa chen po la sogs pa tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang 'od gsal gyi lha'i bu rnams la bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs
38b7(brgyad stong): kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin tam 'chang ngam klog gam kun chub par byed dam rab tu 'don na/ de la bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha glags lta ba dang glags tshol ba dag gis
39a1(brgyad stong): glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de la mi'am mi ma yin pa glags lta ba dang glags tshol ba rnams kyis glags rnyed par yang mi 'gyur ro// rigs
39a2(brgyad stong): kyi bu bam rigs kyi bu mo de yang yang ba ma spangs par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ / lha'i bu dag gzhan yang lha'i bu gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa
39a3(brgyad stong): rnams dang lha'i bu gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ma bzung ba dang ma bcangs pa dang ma bklags pa dang kun chub par ma byas pa dang / rab tu mi 'dren pa'i lha'i bu de dag rigs kyi bu de'i drung
39a4(brgyad stong): du'ong 'dod par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa de la nyan par 'gyur te/ thos nas kyang 'dzin par
39a5(brgyad stong): 'gyur/ 'chang bar 'gyur klog par 'gyur kun chub par byed par 'gyur rab tu 'don par 'gyur ro// lha'i bu dag gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzir ba dang
39a6(brgyad stong): ' chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang rab tu 'don pa de dgon par song yang rung shing drung du song yang rung khyim stong du song yang rung bla gab med par song yang rung lam du song yang rung lam gol bar
39a7(brgyad stong): song yang rung 'brog dgon par song yang rung rgya mtsho chen por song yang rung de dang der 'gro ba'am 'chag pa'am/ 'dug pa 'am nyal ba na yang rung ste/ 'jigs par 'gyur ba'am rengs par 'gyur ba nyid
39b1(brgyad stong): mi 'byung mi skye'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang
39b2(brgyad stong): 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par bgyid pa dang / rab tu 'don par 'gyur ba de ni theg pa gsum gyis sems can rnams 'dul bar bgyid cing sems can gyi 'du shes kyang mi skyed pa ni ngo mtshar to// bcom
39b3(brgyad stong): l dan 'das bdag cag gis kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par bgyid pa dang rab tu 'don par 'gyur ba de la bsrung ba dang
39b4(brgyad stong): bskyab pa dang sba bar bgyi'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab
39b5(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par bgyid pa dang / rab tu 'don par 'gyur ba de dag la bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang sba bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das la tshangs pa mi
39b6(brgyad stong): mjed kyi bdag po tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang bcas pas kyang 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
39b7(brgyad stong): 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par bgyid pa dang / rab tu 'don par 'gyur ba de la bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang sba bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po
40a1(brgyad stong): brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang / klog pa
40a2(brgyad stong): dang kun chub par bgyid pa dang rab tu 'don pa de tshe 'di la yon tan 'di dag nges par 'thob cing yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba ngo mtshar to/ / bcom ldan 'das yang ci shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
40a3(brgyad stong): 'di bzung na pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad bzung bar 'gyur ram/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// koru
40a4(brgyad stong): shi ka de de bzhin nor de bzhin te/ ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzung bas pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad gzung bar 'gyur ro// ko chu shi ka gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
40a5(brgyad stong): phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang rab tu 'don par byed na ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo des tshe 'di la yon tan gang dag 'dzin par 'gyur ba de
40a6(brgyad stong): thams cad legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang ngas khyod la bshad do/ / bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis legs so zhes gsol nas/ lha rnams kyi dbang po
40a7(brgyad stong): brgya byin bcom ldan 'das kyi lhar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ko'u shi ka de la gang zhig chos 'di la rtsod par 'dod pa dang rgol bar 'dod pa dang 'gal
40b1(brgyad stong): bar byed 'dod na/ rtsod par 'dod pa dang rgol bar 'dod pa dang 'gal bar byed 'dod pa de dag gi rtsod pa dang rgol ba dang 'gal bar byed pa skyes shing skyes pa rnams slar nub pa nyid du 'gyur zhing
40b2(brgyad stong): gnas par mi 'gyur te/ rtsod par 'dod pa dang rgol bar 'dod pa dang 'gal bar byed 'dod pa de dag gi bsam pa de dag yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni
40b3(brgyad stong): 'di ltar 'gyur te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang / lung 'bogs pa dang /
40b4(brgyad stong): kha ton du byed pa de'i rtsod pa'i gzhi de ltar skyes shing skyes pa de dag slar yang nub pa nyid du 'gyur zhing gnas par mi 'gyur te/ rtsod par 'dod pa dang rgol bar 'dod pa dang /

41a1(brgyad stong): s kye bo sbrul gdug pa des zas kyi phyir bza' bar 'dod nas srog chags su gyur pa de'i dri'i phyogs su 'brang zhing bsnyags pa dang de nas srog chags su gyur pa rtsi ma g+hi gang na

41a3(brgyad stong): bar bya ste rtsi de ni de ltar mthu che'o/ / ko'u shi ka de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang rab tu

41a5(brgyad stong): p hyin pa'i gzi brjid dang stobs dang mthu dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs bskyed pas myur du de nyid nas med par 'gyur nye bar zhi zhing 'phel bar mi 'gyur te de gang dang gang nas byung ba de dang de nyid
41a6(brgyad stong): nas 'gag cing nub par 'gyur la gnas par mi 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa nas mya ngan las 'das pa nyid kyi bar du 'dzin pa dag
41a7(brgyad stong): nye bar zhi bar byed de rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no/ / ko'u shi ka rgyal po chen po bzhi dang lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams

45b7(brgyad stong): b u mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri ba na glegs bam du chud pa 'di la bkur stir byed bla mar byed rjed par byed mchod par byed ri mor byed bsnyen bkur byed mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag
46a1(brgyad stong): byed na'ang nyid de las bsod nams ches mang du skyed do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa byed pa des thams cad mkhyen pa'i s
46a2(brgyad stong): hes la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/ / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu'i gling
46a3(brgyad stong): 'di'i mi gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri bar mi bgyid 'dzin par mi bgyid 'chang bar mi bgyid klog par mi bgyid/ kun chub par mi bgyid rab tu 'don par mi bgyid ston par mi bgyid
46a4(brgyad stong): nye bar ston par mi bgyid lung 'bogs par mi bgyid kha ton du mi bgyid/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la me tog dang bdug pa dang dri dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang gdugs dang rgyal
46a5(brgyad stong): mtshan dang dril bu dang ba dan ngag dang khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dag dang mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis mchod par mi bgyid de/ bkur stir mi bgyi da bla mar mi bgyid rjed par mi bgyid mchod par mi bgyid
46a6(brgyad stong): ri mor mi bgyid bsnyen bkur mi bgyid pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das ci bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa bgyid pa de ltar don chen po can du ma 'tshal lags sam/ /
46a7(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das ci bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mchod pa bgyis pa de ltar phan yon chen po dang ldan par rtogs par ma gyur lags sam/ de ltar 'bras bu che ba
46b1(brgyad stong): dang rnam par smin pa che bar nges rig par ma gyur lags sam/ 'on te 'tshal cing rtogs la rig kyang slar zhing dad par ma gyur pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha
46b2(brgyad stong): rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / ko'u shi ka 'di ci snyam du sems 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi de dag las gang dag sangs rgyas la rtogs nas dad pa dang ldan pa dang gang dag chos la
46b3(brgyad stong): rtogs nas dad pa dang ldan pa dang gang dag dge 'dun la rtogs nas dad pa dang ldan pa ci snyed cig yod/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di
46b4(brgyad stong): skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi de dag las gang dag sangs rgyas la rtogs nas dang ba dang ldan pa dang gang dag chos la rtogs nas ngad pa dang ldan pa dang / gang dag dge
46b5(brgyad stong): 'dun la rtogs nas dad pa dang ldan pa de lta bu ni nyung ngo / / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ko'u shi ka de de bzhin
46b6(brgyad stong): no de de bzhin te/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi ma de dag las gang dag sangs rgyas la rtogs nas dad pa dang ldan pa dang gang dag chos la rtogs nas dad pa dang ldan pa dang gang dag dge 'dun la rtogs nas dad pa dang ldan pa
46b7(brgyad stong): de lta bu ni nyung ngo / / ko'u shi ka gang dag rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob pa ni nyung ba de dag pas kyang ches nyung ngo // gang dag lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob pa ni nyung
47a1(brgyad stong): pa de dag pas kyang ches nyung ngo / / gang dag dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa ni nyung ba de dag pas kyang ches nyung ngo // gang dag rang byang chub mngon du byed pa ni nyung ba de dag pas
47a2(brgyad stong): kyang ches nyung ngo / / gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de ni nyung ba de dag pas kyang ches nyung ngo // gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
47a3(brgyad stong): tu sems bskyed nas sems bskyed pa de rab tu rgyas par byed pa de ni nyung ba de dag pas kyang ches nyung ngo / / gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de sems bskyed
47a4(brgyad stong): pab rgyas par byas na brtson 'grus brtsams shing gnas pa de ni nyung ba de dag pas kyang ches nyung ngo / / gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed pa de ni nyung ba de dag pas kyang ches nyung ngo //
47a5(brgyad stong): gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni nyung ba de dag pas kyang ches nyung ngo // gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing 'bad de phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas
47a6(brgyad stong): pa ni nyung ba de dag pas kyang ches nyung ngo / / gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing 'bad de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba ni nyung ba de
47a7(brgyad stong): dag pas kyang ches nyung ngo / / gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing 'bad de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de dag ni nyung ba de dag pas kyang ches nyung
47b1(brgyad stong): ngo / / ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
47b2(brgyad stong): rgyas nas/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob cing 'bad pa gzhan rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nye bar ston cing lung 'bogs
47b3(brgyad stong): p a dang de dag la yang 'dzin du 'jug pa dang 'chang du 'jug pa dang klog tu 'jug pa dang kun chub par byed du 'jug pa dang rab tu 'don du 'jug pa dang ston du 'jug pa dang nye bar ston du 'jug pa dang lung 'bogs su
47b4(brgyad stong): 'jug pa dang / kha ton byed du 'jug pa de dang de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la lha'i me tog dang lha'i bdug pa dang lha'i dri dang lha'i phreng ba dang lha'i byug pa dang lha'i phye ma dang lha'i na bza' dang
47b5(brgyad stong): lha'i gdugs dang lha'i rgyal mtshan dang lha'i dril bu dang lha'i ba dan ngag dang khor yug tu lnga'i mar me'i phreng ba dag dang lnga'i mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis mchod par byed de/ bkur stir byed bla mar byed rjed
47b6(brgyad stong): par byed mchod par byed ri mor byed bsnyen bkur byed pa dag yin no/ / ko'u shi ka yang gang dag byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa dang byang chub kyi sems bskyed nas byang chub kyi sems rgyas par byed cing byang chub kyi
47b7(brgyad stong): sems rab tu rgyas par byas te byang chub tu spyod pa'i sems can dag ni gzhal du med pa grangs med par yod mod kyi/ ko'u shi ka yang sems can gzhal du med pa grangs med pa byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa de dag
47'a1(brgyad stong): las gal te na gcig gam gnyis shig phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
47'a2(brgyad stong): byang chub ni brtson 'grus zhan pa dang le lo can dang sems pa dman pa dang sems dman pa dang 'du shes dman pa dang mos pa dman pa dang shes rab dman pa rnams kyis bsgrub par dka'o/ / ko'u shi ka de bas
47'a3(brgyad stong): n a de ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang myur du bde bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas rgyun mi 'chad par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
47'a4(brgyad stong): 'di nyid mnyan par bya'o/ / gzung bar bya'o bcang bar bya'o bklag par bya'o kun chub par bya'o rab tu 'dor bar bya'o bstan par bya'o nye bar bstan par bya'o// lung 'bogs par bya'o// kha ton
47'a5(brgyad stong): du bya'o yongs su bri bar bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
47'a6(brgyad stong): sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs pas/ bdag cag gis kyang 'di la bslab par bya ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni
47'a7(brgyad stong): bdag cag gi ston pa'o zhes shes te/ ko'u shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs kyang rung yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang rung ste/ byang chub sems
47'b1(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten par bya'o/ / ko'u shi ka de bas na de ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
47'b2(brgyad stong): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa mchod pa'i phyir rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi mchod rten de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po can bye ba du ma byed du bcug ste/ byas nas kyang des de la nam 'tsho ba'i bar du lha'i me tog dang /

50b4(brgyad stong): c hung ngun glegs bam du rung bar byas te 'chang ngam bzhag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la me tog dang bdug pa dang dri dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang ra bza' dang gdug sa dang rgyal mtshan dang dril
50b5(brgyad stong): bu dang ba dan ngag dang kho ra yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dag dang mchod pa rnam pa rnam pa mang po dag gis mchod par byed de/ bkur stir byed bla mar byed rjed par byed mchod par byed ri mor byed bsnyen bkur byed na

50b7(brgyad stong): s tong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad las sems can re res rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi mchod rten de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi

56b7(brgyad stong): ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rig sngags so/ / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ko'u shi ka de de bzhin nod de bzhin te/ ke'u
57a1(brgyad stong): shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rig sngags chen mo'o/ / ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad ma med pa'i rig sngags so// ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab
57a2(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad med pa'i rig sngags so/ / ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gong na med pa'i rig sngags so// ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bla na med pa'i
57a3(brgyad stong): rig sngags so/ / ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mnyam pa med pa'i rig sngags so// ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rig sngags so//
57a4(brgyad stong): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rig sngags 'di la brten nas sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
57a5(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ / ko ru shi ka ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
57a6(brgyad stong): c hub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba ci snyed pa de snyed kyang ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rig sngags 'di nyid la brten nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
57a7(brgyad stong): par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ / ko'u shi ka de ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal du med grangs med pa na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang su dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
57b1(brgyad stong): par rdzogs par sangs rgya ba de dag kyang ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rig sngags 'di nyid la brten nas blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgya'o/ / ko chu shrIka
57b2(brgyad stong): nga yang 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rig sngags 'di nyid la brten nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// ko'u shi ka rig sngags 'di nyid la brten
57b3(brgyad stong): nas dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams kyang 'jig rten du rab tu 'byed do/ / byang chub kyi yan lag dang ldan pa'i bsam gtan bzhi 'jig rten du rab tu 'byed do// byang chub kyi yan lag dang ldan pa'i tshad med pa
57b4(brgyad stong): bzhi 'jig rten du rab tu 'byed do/ / byang chub kyi yan lag dang ldan pa'i gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'jig rten du rab tu 'byed do// byang chub kyi yan lag dang ldan pa'i mngon par shes pa drug rnams
57b5(brgyad stong): 'jig rten du rab tu 'byed do/ / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yang 'jig rten du rab tu 'byed do// mdor na chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong yang 'jig rten du rab tu 'byed do// sangs rgyas kyi ye shes
57b6(brgyad stong): dang rang byung gi ye shes dang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes kyang 'jig rten du rab tu 'byed do/ / // 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa/ bam po bzhi pa
57b7(brgyad stong): k o'u shi ka gang gi tshe yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du mi 'byung bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe yang ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rig sngags 'di
58a1(brgyad stong): nyid la brten nas koru shig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyamathun pa sngon thos pas thabs mkhas pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / ko'u shig
58a2(brgyad stong): sems can rnams la rjes su brtse ba dang ldan pa de dag kyang rjes su brtse ba'i phyir 'jig rten 'di la brten te dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'jig rten du rab tu 'byed do/ / byang chub kyi yan lag dang mi ldan pa'i bsam
58a3(brgyad stong): gtan bzhi 'jig rten du rab tu 'byed do/ / byang chub kyi yan lag dang mi ldan pa'i tshad med pa bzhi 'jig rten du rab tu 'byed do// byang chub kyi yan lag dang mi ldan pa'i gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'jig
58a4(brgyad stong): rten du rab tu 'byed do/ / byang chub kyi yan lag dang mi ldan pa'i mngon par shes pa lnga rnams 'jig rten du rab tu 'byed do// ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste dper na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la brten nas sman dang skar ma thams cad
58a5(brgyad stong): stobs ci lta ba dang mthu ci lta bar kun tu snang bar byed/ rgyu skar rnams kyang stobs ci lta ba dang mthu ci lta ba bzhin du snang bar byed do// ko'u shi ka de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
58a6(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas 'das nas dam pa'i chos 'jig par gyur pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du ma byung ba na/ la la chos spyod pa dang mtshungs par spyod pa dang
58a7(brgyad stong): zhi bar spyod pa dang dge bar spyod pa gang dag 'jig rten na rab tu 'dogs pa dang rab tu sgom pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' las skyes shinga'i byang chub sems dpas rab tu phye ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
58b1(brgyad stong): thabs mkhas pa las 'jug la/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las skyes par rig par bya'o// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
58b2(brgyad stong): phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton byed pa dang yi ger 'dri ba dang / yid la byed pa dang
58b3(brgyad stong): dran par byed pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo rnams de'i gzhi las tshe 'di la yon tan mang po rnams re bar bya'o/ / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das
58b4(brgyad stong): la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag kyang tshe 'di'i yon tan gang dag dang ldan par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi
58b5(brgyad stong): bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni yang ba ma spangs pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ dug gis 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ mtshon gyis 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ mes 'chi ba'i dus byed
58b6(brgyad stong): par mi 'gyur/ chus 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ dbyug pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ pha rol gyi gnod pa byed pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ de dag la rgyal po 'am rgyal po'i bu
58b7(brgyad stong): 'am rgyal po'i blon po chen po 'am rgyal po'i blon po dag gis gnod pa byung zhing skyes na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dran zhing kha ton du byed pa dag la phyir mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ / shes rab kyi pha
59a1(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa 'di yang dang yang dran zhing kha ton byed pa de dag la rgyal po 'am rgyal po'i bu 'am rgyal po'i blon po chen po 'am rgyal po'i blon po der glags lta ba dang / glags tshol ba/
59a2(brgyad stong): gang dag nye bar 'ongs par gyur na de dag gis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur te/ 'di ltar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bzung ba'i phyir ro// der rgyal po 'am rgyal po'i bu 'am rgyal po'i blon po
59a3(brgyad stong): chen po 'am rgyal po'i blon po dag nye bar 'ongs na yang de dag smra bar 'dod cing gtam zer bar 'dod de yang dag par dga' bar bya'o snyam du sems par 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka shes rab
59a4(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sems can thams cad kyi drung na byams pa'i sems kyis byams pa nye bar bsgrub pa dang snying rje'i sems kyis snying rje nye bar bsgrub pas nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/ / ko'u shi ka de
59a5(brgyad stong): n yid kyi phyir na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang yang gdug pa dang sdig sbrul mang po'i dgon pa'i nang du song ba de dag la mi 'am mi ma yin pa glags lta ba dang glagla tshol ba de dag gis kyang ko'u shi ka de dag la sngon
59a6(brgyad stong): kyigyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ma gtogs par glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/ / de nas mu stegs can gzhan kun tu rgyu brgya klan ka tshol ba'i bsam pas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der 'ongs par gyur to//
59a7(brgyad stong): de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis mu stegs can gzhan kun tu rgyu de dag rgyang nas 'ong ba mthong nas de dag gi sems la kun tu brtags te/ 'di snyam du mu stegs can gzhan kun tu rgyu 'di dag klan ka
59b1(brgyad stong): tshol ba'i bsam pas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der 'ongs kyis/ bdag gis ci nas kyang mu stegs can gzhan kun tu rgyu de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du nye bar mi 'ong bar bya ba'i phyir/ bdag gis
59b2(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i phyogs cha ji snyed cig bzung ba de tsam zhig bdag gis dran pas bsam par bya kha ton du bya rab tu gdon par bya ste/ de ltar byas
59b3(brgyad stong): pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bshad pa la bar chad du mi 'gyur ro zhes bsams so/ / de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas shes rab kyi pha
59b4(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa 'di'i phyogs tshe ji snyed cig des bzung ba de snyed tsam zhig dran pas bsams te kha ton du byas shing rab tu gdon par gyur to/ / de nas mu stegs can gzhan kun tu rgyu de dag rgyang ring ba bas
59b5(brgyad stong): kyang ches ring ba nas bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba byas te sgo de nyid dang lam de nyid nas phyir log ste dong ngo / / de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di snyam du sems te 'dir ci'i phyir 'di ltar mu stegs
59b6(brgyad stong): can gzhan kun tu rgyu de dag rgyang ring ba bas kyang ches ring ba nas bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba byas te sgo de nyid dang lam de nyid nas slar dong snyam mo/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
59b7(brgyad stong): bu'i de lta bu'i sems kyi rtog pa thugs kyi mkhyen nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / shA ri'i bu lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis mu stegs can gzhan kun tu rgyu klan ka
60a1(brgyad stong): t shol ba'i bsam pa can de dag gi sems ngag mthong nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'chang pa la bar chad byed par gyur na mi rung ngo snyam zhing ci nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
60a2(brgyad stong): 'chang bar mu stegs can gzhan kun tu rgyu de dag 'ong bar ma gyur cig snyam pas/ mu stegs can gzhan kun tu rgyu rtsod par 'dod pa dang rgol bar 'dod pa dang 'gal bar byed par 'dod pa rnams bzlog pa'i don
60a3(brgyad stong): du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dran pas yid la bsams te kha ton du byas shing rab tu bton te lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi ltar ngas kyang gnang ngo / / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu mu stegs
60a4(brgyad stong): can gzhan kun tu rgyu de dag gcig la yang chos dkar po yod par ngas ma mthong ste/ shA ri'i bu de dag thams cad ni kla na ka tshol ba'i bsam pa dang / zhe 'gras pa'i sems kyi sa 'ong 'dod par gyur to//
60a5(brgyad stong): de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'khor bzhi po 'di dag tshegs shing 'khod de de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon du gyur cing
60a6(brgyad stong): ' dod pa na spyod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu 'di dag kyang mngon du gyur pa lags na 'dir ni nges par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston
60a7(brgyad stong): par 'gyur gyis mig gis mi rtsol bar bya ba'i phyir bdag nye bar 'gro'o snyam mo/ / de nas bdud sdig can gyis yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung gi cho gas mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der nye bar
60b1(brgyad stong): 'ongs so/ / de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te kye ma'o 'di dag ni bdud sdig can yin te yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung gi tshogs mngon par sprul nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der 'ongs pa
60b2(brgyad stong): yin gyi yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung gi tshogs kyi bkod pa gang yin pa 'di ni rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung gi tshogs kyi bkod pa yang ma yin/ rgyal po gas la rgyal gyi yan lag bzhi
60b3(brgyad stong): papa'i dpung gi tshogs kyi bkod pa yang ma yin no/ / shAkya rnams kyi yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung gi tshogs kyi bkod pa yang ma yin no// lits+tsha bI rnams kyi yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung gi tshogs kyi bkod pa yang ma yin gyi/
60b4(brgyad stong): 'di ni bdud sdig can gyis mngon par sprul pa yin te/ bdud sdig can ni yun ring po nas bcom ldan 'das la glags lta ba dang glags tshol ba dang sems can rnams la gnod pa'i bsam pa dang rjes su 'brel ba
60b5(brgyad stong): yin no/ / de bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dran pas bsam par bya kha ton du bya rab tu gdon par bya'o snyam mo// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
60b6(brgyad stong): nyid dran pas bsams shing kha ton du byas te rab tu bton par gyur to/ / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis ci lta ci ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dran pas bsams shing kha ton du byas te rab tu bton
60b7(brgyad stong): pa de lta de ltar bdud sdig can sgo de nyid dang lam de nyid nas slar log ste song bar gyur to/ / de nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis lha'i me tog man+dA ra ba dag mngon par sprul te bar snang gi
61a1(brgyad stong): nam mkha' la 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lha'i me tog man+dA ra ba de dag mngon par rab tu gtor te/ 'di skad du kye ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni yun ring mo zhig na
61a2(brgyad stong): 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyi nang du byung nge zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod nas/ yang lha'i me tog rnams bzung nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der mngon par gtor mngon par rab tu gtor te 'di skad ces gsol
61a3(brgyad stong): to/ / bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'chad pa dang sgom pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de dag la ni bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis glags rnyed par
61a4(brgyad stong): mi 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mnyan pa dang thos nas 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par bgyid pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung
61a5(brgyad stong): 'bogs pa dang kha ton du bgyid pa'i sems can de dag ni ngan ngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gang dag gi rna lam du grag par gyur pa'i sems
61a6(brgyad stong): can de dag gis kyang sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams la bgyi ba bgyis pa lags na/ gang 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par bgyid pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs
61a7(brgyad stong): pa dang kha ton bgyid pa dang de bzhin nyid du slob pa dang de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa dang / de bzhin nyid du rnal 'byor du bgyid pa lta ci smos te/ bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs
61b1(brgyad stong): pa la bsnyen bkur bgyis pa lags so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rab tu 'byed cing 'di las thams cad mkhyen pa nyid btsal bar bgyi'o//
61b2(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na rin po che dang rin po che chen po gang yang rung ba de dag thams cad ni rgya mtsho chen pos rab tu phye ba lags/ de dag thams cad ni rgya mtsho chen po las btsal bar bgyi ba lags so//
61b3(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ring po che chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgya mtsho chen po las btsal bar
61b4(brgyad stong): bgyi'o/ / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ko'u shi ka de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
61b5(brgyad stong): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rin po che chen po ni 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgya mtsho chen po 'di las skyes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang
61b6(brgyad stong): ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bsngags pa mi gsung zhing ming yongs su mi sgrogs/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma lags/
61b7(brgyad stong): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma lags/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bsngags pa mi gsung zhing ming yongs su mi sgrogs kyi
62a1(brgyad stong): 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gcig pu nyid kyi bsngags pa yongs su gsung ba dang ming yongs su sgrogs par mdzad do/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
62a2(brgyad stong): stsal pa/ de de bzhin no kun dga' bo de de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo nga ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kho na'i bsngags pa smra ba dang ming yongs su sgrogs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzhan gyi ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe
62a3(brgyad stong): na/ / kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po rnams kyi sngon du 'gro ba ste des na pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming 'thob bo// kun dga' bo de ci snyam du sems thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
62a4(brgyad stong): yongs su ma bsngos pa'i sbyin pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i ming 'thob par 'gyur ram/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
62a5(brgyad stong): bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de ci snyam du sems/ de bzhin du yongs su ma bsngos pa'i tshul khrims dang yongs su ma bsngos pa'i bzod pa dang / yongs su ma bsngos pa'i brtson 'grus dang
62a6(brgyad stong): yongs su ma bsngos pa'i bsam gtan rnams dang / kun dga' bo 'di ci snyam du sems/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su ma bsngos pa'i shes rab kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i ming
62a7(brgyad stong): 'thob par 'gyur ram/ kun dga' bos gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo 'di ci snyam du sems dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams
62b1(brgyad stong): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pas yongs su sngo bar byed pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin nam/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin te/ bcom
62b2(brgyad stong): ldan 'das dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bas yongs su sngo bar byed pa'i shes rab gang lags pa de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das de ni mchog tu bsam gyis
62b3(brgyad stong): mi khyab bo/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de lta bas na de ltar dam pa yin pa'i phyir de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i ming 'thob par 'gyur te/ gang gis
62b4(brgyad stong): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa rnams pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming 'thob bo/ / kun dga' bo de lta bas na dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos
62b5(brgyad stong): pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa lnga'i sngon du 'gro zhing 'dren pa yongs su 'dren pa'o/ / tshul 'dis pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kho na'i nang du 'dus
62b6(brgyad stong): so/ / kun dga' bo 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa'i tshig bla dgas so// kun dga' bo de lta bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
62b7(brgyad stong): phyin pa yongs su bsgrags na pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su bsgrags par 'gyur ro/ / kun dga' bo 'di lta ste dper na sa chen po la sa bon btab pa tshogs pa dang phrad na skye bar 'gyur te/
63a1(brgyad stong): sa chen po ni sa bon de dag gi gzhi yin pas sa chen po la brten nas sa bon de dag skye bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
63a2(brgyad stong): phyin pas yang dag par bzung bas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten pa yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten nas pha rol tu phyin pa lnga skye bar 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
63a3(brgyad stong): pas yongs su bzung ba'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i ming 'thob par 'gyur ro/ / kun dga' bo de lta bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid pha rol tu phyin pa lnga'i sngon du 'gro zhing
63a4(brgyad stong): 'dren pa yongs su 'dren pa'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das re zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzung
63a5(brgyad stong): zhing bcangs pa dang bklags pa dang kun chub par bgyis pa dang / rab tu bton pa dang bstan pa dang nye bar bstan pa dang lung phog pa dang kha tor du bgyis pas rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos yon tan gang
63a6(brgyad stong): n gag yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan 'di dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa yongs su bsgrags pa ni ma
63a7(brgyad stong): lags te/ 'on kyang gang zhig bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i phyogs gcig bzung zhing rab tu bton pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
63b1(brgyad stong): stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka legs so legs so// ko'u shi ka yang gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa
63b2(brgyad stong): dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton byed pa de dag nyid 'ba' zhig la yon tan 'di dag 'byung ba 'ba' zhig tu ni ma zad kyi/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis yang sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun chang
63b3(brgyad stong): par ma gyur cig dam pa'i chos nub par ma gyur cig ces dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang / tshul dang ma bral bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la phan gdags pa bsgrub pa
63b4(brgyad stong): byas par 'gyur bar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris nas glegs bam du chud par byas te 'chang ngam bzhag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la me tog dang bdug pa dang dri dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye
63b5(brgyad stong): ma dang na bza' dang / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang dril bu dang ba dan dag dang khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dag dang mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis mchod par byed de/ bkur stir byed bla mar byed rjed par
63b6(brgyad stong): byed mchod par byed ri mor byed bsnyen bkur byed na/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i yang tshe 'di nyid kyi yon tan ngas bshad pa yin no// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom
63b7(brgyad stong): ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gang zhig sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun chad par ma gyur cig dam pa'i chos nub par ma gyur cig/
64a1(brgyad stong): ces dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba dang / tshul dang ma bral bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la phan gdags pa bsgrub pa bgyis par 'gyur bar shes rab
64a2(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris nas glegs bam du chud par bgyis te 'chang ngam bzhag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la me tog dang ba dug pa dang dri dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang gdugs dang rgyal
64a3(brgyad stong): mtshan dang dril bu dang ba dan dag dang kho ra yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dag dang mchod pa rnam pa mang po ngag gis mchod par bgyid de/ bkur stir bgyid bla mar bgyid rjed par bgyid mchod par bgyid ri mor bgyi bsnyen
64a4(brgyad stong): bkur bgyid pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang sba ba bgyid par 'gyur na/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri ba dang 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub
64a5(brgyad stong): p ar bgyid pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton du bgyid pa dang me tog dang bdug pa dang dri dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang
64a6(brgyad stong): dril bu dang ba dan ngag dang khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dag dang mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis kyang mchod par bgyid de/ bkur stir bgyid bla mar bgyid rjed par bgyid mchod par bgyid ri mor bgyid bsnyen bku
64a7(brgyad stong): bgyid pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka legs so legs so// ko'u shi ka yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di kha ton du
64b1(brgyad stong): byed pa na de nyid du lha'i bu brgya phrag mang po 'ong bar 'gyur/ lha'i bu stong phrag mang po dang lha'i bu brgya stong phrag mang po rnams chos nyan pa'i phyir nye bar 'ong bar 'gyur ro// lha'i bu de dag chos nyan pa na chos smra ba
64b2(brgyad stong): de'i spobs pa nye bar sgrub bo snyam du sems par 'gyur ro/ / gang gi tshe yang chos smra ba de mi smra bar 'dod par gyur pa de'i tshe yang lha'i bu de dag gis chos la gus pa de nyid kyis rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ji ltar

64b6(brgyad stong): ltar de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang sba ba byed de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa des ni klan ka tshol ba yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / / shes rab kyi pha rol
64b7(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa la gnas pas ni klan ka tshol bar byed pa yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / / gang la klan ka btsal bar bya ba de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yang yang

68b6(brgyad stong): pa'i slad du der mchis pa ra ci ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ko'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu
68b7(brgyad stong): ' am rigs kyi bu mo sa der snang ba chen po dag mthong na de la 'dir nges par lha 'am klu'am gnod sbyin nam dri za 'am lha ma yin na ma nam mkha' lding ngam mi 'am ci 'am lto 'phye chen po 'am mi 'am mi ma yin pa dag
69a1(brgyad stong): 'ongs shing lhags pa yin no zhes rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des shes par bya'o/ / ko'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo des mi ma yin pa'i dri sngon chad ma
69a2(brgyad stong): bsnams pa bro bar gyur na/ dri de tsher nas de la 'dir nges par lha 'am klu 'am gnod sbyin nam dri za'am lha ma yin nam nam mkha' lding ngam mi 'am ci 'am lho 'phye chen po 'am mi 'am mi ma yin pa 'ongs shing
69a3(brgyad stong): lhags pa yin no zhes rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des shes par bya'o/ / ko'u shi ka gzhan yang gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de kun tu spyod pa gzod par 'gyur kun tu spyod pa gtsang bar
69a4(brgyad stong): 'gyur te/ de kun tu spyod pa gzob pa dang kun tu spyod pa gtsang ba des lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang mi dang mi ma yin pa dag der
69a5(brgyad stong): 'ong bar sems so/ / der lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang mi dang mi ma yin pa gang dag der 'ongs par gyur pa de dag kun tu spyod
69a6(brgyad stong): pa gzob pa dang kun tu spyod pa gtsang ba des yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ste mgu ba dang yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas gzi brjid chung ba gzi brjid chung ba'i lha gang dag gnas pa de dag kyang de nas 'byol
69a7(brgyad stong): bar sems so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang mi dang mi ma yin pa gzi brjid chen po gzi brjid chen po de dag nyid
69b1(brgyad stong): kyi dpal dang gzi brjid dang btsun pa mi bzod pas/ de ltar lha gzi brjid chung ba gzi brjid chung ba de dag kyang 'byol bar sems so// ko'u shi ka yang ci lta ci ltar lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang
69b2(brgyad stong): nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang mi dang mi ma yin pa gzi brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba de dag rtag tu 'ong bar sems pa de lta de ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de yang dad pa mang bar 'gyur te/ ko'u
69b3(brgyad stong): shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des tshe 'di la yon tan 'di dag kyang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ / ko'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des de la bla mar bya ba dang gus par bya ba dang yongs
69b4(brgyad stong): su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi tshul gyi gnas de'i khor yug tu mi gtsang ba dang mi gzob pa'i kun du spyod pa la 'jug par mi bya'o/ / ko'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de lus ngal ba dang
69b5(brgyad stong): sems ngal bar mi 'gyur/ de bde bar nyal bar byed par 'gyur/ bde bar 'gro bar 'gyur/ gnyid kyis log na yang sdig pa'i rmi lam mthong bar mi 'gyur/ mthong na yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
69b6(brgyad stong): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams nyid mthong bar 'gyur mchod rten rnams nyid mthong bar 'gyur byang chub sems dpa' rnams nyid mthong bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams nyid mthong
69b7(brgyad stong): bar 'gyur/ sgra thos na yang pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgra ngag nyid thos par 'gyur byang chub kyi phyogs nyid kyi chos rnams thos par 'gyur/ byang chub kyi shing dag nyid mthong bar 'gyur/ de dag tu yang de bzhin gshes
70a1(brgyad stong): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dag nyid mthong bar 'gyur/ de bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa rnams chos kyi
70a2(brgyad stong): 'khor lo bskor ba mthong bar 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bgro ba la dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mang po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid bgro bar byed pa dang
70a3(brgyad stong): 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su gzung bar bya 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ / zhes thabs mkhas pa nye bar ston pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
70a4(brgyad stong): mngon par byang chub pa'i sgra rgya chen po yang thos par 'gyur ro/ / phyogs ga ge mo zhig dang phyogs kyi cha ga ge mo zhig dang 'jig rten gyi khams ga ge mo zhig na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
70a5(brgyad stong): r dzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge mo zhes bya ba de nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa' mang po dang nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa' brgya phrag mang po dang nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag mang po dang nyan
70a6(brgyad stong): t hos dang byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong phrag mang po dang nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag mang po dang nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya phrag mang po dang nyan thos dang byang chub sems
70a7(brgyad stong): dpa' bye ba stong phrag mang po dang / nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya stong phrag mang po dang nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang pos yongs su bskor cing mdun
70b1(brgyad stong): du byas te chos ston to zhes sangs rgyas kyi sgra rlabs po che yang thos par 'gyur ro/ / ko'u shi ka yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des de lta bu'i tshul gyi rmi lam 'di dag mthong bar 'gyur te/ de bde

70b4(brgyad stong): ba drag po mi 'byung zhing zas la 'du shes chung bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la yang kha zas la brkam pa drag po mi 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de zas kyi 'du shes chung

71a1(brgyad stong): k log par mi byed kun chub par mi byed rab tu 'don par mi byed ston par mi byed nye bar ston par mi byed lung 'bogs par mi byed kha ton du mi byed pa de bas ni ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am

71a4(brgyad stong): yang dag par ston pa dang de'i don rnam par 'grel pa dang yid kyis rjes su rtog pa dang ci lta bur grub pa'i shes rab kyis 'dir yongs su dpyod par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun chad par ma gyur

71b1(brgyad stong): bar byed ri mor byed bsnyen bkur byed na/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de nyid de bas gzhi de las bsod nams ches mang du skyed par 'gyur te/ ko'u shi ka de lta bas na 'di ltar tshe 'di la yon tan

71b7(brgyad stong): d ang sems can dge ba gzhan dag la sangs rgyas kyi tshul spyan chen po dang ma bral bar 'gyur ro zhes de la lha'i me tog dang lha'i bdug pa dang lha'i dri dang lha'i phreng ba dang lha'i byug pa dang lha'i phye ma dang lha'i na

72b7(brgyad stong): ston pa zhes bya ba yin no snyam mo/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du dbang che bar grags pa rgyu dang rkyen du gyur pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
