136b6(brgyad stong): phyin pa 'di la ston par 'du shes skyed do/ / bdag gi ston pa mngon sum du gyur te bdag gi smon pa mthong ngo snyam du sems bskyed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'chang
136b7(brgyad stong): pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa la rna ba blags nas gus par nyan te gtam gyi bar chad mi byed do/ / shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de
137a1(brgyad stong): yun ring por spyad cing tshul bsrungs pa de lta bu'i rang bzhin du rig par bya'o/ / shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni sangs rgyas mang po la
137a2(brgyad stong): bsnyen bkur byas pa de lta bu'i tshul du rig par bya'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das yang shes rab kyi
137a3(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mnyan pa'am rtogs pa'am bsam pa'am bskyed pa'am nye bar bzung bar nus sam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni 'di'o zhe 'am shes rab kyi pha rol tu
137a4(brgyad stong): phyin pa de 'di la'o zhe'am shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni ga ge mo zhig na'o zhes sam/ rnam pa dang rtags dang mtshan ma 'dis so zhes kyang bstan pa 'am mnyan par nus sam/
137a5(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin te rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni phung po 'am khams sam skye mched du bstan pa 'am mnyan pa 'am rtog
137a6(brgyad stong): pa'am bsam pa'am bskyed pa'am nye bar gzung bar mi nus so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad dben pa nyid dang chos thams cad shin tu dben pa nyid yin pa'i phyir
137a7(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bstan pa'am mnyan pa'am rtogs pa 'am bsam pa'am bskyed pa'am nye bar gzung bar mi nus so/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni phung po dang khoms
137b1(brgyad stong): dang skye mched las gzhan na yang med par rig par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor phung po dang khams dang skye mched nyid stong ba dben pa zhi bas so// de ltar na shes rab kyi
137b2(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa dang phung po dang khams dang skye mched 'di ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ / stong pa dang dben pa dang zhi ba'i phyir dmigs su med de/ chos thams cad kyi
137b3(brgyad stong): mi dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes brjod do/ / gang gi tshe 'du she ba dang kun shes pa dang btags pa dang tha snyad mi 'byung ba de'i tshe shes rab kyi pha rol
137b4(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ / gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la
137b5(brgyad stong): rnal 'byor du bgyid pa de yun ring po ji srid cig spyad cing tshul bsrungs par rig par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
137b6(brgyad stong): rnams kyi dbang po'i rim pa yod pas 'di ni rnam par phye ste lung bstan par bya ba yin no/ / rab 'byor yang rnam grangs gang gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas brgya phrag mang po dang
137b7(brgyad stong): s angs rgyas stong phrag mang po dang sangs rgyas brgya stong phrag mang po dag mthong nas de dag gi drung du tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la ma dang ma mos par 'gyur ba'i
138a1(brgyad stong): rnam grangs kyang yod do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sngon yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi thad nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chad pa dang ston/
138a2(brgyad stong): pa dang nye bar ston pa la ma gus so// ma gus pas legs par mi nyan to// legs par mi nyan pas bsnyen bkur mi byed do// bsnyen bkur mo byed pas yongs su mi 'dri'o//
138a3(brgyad stong): yongs su ma dris pas mngon par mi dad do// mngon par ma dad pas 'khor de nas 'byol te/ de dag gzhi de las chos kyi sa phongs par 'gyur ba dang / mthun pa'i las byas shing
138a4(brgyad stong): b sags la kun nas bsags shing nye bar bsags pas da ltar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chad pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa na ma gus pa sa 'byol zhing ma dang la mos
138a5(brgyad stong): par mi byed pas lus dang sems kyi tshogs pa sgrub par mi byed do/ / tshogs pa sgrub par mi byed pas ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mi shes mi mthong khong du mi chud rig par mi byed de/
138a6(brgyad stong): de dag de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dad par 'gyur ro// ma dad pa ni mo nyan to// mi nyan pa ni mi shes so// ma shes pas ni mi mthong ngo // mi mthong bas ni khong du/
138a7(brgyad stong): mi chud do// khong du ma chung pa na chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba dang mthun pa'i las byed yang dag par sogs par byed kun tu sogs par byed nye bar sogs par byed do// de dag chos kyis
138b1(brgyad stong): p hongs par 'gyur ba dang mthun pa'i las byas pa dang bsags pa dang kun nas bsags pa dang nye bar bsags pa des shes rab 'chal par 'gyur ba dang mthun pa'i las mngon par 'du byed par
138b2(brgyad stong): 'gyur ro/ / de dag shes rab 'chal par 'gyur ba dang mthun pa'i las mngon par 'dus byas pa dang bsags pa dang kun nas bsags pa dang nye bar bsags pa des shes rab kyi pha rol tu
138b3(brgyad stong): phyin pa 'di 'chad pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa na spong bar 'gyur skur bar 'gyur mi snyan par brjod par 'gyur te skur nas kyang 'byol bar 'gyur ro/ / rab 'byor yang shes rab kyi pha rol
138b4(brgyad stong): t u phyin pa 'di spong ba dang skur ba dang mi snyan par brjod pas ni 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid spangs par 'gyur
138b5(brgyad stong): skur bar 'gyur mi snyan par brjod par 'gyur te/ de dag ni rang gi rgyud bcom zhing bsregs nas blo chung ba shes rab chung ba bsod nams chung ba dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba'i gang zag dad pa tsam
138b6(brgyad stong): d ang ldan pa dga' ba tsam dang ldan pa dang ba tsam dang ldan pa 'dun pa tsam dang ldan pa las dang po pa skal ba med pa'i rang bzhin can gzhan rnams kyi'ang dad pa tsam dang dga' ba tsam dang dang ba
138b7(brgyad stong): tsam dang 'dun pa tsam de yang phyir zlog cing 'bral bar byed ldog par byed de/ 'di la bslab par mi bya'o zhes smra zhing 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi gsung ma yin no zhes tshig tu brjod par 'gyur ro// /
139a1(brgyad stong): de ltar de dag bdag gi rgyud bcom zhing phral te gzhan gyi rgyud kyang bcom zhing phral nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skur pa 'debs par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha
139a2(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa la skur pa btab na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la skur pa btab par 'gyur ro/ / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la skur pa btab na 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs
139a3(brgyad stong): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la skur pa btab par 'gyur ro/ / de ltar de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi drung nas 'byol bar 'gyur/ chos kyis yongs su btang bar 'gyur
139a4(brgyad stong): dge 'dun las yongs su phyi rol tu 'gyur ro/ / de ltar de rnams thams cad nas thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad dkon mchog gsum las phyi rol tu 'gyur te/ de dag sems
139a5(brgyad stong): can rnams la phan pa dang bde ba nye bar gcod pa byed pas sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su rnam par smin par 'gyur ba dang mthun pa'i las nye bar sogs par 'gyur ro/ / de dag de lta bu'i
139a6(brgyad stong): las mngon par 'du byed pa dang nye bar bzhag pa dang kun nas bslang ba dang chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba dang mthun pa dang / shes rab 'chal par 'gyur ba dang mthur pa'i rang bzhin de nyid
139a7(brgyad stong): k yis lo brgya phrag mang po dang lo stong phrag mang po dang lo brgya stong phrag mang po dang lo bye ba brgya phrag mang po dang lo bye ba stong phrag mang po dang lo bye ba brgya stong phrag mang po dang lo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
139b1(brgyad stong): phrag mang por sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su lhung bar 'gyur ro/ / de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po nas sems can dmyal ba chen por 'gro bar 'gyur te/ de dag de ltar yun ring
139b2(brgyad stong): por sems can dmyal ba chen po nas sems can dmyal ba chen por 'pho ba na mes 'jig pa'i bskal pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / mes 'jig pa'i bskal pa 'byung ba na 'jig rten gyi khams
139b3(brgyad stong): gzhan dag na sems can dmyal ba chen po gang dag yod pa de dag tu 'dor bar 'gyur te de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag tu lhung bar 'gyur ro/ / der bor te sems can dmyal ba chen

140a1(brgyad stong): 'jig pa'i bskal ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / de dag tu mes 'jig pa'i bskal pa byung ba na yang de dag de nas shi 'phos te/ las ma zad cing lhag ma dang

140a3(brgyad stong): can dmyal ba chen po rnams su sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal chen po de dag myong bar 'gyur te ji srid du mes 'jig pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba de srid du myong bar 'gyur ro/ / de ltar de
140a4(brgyad stong): ngag sdug bsngal mang po myong ba dang mthun pa'i las nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de lta bu'i tshig gi nyes pa smras pa'i phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe
140a5(brgyad stong): dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das mtshams ma mchis pa lnga'i las bgyis shing nye bar bsags pa rnams ni/ yid kyis nongs par spyad pa dang
140a6(brgyad stong): ngag gis nongs par spyad pa 'di'i gzugs brnyan nam rjes su mthun pa'am tshul mthun pa tsam yang ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no shA ri'i
140a7(brgyad stong): bu de de bzhin te/ shA ri'i bu mtshams med pa lnga'i las byas shing nye bar bsags pa rnams ni yid kyis nyes par spyad pa dang ngag gis nyes par spyad pa'i las byas shing bsags te/
140b1(brgyad stong): kun nas bsags pa dang nye bar bsags pa 'di'i gzugs brnyan nam rjes su mthun pa 'am/ tshul mthun pa tsam yang ma yin no// gang su dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab

140b5(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa zab mo ma shes ma rtogs la gzhan dag kyang 'di la bslab par mi bya'o zhes 'dzin du 'jug pa'o/ / shA ri'i bu gang zag de lta bu'i rang bzhin can ni blta bar yang ngas mi

142b1(brgyad stong): l as thams cad nas thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad phyi rol tu gyur pa yin pas ches gzhal du med cing grangs med pa'i mi dge ba'i las chen po mngon par 'du byed pa yongs su 'dzin

143a1(brgyad stong): nyes pa'i skabs tshol bar 'gyur ba'o/ / 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las/ dmyal ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bdun pa'o//
143a2(brgyad stong): 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa/ bam po dgu pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab

143a4(brgyad stong): bzhin no rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mngon par mi brtson pa dang dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba dang blo zhan pa dang don du mi gnyer ba dang thos pa nyung ba dang shes rab zhan
143a5(brgyad stong): pa dang sdig pa'i grogs pos nye bar brten pa dang legs par mi nyan pa dang / mi 'dri ba'i rang bzhin can dang dge ba'i chos la mi brtson pas mos par dka'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/
143a6(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das e ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mos par dka' ba'i slad du 'di ci tsam du zab pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs ni ma bcings ma

143b1(brgyad stong): par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o// rab 'byor gzugs kyi sngon gyi mtha'
143b2(brgyad stong): ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs la sngon gyi mtha'i ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gzugs kyi phyi ma'i mtha' ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir

150a6(brgyad stong): pa la spyod do/ / de bzhin du tshor ba la ma yin 'du shes la ma yin 'du byed rnams la ma yin/ gal te rnam por shes pa stong pa'o snyam du mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//
150a7(brgyad stong): gal te gzugs ma rdzogs pa dang rdzogs pa'o snyam du mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gzugs kyi rdzogs pa ma yin pa'am rdzogs pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin te gal te/
150b1(brgyad stong): de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de bzhin du tshor ba la ma yin 'du shes la ma yin 'du byed rnams la ma yin gal te rnam par shes pa rdzogs pa ma yin pa dang rdzogs
150b2(brgyad stong): pa'o snyam du mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / rnam par shes pa rdzogs pa ma yin pa'am rdzogs pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin te gal te de ltar yang mi spyod ra shes
150b3(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang gi
150b4(brgyad stong): phyir de ltar ci srid du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chags pa dang bcas pa nyid dang chags pa ma mchis pa nyid bshad pa ni ngo mtshar to/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis
150b5(brgyad stong): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs la chags pa dang bcas pa dang chags pa med pa'o snyam du mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
150b6(brgyad stong): pa la spyod do/ / de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang gal te rnam par shes pa la chags pa dang bcas pa dang chags pa med pa'o snyam du mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
150b7(brgyad stong): pa la spyod do/ / rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mig la chags pa dang bcas pa dang chags pa med pa'o snyam du mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
151a1(brgyad stong): do/ / de bzhin du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i bar la chags pa dang bcas pa dang chags pa med pa'o snyam du mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
151a2(brgyad stong): do/ / sa'i khams la chags pa dang bcas pa dang chags pa med pa'o snyam du mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar la chags pa dang bcas
151a3(brgyad stong): pa dang chags pa med pa'o snyam du mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rags pa dang bcas pa dang chags pa med pa'o snyam du mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha
151a4(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang shes rab kyi pha
151a5(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa la rags pa dang bcas pa dang chags pa med pa'o snyam du mi spyod ra shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / de bzhin du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang stobs dang mi
151a6(brgyad stong): 'jigs pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la chags pa dang bcas pa dang chags pa med pa'o snyam du mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / /
151a7(brgyad stong): rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la chags pa dang bcas pa dang chags pa med pa'o snyam du mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang
151b1(brgyad stong): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang dgra bcom pa nyid la chags pa dang bcas pa dang chags pa med pa'o snyam du mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / rang sangs rgyas nyid la chags pa
151b2(brgyad stong): dang bcas pa dang chags pa med pa'o snyam du mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / sangs rgyas nyid la chags pa dang bcas pa dang tshogs pa med pa'o snyam du mi spyod na shes rab
151b3(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / rab 'byor gal te thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang chags pa dang bcas pa dang chags pa med pa'o snyam du mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
151b4(brgyad stong): do/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni gzugs la chags pa mi skyed do de bzhin du tshor ba la ma yin 'du shes la ma yin 'du byed rnams la ma yin rnam par
151b5(brgyad stong): shes pa la chags pa mi skyed do/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod na mig la chags pa mi skyed pa nas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i bar la
151b6(brgyad stong): chags pa mi skyed/ sa'i khams la chags pa mi skyed pa nas rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar la chags pa mi skyed/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa mi skyed/ tshul khrims kyi pha
151b7(brgyad stong): r ol tu phyin pa la ma yin bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ma yin brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma yin bsam gtan gyi phyi rol tu phyin pa la ma yin shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa
152a1(brgyad stong): mi skyed/ byang chub kyi phyogs rnams la ma yin stobs rnams la ma yin mi 'jigs pa rnams la ma yin so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la ma yin sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
152a2(brgyad stong): 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams la chags pa mi skyed do/ / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la chags pa mi skyed lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la ma yin phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la ma yin dgra bcom
152a3(brgyad stong): pa nyid la chags pa mi skyed/ rang sangs rgyas nyid la chags pa mi skyed/ sangs rgyas nyid la chags pa mi skye da/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang chags pa mi skyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
152a4(brgyad stong): rab 'byor thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni ma chags pa ma bcings pa ma grol ba yang dag par ma 'das pa'o// rab 'byor de ltar chags pa thams cad las rab tu bzla ba'i phyir byang chub sems
152a5(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o/ / rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos 'di ni
152a6(brgyad stong): zab ste/ de ni bstan kyang mi 'grib ma bstan kyang mi 'grib bstan kyang mi 'phel ma bstan kyang mi 'phel ba ni ngo mtshar to// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan
152a7(brgyad stong): parab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rab 'byor legs so legs so// rab 'byor de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper ra de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
152b1(brgyad stong): y ang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ci srid 'tsho ba'i bar du bzhugs shing nam mkha'i bsngags pa brjod kyang nam mkha' yongs su 'phel bar mi 'gyur ba sngags pa ma brjod kyang nam mkha' yod
152b2(brgyad stong): su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu la bsngags pa brjod kyang rjes su chags par yang mi 'gyur kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur/ bsngags pa ma brjod
152b3(brgyad stong): kyang khong khro bar mi 'gyur kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ro/ / rab 'byor de bzhin du chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de yang bstan kyang de snyed du zad do ma bstan kyang de snyed du zad do// gnas
152b4(brgyad stong): brtan rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa gang
152b5(brgyad stong): nig zhum par mi bgyid ya ya bor mi 'gyur te 'di la rnal 'byor tu yang bgyid la phyir mi ldog pa ni dka' ba bgyid pa lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom
152b6(brgyad stong): pa 'di ni nam mkha' sgom pa lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gis go cha 'di bgos pa de dag ni phyag bgyi bar 'os pa lags so// de ci'i
152b7(brgyad stong): phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gang sems can rnams kyi slad du go cha bgo bar 'tshal ba de ni nam mkha' dang lhan cig go cha bgo bar 'tshal ba lags so// gang zhig nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i
153a1(brgyad stong): s ems can chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs pa'i sems can rnams kyi skad du go cha bgo bar 'tshal ba ni bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po
153a2(brgyad stong): bgos pa lags te bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpa' bo lags so/ / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal
153a3(brgyad stong): ba de ni bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' yongs su thar par 'tshal ba lags so/ / de ni bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' 'deg par 'tshal ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
153a4(brgyad stong): d pa' sems dpa' chen po gang nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs pa'i sems can rnams kyi slad du go cha 'tshal ba de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin po'i go cha chen po thob
153a5(brgyad stong): pa lags so/ / de nas dge slong gzhan zhig gis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes
153a6(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos gang yang mi skyed chos gang yang 'bog par mi bgyid do// de nas tshe dang
153a7(brgyad stong): ldan pa rab 'byor la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces smras so/ / 'phags pa rab 'byor gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la de ltar rnal 'byor tu byed pa de ci la rnal 'byor/
153b1(brgyad stong): tu byed par 'gyur/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ko'u shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la rnal 'byor tu byed pa de ni nam mkha' la rnal 'byor tu byed par 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka gang
153b2(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la slob cing rnal 'byor tu byed par sems pa de ni bla ga ba med pa la rnal 'byor du byed par 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya
153b3(brgyad stong): byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin par 'gyur ba de la bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang sba ba ci zhig
153b4(brgyad stong): bgyi ba bka' stsal bar gsol/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ko'u shi ka chos gang la bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang sba bar
153b5(brgyad stong): bya ba'i chos de khyod kyis yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ko'u shi ka gal te de ltar byang
153b6(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ci ltar bshad pa 'di la gnas na de nyid de la bsrung ba dang skyob pa dang sbed par 'gyur ro/ / de ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu
153b7(brgyad stong): phyin pa dang bral bar gyur na ni mi dang mi ma yin pa de la glags lta ba dang glags tshol ba dag gis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro/ / ko'u shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
154a1(brgyad stong): chen po gsashes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa spong pa la bsrung ba dang bsgrub pa dang sba bar bya bar sems pa de ni nam mkha' la bsrung ba dang bsgrub pa dang smra bar bya bar sems so/ /
154a2(brgyad stong): ko'u shi ka 'di ci snyam du sems khyod kyis brag cha la bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang sba bar byed par nus sam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor
154a3(brgyad stong): gyis smras pa/ ko'u shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod cing gnas pas ri chos thams cad kyang brag cha lta bur yongs su shes
154a4(brgyad stong): so/ / de bas na de la rlom sems su mi byed yang dag par rjes su mi mthong mi shes yang dag par mi shes chos de dag kyang med cing yang dag par mi snang la yang dag par med cing mi dmigs so zhes
154a5(brgyad stong): gnas te gal te de ltar gnas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rter gyi khams na rgyal po chen po bzhi po dang lha rnam
154a6(brgyad stong): k yi dbang po brgya byin thams cad dang tshangs pa chen po thams cad dang mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der 'ongs te lhags nas
154a7(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhab sa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa dang rgyal po chen po de dag
154b1(brgyad stong): d ang lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin thams cad dang tshangs pa chen po thams cad dang tshangs pa chen po mi mjed kyi bdag pos kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis sangs rgyas stong
154b2(brgyad stong): d ang de dag gis ming 'di dag nyid dang tshig 'di dag nyid dang yi ge 'di dag nyid dang rab 'byor ces bya ba'i dge slong 'di dag nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
154b3(brgyad stong): ba'i le'u 'di nyid nye bar bstan cing / der yang lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin rnams nyid kyis yongs su dris shing yongs su zhus te sa phyogs 'di nyid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid
154b4(brgyad stong): bshad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sa phyogs 'di nyid du shes
154b5(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid 'chad par 'gyur ba shes par gyur to/ / 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las/ rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//
154b6(brgyad stong): / de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni ming tsam mo//
154b7(brgyad stong): ming de yang 'di'o zhes mi dmigs te ngag gi dngos po 'di nyid ming zhes bgyi'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yang ma mchis mi dmigs te/ mi ci lta ba bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu/
155a1(brgyad stong): phyin pa yang de bzhin no shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ci lta bar ming yang de bzhin te/ chos 'di gnyis ni ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i
155a2(brgyad stong): slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ ming 'di dag nyid dang tshig 'di dag nyid dang
155a3(brgyad stong): yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis sa phyogs 'di nyid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid 'chad par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad
155a4(brgyad stong): ces bka' stsal to/ / rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa ni gzugs rtag pa ma yin mi rtag pa ma yin/ gzugs bcings pa ma yin grol ba ma yin
155a5(brgyad stong): pas mtha' las 'das shing rnam par dag pa'o zhes mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin du tshor ba la ma yin 'du shes la ma yin 'du byed rnams la ma yin/ rnam par
155a6(brgyad stong): shes pa rtag pa ma yin mi rtag pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa bcings pa ma yin grol ba ma yin pas mtha' yas 'das shing rnam par dag pa'o zhes mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//
155a7(brgyad stong): rab 'byor rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ ming 'di dag nyid dang tshig
155b1(brgyad stong): 'di dag nyid dang yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis sa phyogs 'di nyid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid 'chad par 'gyur ro/ / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan
155b2(brgyad stong): pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das e ma'o shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni yongs su dag pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
155b3(brgyad stong): gzugs rnam par dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ / rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pas shes
155b4(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ / rab 'byor gzugs skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang rnam par byang ba med pa rnam par dag pas shes rab kyi
155b5(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ / rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa med
155b6(brgyad stong): pa dang rnam par byang ba med pa rnam par dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ / rab 'byor nam mkha' rnam par dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yon su dgas pa'o//
155b7(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gzugs gos pa med cing yongs su 'dzin pa med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang
156a1(brgyad stong): rnam par shes pa gos pa med cing yongs su 'dzin pa med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ / rab 'byor nam mkha' dang brag cha smra ra med cing brjod du//
156a2(brgyad stong): med la/ dmigs su med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// rab 'byor nye bar gos pa dang gos pa med pa'i chos thams cad kyis gos pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha
156a3(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi
156a4(brgyad stong): bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gi rna lam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di grag par gyur pa de dag kyang rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa lags na/ gang dag 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa
156a5(brgyad stong): dang kun chub par byed pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton bgyid par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de dag la ni mig gi nang 'byung bar mi 'gyur rna ba'i
156a6(brgyad stong): nad ma yin sna'i nang ma yin lce'i nad ma yin lus kyi nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ / rmongs pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro// de dag ni nyam nga ba mi spong bas 'chi ba'i dus mi bgyid do// de dag la
156a7(brgyad stong): lha'i bu brgya stong phrag mang po dag de'i phyi bzhin du 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ / tshes brgyad dang bcu bzhi dang bco lnga la chos smra ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de gang dang gang du shes rab kyi pha
156b1(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa 'chad par 'gyur ba de dang der bsod nams ches mang du skyed par 'gyur ro/ / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces
156b2(brgyad stong): bka' stsal to/ / de de bzhin no rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de de'i phyi bzhin du lha brgya stong phrag mang po dag rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// lha
156b3(brgyad stong): brgya stong phrag mang po dag der 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ / chos ston pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'chad par byed pa'i chos nyan par 'dod pa de dag thams cad kyang bsrung ba dang bsgrub pa dang
156b4(brgyad stong): smra ba byed par 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi rin po che bla na med pa'o// rab 'byor de'i
156b5(brgyad stong): phyir yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de de'i gzhi las bsod nams mang du skyed par 'gyur ro/ / rab 'byor 'on kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang 'dzin pa
156b6(brgyad stong): dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton byed pa la bar chad mang du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i
156b7(brgyad stong): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar rin po che chen po ni dgra mang ba yin te/ ci tsam du gces par gyur pa bzhin du dgra ches lci bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
157a1(brgyad stong): phyin pa rin po che chen po 'di ni 'jig rten na bla na med pa'i rin po che ste 'jig rten la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa/ chos thams cad mi skye ba dang mi 'gag par bya ba'i phyir
157a2(brgyad stong): dang kun nas nyon mongs pa med par bya ba'i phyir mi 'jigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar gnas pa'o/ / rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos gang la yang mi gnas chos gang la yang mi sbyor chos
157a3(brgyad stong): gang la yang yongs su mi 'dzin to/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar chos de dag thams cad ni med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor ma skyes pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
157a4(brgyad stong): pa ni ma gos pa'o/ / rab 'byor ma gos pa zhes bya ba 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ltar gzugs ma gos pa sa na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma gos pa'o//
157a5(brgyad stong): de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa ma gos pas na rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ma gos pa'o// rab 'byor gal te de ltar yang byang chub
157a6(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag par mi shes na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / rab 'byor yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang la yang 'jug par byed pa
157a7(brgyad stong): 'am nges par 'jug par byed pa'am/ yang dag par ston par byed pa'am/ nges par ston par byed pa 'am/ yongs su thob par byed pa'am nges par thob par byed pa med do// de nas
157b1(brgyad stong): lha'i bu stong phrag mang po dag par snang la ca co dang gzha dag byed de gos dga' thor zhing 'di skad du e ma 'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba lan gnyis su byung bar snang ngo zhes kyang zer ro/ /
157b2(brgyad stong): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo lan gnyis su bskor ba ma yin te/ chos gang la yang
157b3(brgyad stong): rab tu bskor ba'am ldog pa med do/ / rab 'byor de ltar 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
157b4(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni gang zhig chos thams cad la chags pa ma mchis pa dang / gang bla na med pa yang dag
157b5(brgyad stong): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal yang chos gang yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor yang chos gang yang yang dag par
157b6(brgyad stong): mi ston pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i pha rol tu phyin pa chen po lags so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos gang zhig dmigs par bya ba'am chos gang zhig bstan par bya ba de
157b7(brgyad stong): ni med la 'ga' zhig gis 'ga' zhig bskor bar bya ba yang med do/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni shin tu mngon par ma grub pa ste/ chos gang yang ldog par mi
158a1(brgyad stong): 'gyur rab tu bskor bar mi 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni thog ma nas mngon par ma grub pa ste/ chos thams cad ni rang bzhin
158a2(brgyad stong): gyis dben pa'i phyir ro/ / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ rab
158a3(brgyad stong): 'byor stong pa nyid ni rab tu 'jug pa 'am ldog pa med do/ / rab 'byor mtshan ma med pa yang 'jug pa 'am ldog pa med do// rab 'byor smon pa med pa yang 'jug pa 'am ldog pa med do//
158a4(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gang 'di ltar bstan pa 'di ni chos thams cad bstan pa yin te// sus kyang bstan pa med la sus kyang thos pa yang med sus kyang mnos pa yang med sus kyang mngon sum du byas pa
158a5(brgyad stong): yang med sus kyang mngon sum du byed pa yang ma yin/ sus kyang mngon sum du byed par yang mi 'gyur ro// chos bstan pa 'dis ni su yang yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das yongs su
158a6(brgyad stong): mya ngan las 'da' bar mi 'gyur yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ste/ chos bstan pa 'dis ni su yang sbyin pa'i gnas su byas pa yang med do// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom
158a7(brgyad stong): ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' me mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
158b1(brgyad stong): chos thams cad dmigs su ma mchis par mnyam pa'i slad du 'di ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das shin tu stong pa'i srad du 'di ni dben pa'i pha rol du//
158b2(brgyad stong): phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i slad du 'di ni mi brdzi ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das ming ma mchis shing lus ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni
158b3(brgyad stong): gnas ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba dang 'ong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos
158b4(brgyad stong): thams cad rtog pa ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni brjod du ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das phung po lnga dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni ming ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin
158b5(brgyad stong): pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad 'gro ba ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni 'gro ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad gzung ba ma mchis
158b6(brgyad stong): pa'i slad du 'di ni mi 'phrogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das mi bas pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i slad du 'di ni mi bas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos
158b7(brgyad stong): thams cad mngon par ma grub pa'i slad du 'di ni chos thams cad mi skye ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das byed pa po mi dmigs pa'i slad du 'di ni byed pa po ma mchis pa'i pha
159a1(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad bdag ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni shes pa po ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'chi
159a2(brgyad stong): 'pho ba dang skye ba dag mi skye ba'i slad du 'di ni mi 'pho ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs pa'i slad du 'di ni 'dul
159a3(brgyad stong): ba med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das skye ba ma mchis pa rnam par shes par bgyid pa'i slad du 'di ni rmi lam dang / sgra brnyan dang mig yor dang / smig rgyu dang sgyu ma'i pha
159a4(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan
159a5(brgyad stong): 'das rten mi dmigs pa'i slad du 'di ni rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' gos pa ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni gos pa ma mchis pa'i
159a6(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das rlom sems thams cad las 'das pa'i slad du 'di ni spros pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das g.yo ba ma mchis
159a7(brgyad stong): pa'i slad du 'di ni rlom sems ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings gnas pa nyid kyi slad du 'di ni mi g.yo ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom
159b1(brgyad stong): ldan 'das chos thams cad phyin ci ma log pa de bzhin nyid kyi slad du 'di ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad rnam par mi rtog pa nyid kyi slad
159b2(brgyad stong): du 'di ni ldang ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa'i slad du 'di ni zhi ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das yon
159b3(brgyad stong): tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i slad du 'di ni skyon ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das yongs su rtog pa ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu
159b4(brgyad stong): phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa'i mtha'i slad du 'di ni sems can ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ldang ba ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di
159b5(brgyad stong): ni tshad ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mngon par ma zhen pa'i slad du 'di ni mtha' gnyis mi rtogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan
159b6(brgyad stong): 'das chos thams cad dbyer ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni tha mi dad pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa thams cad la 'dod pa ma mchis pa'i
159b7(brgyad stong): slad du 'di ni mchog tu mi 'dzin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das rnam par rtog pa zhi ba nyid kyi slad du 'di ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
160a1(brgyad stong): chos nyid tshad ma mchis pa nyid kyi srang du 'di ni gzhal du ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad chags pa ma mchis pa'i slad
160a2(brgyad stong): du 'di ni chags pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad 'dus ma bgyis pa'i slad du 'di ni mi rtag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan
160a3(brgyad stong): 'das chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i slad du 'di ni sdug bsngal ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i slang du 'di ri stong pa nyid kyi
160a4(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mngon par ma chags pa'i slad du 'di ni bdag ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad
160a5(brgyad stong): mngon par ma grub pa'i slad du 'di ni mtshan nyid ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das mtha' yas mu ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni stong pa nyid thams cad kyi pha rol tu
160a6(brgyad stong): phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi phyogs de rnams dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la sogs pa byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin
160a7(brgyad stong): pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum mi dmigs pa'i slad du 'di ni stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
160b1(brgyad stong): 'di rnams dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan dang po la sogs pa mi dmigs pa'i slad du 'di ni
160b2(brgyad stong): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal la sogs pa mi dmigs pa'i slad du 'di ni bden pa bzhi'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom
160b3(brgyad stong): ldan 'das sbyin pa la sogs pa mi dmigs pa'i slad du 'di ni sa bcu'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das mi brdzi ba'i slad du 'di ni stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
160b4(brgyad stong): shin tu ma zhum pa'i slad du 'di ni mi 'jigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das ye shes thams cad chags pa ma mchis pa dang thogs pa ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni so so yang dag
160b5(brgyad stong): par rig pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa'i slad du 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan
160b6(brgyad stong): 'das chos thams cad ma log pa de bzhin nyid kyi slad du 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa'i slad du
160b7(brgyad stong): 'di ni rang byung gi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi rnam pa thams cad yongs su mkhyen pa'i slad du 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni
161a1(brgyad stong): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las/ bskyod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste dgu pa'o//
161a2(brgyad stong): / 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa/ bam po bcu pa/ de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rigs kyi
161a3(brgyad stong): b u'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gi rna lam du snang bar 'gyur ba yang sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas par 'gyur ba dang sangs rgyas mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis
161a4(brgyad stong): yongs su zin par 'gyur ba yin na/ gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin par 'gyur 'chang bar 'gyur klog par 'gyur kun chub par byed par 'gyur rab tu 'don par 'gyur
161a5(brgyad stong): s ton par 'gyur nye bar ston par 'gyur lung 'bogs par 'gyur kha ton byed par 'gyur zhing bzung ba dang bcangs pa dang bklags pa dang kun chub pa dang rab tu ston pa dang bstan pa dang nye bar bstan pa
161a6(brgyad stong): dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton byas nas de bzhin nyid du slob pa dang de bzhin nyid du bsgrub pa dang de bzhin nyid du rnal 'byor du byed par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon tsam
161a7(brgyad stong): dang ldan par mi 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas par 'gyur ro// gang dag da ltar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyan par
161b1(brgyad stong): ' gyur zhing mnyan nas kyang 'dzin par 'gyur 'chang bar 'gyur klog par 'gyur kun chub par byed par 'gyur rab tu 'don par 'gyur ston par 'gyur nye bar ston par 'gyur lung 'bogs par 'gyur kha ton
161b2(brgyad stong): b yed par 'gyur de bzhin nyid du slob par 'gyur de bzhin nyid du sgrub par 'gyur de bzhin nyid du rnal 'byor tu byed par 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa
161b3(brgyad stong): d gra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi thad nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs
161b4(brgyad stong): su zhus shing yongs su dris par byas pa yin no/ / gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar zab pa 'di bshad pa dang bstan pa dang nye bar bstan pa la 'gong bar mi 'gyur kun tu zhum par
161b5(brgyad stong): m i 'gyur bag tsha bar mi 'gyur bag 'khums par mi 'gyur yid phyir phyogs par mi 'gyur bcom zhing phyir phyogs par mi 'gyur mi dngang kun tu mi skrag kun tu skrag pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur ba'i rigs
161b6(brgyad stong): kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni sangs rgyas mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun par rig par bya'o/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi 'di lta bu'i sems kyi rtog pa
161b7(brgyad stong): sems kyis shes nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid 'chad pa dang ston
162a1(brgyad stong): pa dang nye bar ston pa la/ mngon par dad de rtog cing mos la sems dang bas byang chub tu sems bskyed de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang
162a2(brgyad stong): k un chub par bgyid pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton bgyid pa dang de bzhin nyid du slob pa dang de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa dang de bzhin nyid du rnal 'byor du bgyid par
162a3(brgyad stong): 'gyur ba de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji lta ba de bzhin du gzung bar bgyi'o/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab ste/ bcom
162a4(brgyad stong): l dan 'das dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba dang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mngon du ma thos shing yongs su ma dris pa'i rang bzhin can du gyur pa dang sngon spyad pa dang mi ldan pa rnams kyis ni 'di ltar zab pa'i
162a5(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mos par mi nus so/ / bcom ldan 'das yang gang dag 'di la mi mos shing ma rtogs pas spong bar sems pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis ni/ sngon gyi
162a6(brgyad stong): mthar yang 'di ltar zab pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid bshad pa na spangs par gyur to/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba'i slad du sngon gyi mthar ma spyad
162a7(brgyad stong): bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la ci ltar yang mos par mi nus so/ / gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chad par spong bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang de bzhin du rig par bgyi
162b1(brgyad stong): ste/ de dag gis sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid bshad pa na spangs pa lags te 'di ltar de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa la dang ba ma
162b2(brgyad stong): mchis bzod pa ma mchis sred pa ma mchis 'dun pa ma mchis brtson 'grus ma mchis dang ba ma mchis mos pa ma mchis so/ / de dag gis ni sngon gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang sangs
162b3(brgyad stong): rgyas kyi nyan thos rnams la yongs su ma dris te yongs su dri ba ma bgyis so/ / de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa shA ri'i bu shes rab
162b4(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sngon ma spyad pa dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa la mos par mi 'gyur ba de la ngo mtshar ci zhig
162b5(brgyad stong): yod/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das gang shes
162b6(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal ba de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la phyag 'tshal ba lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de de bzhin no de de bzhin te
162b7(brgyad stong): ko'u shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal ba de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la phyag 'tshal ba yin no/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
163a1(brgyad stong): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni 'di las skyes te/ ko'u shi ka thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes las skyes pas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rab tu phye ba yin no// de
163a2(brgyad stong): ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyad par bya/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas par bya/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la rnal 'byor du bya'o// de nas
163a3(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
163a4(brgyad stong): pan shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa lags/ ci ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du bgyid/ de skad ces gsol pa dang /
163a5(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ko'u shi ka legs so legs so// ko'u shi ka gang khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
163a6(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la don 'di yongs su 'dri bar bya ba dang yongs su dri bar byed par sems pa ni yang khyod legs so/ / ko'u shi ka khyod kyi spobs pa 'di yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus
163a7(brgyad stong): skyes pa yin no/ / ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa na/ gzugs la mi gnas gzugs so zhes mi gnas te ko'u shi ka 'di ltar
163b1(brgyad stong): b yang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs la mi gnas gzugs so zhes mi gnas pa de ltar na ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin
163b2(brgyad stong): no/ / de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa la mi gnas rnam par shes pa'o zhes mi gnas te/ ko'u shi ka 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
163b3(brgyad stong): rnam par shes pa la mi gnas rnam par shes pa'o zhes mi gnas pa de ltar na ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par shes pa la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no/ / ko'u shi
163b4(brgyad stong): ka gzugs so zhes mi sbyor te/ ko'u shi ka 'di ltar gzugs so zhes mi sbyor ba de ltar na gzugs so zhes mi gnas pa yin no// ko'u shi ka de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams
163b5(brgyad stong): dang rnam par shes pa'o zhes mi sbyor te/ ko'u shi ka 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'o zhes mi sbyor ba de ltar na rnam par shes pa'o zhes mi gnas pa yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar
163b6(brgyad stong): gnas shing de ltar rnal 'byor du byed par 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni
163b7(brgyad stong): zab pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gting dpag dka' ba'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzung bar dka' ba'o// bcom ldan 'das/
164a1(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshad ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de de bzhin ne de bzhin te/ shA ri'i bu gzugs zab bo
164a2(brgyad stong): snyam du mi gnas te/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs za ba po snyam du mi gnas pa de ltar na gzugs la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang //
164a3(brgyad stong): shA ri'i bu rnam par shes pa zab bo snyam du mi gnas te/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar rnam par shes pa zab bo snyam du mi gnas pa de ltar na rnam par shes pa la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no// shA
164a4(brgyad stong): ri'i bu gzugs za ba bo snyam du rnal 'byor du mi byed de/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs za ba bo snyam du rnal 'byor du mi byed pa de ltar na gzugs za ba bo snyam du mi gnas pa yin no//
164a5(brgyad stong): de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / shA ri'i bu rnam par shes pa za ba bo snyam du rnal 'byor du mi byed de/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar rnam par shes pa zab bo snyam
164a6(brgyad stong): du rnal 'byor du mi byed pa de ltar na rnam par shes pa za ba po snyam du mi gnas pa yin no/ / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad
164a7(brgyad stong): ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni za ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog par lung bstan pa rnams kyi mdun du
164b1(brgyad stong): bshad par bgyi ba lags so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni nem nur mi bgyir the tshom 'tshal bar mi 'gyur rmongs par mi 'gyur rtsod par mi 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang
164b2(brgyad stong): ldan pa shA ri'i bu la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi sa 'di skad ces smras so/ / 'phags pa shA ri'i bu yang ga la te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lung ma bstan pa'i mdun
164b3(brgyad stong): du she sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bshad na nyes pa cir 'gyur/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sa lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so//
164b4(brgyad stong): ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lung ma bstan pa gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di blta ba dang phyag bya ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba dang mnyan pa thob
164b5(brgyad stong): par gyur la/ thos nas kyang da ngang ba ra mi 'gyur kun tu skrag par mi 'gyur kun tu skrag pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni ko 'u shi ka
164b6(brgyad stong): rgyang ring po nas 'ongs par rig par bya ste/ yun ring nas theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa yin par rig par bya'o// 'di ni da ring po mi
164b7(brgyad stong): thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur te/ de ni lung bstan pa la bsnyen pa yin par rig par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sem
165a1(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gcig gam gnyis sam gsum las mi 'da' ste/ de nas tha na
165a2(brgyad stong): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ro/ / 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de rnams mnyes
165a3(brgyad stong): par byed par 'gyur te/ mnyes par byas nas kyang thugs phyung bar byed par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba yang lung bstan pas 'bras bu yod par byed par 'gyur
165a4(brgyad stong): de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba de las kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ro/ / ji srid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
165a5(brgyad stong): p a'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ba de srid du de bzhin gshegs pa blta ba dang phyag bya ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba dang rim gro bya ba nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
165a6(brgyad stong): tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar gyis 'bras bu yod par byed par 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
165a7(brgyad stong): ' das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di blta ba dang phyag bya ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba dang mnyan pa thob par gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
165b1(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po de ni/ bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mchis pa lags te yun ring po nas theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa legs par 'tshal bar
165b2(brgyad stong): bgyi na/ gang 'di thos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton byed par 'gyur ba
165b3(brgyad stong): rnams lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ shA ri'i bu byang chub
165b4(brgyad stong): s ems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di blta ba dang phyag bya ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba dang mnyan pa thob par gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
165b5(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po de ni shA ri'i bu rgyang ring po nas 'ongs pa yin te/ yun ring po nas theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa yin par rig par bya na/ gang 'di
165b6(brgyad stong): t hos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton byed par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci
165b7(brgyad stong): dgos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dper gsol bar bdag spobs so// bde bar gshegs pa
166a1(brgyad stong): bdag spobs so/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gang zhig gi rmi lam du yang
166a2(brgyad stong): byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa rmi na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bgyi ba'i slad du bla na med pa yang dag par
166a3(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsnyen pa lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di blta ba dang phyag bgyi ba dang bsnyen bkur
166a4(brgyad stong): bgyi ba dang mnyan pa thob par gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag de ni rgyang ring po nas mchis pa lags te/ yun ring po nas theg pa la yang dag par
166a5(brgyad stong): zhugs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa lags na/ thos nas kyang bzung ba dang bcang ba dang klag pa dang kun chub par bgyid pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung
166a6(brgyad stong): 'bogs pa dang kha ton du bgyid pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag de ni lung bstan pa dang bsnyen pa lags shing / byang chub sems dpa'
166a7(brgyad stong): s ems dpa' chen po de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bgyi ba'i slad du lung bstan par 'gyur bar
166b1(brgyad stong): rig par bgyi'o/ / gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di tha na mnyan pa yang rnyed par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni yun ring po nas theg pa la yang dag par
166b2(brgyad stong): zhugs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa lags par rig par bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba
166b3(brgyad stong): dang klog pa dang kun chub par bgyid pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton du bgyid par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/
166b4(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das sems can chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba dang mthun pa'i las bsags pa dang phal cher ma bral ba de dag gi sems phal cher ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
166b5(brgyad stong): 'di la mi mthun par 'gyur zhing sems ldog par 'gyur ro/ / sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bsags pa ni phal cher yang dag pa'i mtha' 'di la rab tu mi 'jug cing rab tu dad par mi 'gyur
166b6(brgyad stong): te/ gang dag yang dag pa'i mtha' 'di la rab tu 'jug cing rab tu dad par 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa lags te bcom ldan 'das de dag
166b7(brgyad stong): ni dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu bsags par rig par bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu zhig 'brog dgon pa dpag tshad brgya pa 'am dpag tshad nyis brgya pa 'am dpag tshad
167a1(brgyad stong): s um brgya pa 'am dpag tshad bani brgya ba'am dpag tshad lnga brgya pa'am dpag tshad brgya phrag bcu pa'i 'brog dgon pa nas byung ste des byung ba dang mtshan ma gang gis grong ngam
167a2(brgyad stong): g rong khyer ram grong rdal mchis par mngon pa'i mtshan ma sngar gda' ba ba lang rdzi'am phyugs rdzi'am mtshams sam kun dga' ra ba phun sum tshogs pa'amatshal phun sum tshogs pa'am de ma
167a3(brgyad stong): lags pa'i mtshan ma gzhan dag kyang rung ste/ des sngar mtshan ma de dag mthong ba dang / 'di snyam du 'di ltar sngar gyi mtshan ma 'di dag snang bas/ de ltar grong ngam grong khyer ram
167a4(brgyad stong): grong rdal du nye bar gyur to snyam nas de ni dbugs phyin pa rnyed pa lags te/ de la slan chad chom po yid la bgyid pa ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems
167a5(brgyad stong): d pa' sems dpa' chen po gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la nye bar gnas na bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sem dpa' chen po 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog
167a6(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub tu bsnyen pa lags te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob par rig
167a7(brgyad stong): par bgyi'o/ / de yang nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la skrag par mi 'gyur 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar ngos sngar gyi mtshan ma 'di dag mthong
167b1(brgyad stong): ste 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di blta ba dang phyag bgyi ba dang bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang mnyan pa thob pa'i slad du'o/ / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das//
167b2(brgyad stong): kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ shA ri'i bu ci ltar 'di sangs rgyas kyi mthus smra ba dang smra bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du yang
167b3(brgyad stong): gnas 'di la khyod spobs par gyis shig/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper
167b4(brgyad stong): na 'di na skyes bu la la zhig rgya mtsho chen po lta 'tshal bar gyur te/ de rgya mtsho chen po ltar mchis pa dang ci lta ci ltar de rgya mtsho chen po lta bar mchis pa de lta de ltar gal te des sdong po 'am sdong po'i
167b5(brgyad stong): mtshan ma'am ri 'am ri'i mtshan ma mthong na des 'di snyam du 'di nas rgya mtsho chen po ni nga dung ring ngo snyam du 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ / gal te phyis sdong po 'am sdong po'i mtshan ma 'am ri 'am ri'i mtshan
167b6(brgyad stong): ma ma mthong na des 'di snyam du 'di nas ni rgya mtsho chen po dang nye'o snyam du 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni rim gyis dma' ba lags pas rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na
167b7(brgyad stong): sdong po 'am sdong po'i mtshan ma'am ri 'am ri'i mtshan ma gang yang ma mchis te/ 'di ltar yang rgya mtsho chen po de mig gis mngon sum du ma mthong ba de lta na yang rgya mtsho chen po ni bdag gis
168a1(brgyad stong): bsnyen te 'di phan chad rgya mtsho chen po mi ring ngo snyam mo/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
168a2(brgyad stong): mo 'di nyan pa na 'di snyam du rig par bgyi ste/ 'di ltar yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis bdag mngon sum du ni lung ma bstan pa de lta na
168a3(brgyad stong): yang 'di ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bdag lung ston pa dang bsnyen par rig par bgyi'o/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
168a4(brgyad stong): blta ba dang phyag bgyi ba dang bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang mnyan pa thob pa'i slad du'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na dpyid ka'i dus nye bar gnas pa na shing sna tshogs kyi yal ga'i lo ma rnying
168a5(brgyad stong): pa rnams lhags pa las lo ma sna tshogs byung ste/ lo ma rnams byung ba dang 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams nags tshal dag la sngar gyi mtshan ma de dag mthong nas/ da ni me tog dang 'bras bu rnam
168a6(brgyad stong): ring po mi thogs par 'byung ngo snyam nas yid dga' bar 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i slad du ne na/ de ni 'di ltar sdong po las mtshan ma 'di lta bu dag sngar gda' ba'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das
168a7(brgyad stong): b zhin du gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di blta ba dang phyag bgyi ba dang bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang mnyan pa rnyed pa'i slad du nye bar gnas na
168b1(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa lags par rig par bgyi ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
168b2(brgyad stong): mo 'di ni de la sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis nye bar bstabs pa lags so/ / de la gang sngon sangs rgyas mthong ba'i lha de dag ni 'di snyam du sems te/ sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems
168b3(brgyad stong): d pa' chen po de dag la yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'i mtshan ma sngar byung ba yin pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par
168b4(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ring po mi thogs par lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ro snyam nas rab tu dga' bar 'gyur zhing rangs te yid mgu ba skye bar 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na
168b5(brgyad stong): b ud med sbru ma ma mngal lci bar gyur pa de gang gi tshe lus bskyod na cher snyom par 'gyur te de 'chag pa la dang cher mi 'gyur kha zas chung ngu 'tshal bar 'gyur rmugs pa dang gnyid chung bar 'gyur smra ba nyung
168b6(brgyad stong): bar 'gyur stobs chung bar 'gyur sdug bsngal mang bar 'gyur sme bzhin du mang du gnas par 'gyur/ 'grogs pa la dang che bar mi 'gyur sngon gyi tshul bzhin ma lags pa yid la bgyid pa sten cing nges
168b7(brgyad stong): p ar bsten la bsgoms te mang du byas pas 'di lta bu'i tshor ba lus kyis myong ngo snyam pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das ci ltar sngar gyi mtshan ma 'di dag mthong ba de ltar bud med 'di ni ring po mi thogs par bu
169a1(brgyad stong): 'byung bar 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa de/ gang gi tshe shes rab
169a2(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di blta ba dang phyag bgyi ba dang bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang mnyan pa'i slad du nye bar gnas la/ nyan pa na de la dga' zhing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la don du gnyer ba'i
169a3(brgyad stong): sems bskyed pa de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ring po mi thogs par lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur
169a4(brgyad stong): pabapar 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu legs so legs so shA ri'i bu 'di
169a5(brgyad stong): yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus khyod spobs par gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
169a6(brgyad stong): b com pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag 'di ltar legs par yongs su bzung ba dang legs par sbyangs pa dang legs par
169a7(brgyad stong): yongs su gtad pa'i bar 'di ni ngo mtshar to/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni skye bo mang po la phan
169b1(brgyad stong): pa dang skye bo mang po la bde ba dang 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang skye bo phal po che'i don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa ste/ lha dang mi rnams la snying brtse ba can snying brtse ba'i phyir/ bla na med pa yang
169b2(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas bla na med pa'i chos ston
169b3(brgyad stong): pa 'dod pa'o/ / rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa na ci ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
169b4(brgyad stong): pabasgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
169b5(brgyad stong): pas/ gzugs kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de bzhin du tshor ba'i ma yin 'du shes kyi ma yin 'du byed rnams kyi ma yin rnam par
169b6(brgyad stong): shes pa'i 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gzugs kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
169b7(brgyad stong): spyod do/ / de bzhin du tshor ba'i ma yin 'du shes kyi ma yin 'du byed rnams kyi ma yin rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//
170a1(brgyad stong): chos yang dgu par rjes su mi mthong na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// chos ma yin pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//
170a2(brgyad stong): de ltar na 'di'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bstan pa 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// bcom
170a3(brgyad stong): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rab 'byor rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab
170a4(brgyad stong): po/ rab 'byor gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar yang mi shes na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rab 'byor rnam
170a5(brgyad stong): par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar yang mi shes na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//
170a6(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar zab pa 'di la su zhig mos par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
170a7(brgyad stong): po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par gyur pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mos par 'gyur ro/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci ltar na
170b1(brgyad stong): / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyad par gyur pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das ci ltar na srung bar gyur pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming 'thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
170b2(brgyad stong): stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stobs rnams la mi rtog mi 'jigs pa rnams la mi rtog sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la yang mi rtog thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
170b3(brgyad stong): la yang mi rtog go/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu stobs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab/
170b4(brgyad stong): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab chos thams cad kyang bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ shA ri'i bu de ltar spyad par gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la yang mi spyod
170b5(brgyad stong): ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/ de ltar spyad par gyur pa zhes bya zhing spyad par gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ming 'thob bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad
170b6(brgyad stong): ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rin po che'i phung po'o// bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'
170b7(brgyad stong): dag pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dag pa'i phung po'o/ / bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba
171a1(brgyad stong): dang klog pa dang kun chub par bgyid pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton bgyid pa dang yi ger 'dri ba la bar chad bgyid pa mang po 'byung / ba 'di ni ngo mtshar to/

176b1(brgyad stong): lta ci smos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mthu brtan pa'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dag gis de thos nas shes rab
