366a4(brgyad stong): s ems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gnas pas gnas pa de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bdud sdig can ci snyed yod pa de dag
366a5(brgyad stong): thams cad shin tu mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan par 'gyur te/ rang rang gi stan la yang nyams mi dga' bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
366a6(brgyad stong): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pas gnas pa la ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bdag cig gis 'di bzung la mtho ba tsam mo snyam pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las slar bzlog par bya'o snyam pa'i glags rnyed par mi 'gyur gting rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/
366a7(brgyad stong): / rab 'byor de lta bas na byang chub sems
366b1(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rngan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i drang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/
366b2(brgyad stong): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ de bzhin du tshul
366b3(brgyad stong): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab
366b4(brgyad stong): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / thabs
366b5(brgyad stong): mkhas pa thams cad bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa des ni bdud kyi las gang cung
366b6(brgyad stong): zad 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad 'byung ba'i tshe rab tu shes par 'gyur te/ rab tu shes nas rnam par spong bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor thabs mkhas pa thams cad yongs
366b7(brgyad stong): su bzung bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par bya'o// rab
367a1(brgyad stong): ' byor gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par sgrub par byed pa de'i
367a2(brgyad stong): t sherab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal du med grangs med pa dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs te 'tshe zhing gzhes
367a3(brgyad stong): pa de dag la de dag gi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las skyes so snyam du bsam par bya'o// da ltar bsams nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
367a4(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po des kyang sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/ ci ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos gang dag rjes su brnyes pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang chos de dag kyang rjes su
367a5(brgyad stong): thob par bya'o snyam ste/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas nyin gcig 'das kyi bar la tha na se gol gtogs pa
367a6(brgyad stong): srid tsam du yang sems bskyed pa 'di dag bskyed par bya mar rlung ra bsgrub par bya'o/ / rab 'byor gang yang dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
367a7(brgyad stong): g ang gis bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du sbyin pa byin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmigs pa can de bas ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
367b1(brgyad stong): gang gis nyi ma gcig 'das kyi bar la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di chung ngu na sa gol gtogs pa gcig tsam du mngon par bsgrub na bsod nams ches mang du skyed de/ byang chub
367b2(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur ro/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang nyin gcig 'das kyi bar la chung ngu na se gol
367b3(brgyad stong): gtogs pa srid tsam yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod cing sems bskyed pa 'di bskyed pa de de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs par rig par bya na/ gang sems bskyed pa 'di
367b4(brgyad stong): nyin thog thag rjes su 'jug par byed pa lta ci smos/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs pas 'gro ba gang zhig la re bar bya zhe na/
367b5(brgyad stong): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs pas ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma gtogs par 'gro ba gzhan du dogs
367b6(brgyad stong): par mi bya ste/ de ni skal ba med pa dang ngan song rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur gyi mtho ris su skye bar re bar bya'o// der yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur zhing
367b7(brgyad stong): de bzhin gshegs pa dang ma 'bral ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur te sems can yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
368a1(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po gang gis chung ngu na se gol gtogs pa gcig tsam du yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par
368a2(brgyad stong): sgrub cing sems bskyed pa 'di skyed par byed pa'i yon tan 'di dag dang phan yon 'di dag yin nam/ gang zhig sems bskyed pa 'di nyin thog thag rjes su 'jug par byed pa lta ci//
368a3(brgyad stong): smos/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi bskyod pa'i drung na da ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
368a4(brgyad stong): spos kyi glang po zhes bya ba tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa bzhin no/ / 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las/ me tog bkram pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o//
368a5(brgyad stong): / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'di ltar rjes su rig par bya ste/ chos thams cad chags
368a6(brgyad stong): pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o/ / chos thams cad dbyer mi phyed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thams
368a7(brgyad stong): cad 'byung ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o/ / chos thams cad 'gyur ba med par mnyam pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par
368b1(brgyad stong): bya'o/ / chos thams cad bdag med pa dang rnam par rig pa med par shes rab kyis rjes su rdzogs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad ming
368b2(brgyad stong): tsam dang tha snyad gdags pa tsam gyis brjod pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o/ / tha snyad gdags pa yang gang la yang ma yin gang gis kyang ma yin gang yang
368b3(brgyad stong): tha snyad gdags pa med do/ / chos thams cad tha snyad med pa brjod du med pa smrar med pa tshig med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad
368b4(brgyad stong): tshad ma med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o/ / gzugs tshad ma med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// de bzhin du tshor ba
368b5(brgyad stong): tshad ma med pa dang 'du shes tshad ma med pa dang 'du byed rnams tshad ma med pa dang / rnam par shes pa tshad ma med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thams
368b6(brgyad stong): cad mtshan ma med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o/ / chos thams cad nges par 'byed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// chos
368b7(brgyad stong): thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o/ / chos thams cad tshig med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su
369a1(brgyad stong): rig par bya'o/ / chos thams cad 'gog pa med pas spang bar bya ba mnyam pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad mya
369a2(brgyad stong): ngan las 'das pa thob cing de bzhin nyid dang mnyam pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o/ / chos thams cad mi 'ong mi 'gro mi shes mi skye shin tu mi skye ba'i phyir
369a3(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o/ / bdag dang gzhan du mi lta ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad 'phags pa
369a4(brgyad stong): dgra bcom pa rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o/ / chos thams cad khur bor zhing khur mi khyer ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol
369a5(brgyad stong): tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o/ / chos thams cad yul med cing phyogs med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor
369a6(brgyad stong): gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis ngo bo nyid kyis yul dang phyogs med pa'o/ / rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis ngo bo nyid kyis
369a7(brgyad stong): yul dang phyogs med pa'o/ / chos thams cad 'gog pa rab tu sim par byed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// dga' ba med cing dga' ba dang bral
369b1(brgyad stong): ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o/ / 'dod chags pa med cing 'dod chags dang bral ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rjes su rig par
369b2(brgyad stong): bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs ni de kho na dang bcas pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis na 'dod chags par mi byed 'dod chags dang bral bar mi byed do// rab 'byor de bzhin du
369b3(brgyad stong): tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa ni de kho na dang bcas pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis na 'dod chags par mi byed 'dod chags dang bral bar mi byed do/ / rang bzhin
369b4(brgyad stong): gyis yongs su dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o/ / chos thams cad chags pa dang ma chags pa'i zhen pa dang bral ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu
369b5(brgyad stong): phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o/ / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes khong du chud pas chos thams cad byang chub bo zhes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thams
369b6(brgyad stong): cad stong pa nyid dang mtshan mo med pa dang smon pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o/ / byams pa chen po sngon du 'gro bas chos thams cad sman lta bu'o/
369b7(brgyad stong): zhes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad byams pa la gnas pa dang snying rje la gnas pa dang dga' ba la gnas pa dang btang snyoms la gnas pa'i
370a1(brgyad stong): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o/ / chos thams cad tshangs par gyur pas zhe sdang mi bskyed cing zhe sdang thams cad mi len pa'i phyir shes rab

370a3(brgyad stong): mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o/ / namakha' mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o// ri

373a1(brgyad stong): cad rnam par spangs pa'i yid la byed pa dang le lo thams cad rnam par spangs pa'i yid la byed pa dang rlom sems thams cad rnam par spangs pa'i yid la byed pa dang / bdag

373a3(brgyad stong): ' du shes pa rnam par spangs pa'i yid la byed pa dang rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang tshigs su bcad pa rnam par spangs pa'i yid la byed pa dang sgrib pa lnga rnam par spangs pa'i yid la byed pa dang
373a4(brgyad stong): phrag dog dang ser sna rnam par spangs pa'i yid la byed pa dang skye bo thams cad spangs pa'i yid la byed pa dag gis sgom par 'gyur ba de'i tshe/ de la yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs
373a5(brgyad stong): pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bla na med pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par rnyed dka' bar mi 'gyur ro// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las
373a6(brgyad stong): rjes su rig pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o/ / // 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa/ bam po nyi shu gsum pa/
373a7(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ci lngar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu ga da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rjod
373b1(brgyad stong): pa'i sangs rgyas sgra dbyangs mi zad par sgrogs pa'i drung na tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa des yongs su btsal ba de bzhin du yongs su btsal bar bya'o/ / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan
373b2(brgyad stong): 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshol ba na ci ltar
373b3(brgyad stong): yongs su btsal lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
373b4(brgyad stong): c hen po rtag tu ngu sngon shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su tshol ba na lus la ched che bar mi byed srog la mi lta rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang tshigs su bcad pa dag la mi gnas par yongs su btsal bas
373b5(brgyad stong): yongs su btsal to/ / des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su tshol zhing 'brog dgon pa zhig tu phyin pa na bar snang las/ rigs kyi bu khyod shar phyogs su song zhig dang shes rab kyi pha
373b6(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur gyis/ ci ltar lus ngal ba yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang gnyid dang rmugs pa yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang bza' ba yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang btung ba yid la byed
373b7(brgyad stong): pa mi skyed pa dang / mtshan mo yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang / nyin mo yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang grang ba yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang / tsha ba yid la byed pa mi skyed pa de ltar song zhig/ nang
374a1(brgyad stong): ngam phyi rol gang la yang sems smon par ma byed cig/ rigs kyi bu g.yon du ma lta bar song zhig/ g.yas su ma yin shar du ma yin lho ru ma yin nub tu ma yin byang du/
374a2(brgyad stong): ma yin steng du ma yin 'og tu ma yin phyogs mtshams su yang ma lta bar song zhig/ rigs kyi bu ci ltar bdag las ma g.yos shing 'jig tshogs las kyang ma yin pa dang / ci ltar
374a3(brgyad stong): gzugs las kyang ma g.yos pa dang ci ltar tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang ci ltar rnam par shes pa las kyang ma g.yos pa de ltar song zhig/ gang 'di las g.yos pa de ni rnam
374a4(brgyad stong): par nyams par 'gyur ro/ / ci las nyams par 'gyur zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las nyams par 'gyur ro// gang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las nyams par
374a5(brgyad stong): 'gyur ba de ni 'khor ba la spyod do/ / gang 'khor ba la spyod pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod de/ des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rjes su mi 'thob bo zhes bya ba'i sku
374a6(brgyad stong): thos par gyur to/ / de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus sgra de la 'di skad ces de bzhin du bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga ni sam
374a7(brgyad stong): can thams cad la snang bar byed 'dod pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad sgrub par 'dod pa'i phyir ro zhes smras so/ / de skad ces smras pa dang / sgra des byang chub sems dpa' sems
374b1(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po rtag tu ngul 'di skad ces rigs kyi bu rtag tu ngu legs so legs so zhes smras so/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus yang sgra thos te
374b2(brgyad stong): 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod kyis stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med par chos thams cad la mos pa bskyed la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su btsal bar bya'o/ / khyod kyis mtshan
374b3(brgyad stong): ma yongs su spang ba dang dngos po yongs su spang ba dang sems can du lta ba yongs su spang bar bya'o/ / rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sdig pa'i grogs po dag yongs su spang bar bya'o// dge ba'i
374b4(brgyad stong): b shes gnyen gang chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang ma byung ba dang ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags pa dang dngos po med par chos rnams ston pa dag la khyod kyis bsnyen par
374b5(brgyad stong): bya gus par bya bsnyen bkur bya'o/ / rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar bsgrubs na ring po mi thogs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du chud pa 'am dge slong chos smra ba'i lus la yod pa thos
374b6(brgyad stong): par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu gang las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos pa de la khyod kyis ston par 'du shes bskyed par bya zhing khyod kyis byas pa gzo ba dang byas pa tshor bar bya ste/ gang las
374b7(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos pa 'di ni bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin te/ 'di bdag gis thos pas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par
375a1(brgyad stong): 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyen par 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de bzhin gshegs pa dang ma bral ba
375a2(brgyad stong): rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ / mi lom pa rnams spong bar 'gyur ro// dal ba phun sum tshogs pa spyod pa thob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu phan yon 'di rnams khyod kyis yongs su rtogs la dge
375a3(brgyad stong): slong chos smra ba la ston pa yin par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/ / rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'jig rten gyi zang zing dang ldan pa'i sems kyi rgyud kyis dge slong chos smra ba'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar mi bya'i
375a4(brgyad stong): khyod kyi dge slong chos smra ba la chos don du gnyer ba dang chos la gus par bya bas phyi bzhin 'brang bar bya'o/ / khyod kyis bdud kyi las rnams kyang rtogs par bya ste rigs kyi bu bdud sdig can ni byang
375a5(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg pa dag bsnyen pa dang bsten pa dang spyad par bya ba'i phyir nye bar bsgrub ste/ de dag chos smra ba des zil gyis mnan
375a6(brgyad stong): nas thabs mkhas pas 'grogs shing sten par byed pa dang bsnyen par byed pa yang yod de/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis dge slong chos smra ba de la ma dad pa bskyed par mi bya'o// gzhan du na sems
375a7(brgyad stong): 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/ bdag ni thabs mkhas pa de mi shes kyi 'di ni thabs mkhas pa rab tu shes so 'di ni sems can gdul ba'i tshul gyis sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su
375b1(brgyad stong): / bzung ba'i phyir chos 'di dag la brten cing 'grogs ste bsnyen par byed kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni gang la yang chags pa'am sgrib pa med kyis skad cig de nyid la rigs kyi bu
375b2(brgyad stong): khyod nyid kyis chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i tshul so sor brtag par bya'o/ / rigs kyi bu chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i tshul gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste chos thams cad kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin
375b3(brgyad stong): rnam par byang ba ma yin no/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis spong ba'o// chos thams cad ni sems can med pa srog med pa gso ba med pa/ skyes bu med pa gang zag med
375b4(brgyad stong): pa sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu sgra brnyan lta bu mig yor lta bu ste/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos thams cad kyi yang dag pa'i tshul de ltar rtog cing chos smra ba'i rjes su 'brang na ring por mi thogs par shes rab kyi
375b5(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu gzhan yang khyod kyis bdud kyi las la soms shig/ rigs kyi bu gal te chos smra ba dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
375b6(brgyad stong): don du gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bu la brnyas par byed cing mi sems na de la rigs kyi bu khyod kyis phyir bsngo bar mi bya ste/ gzhan du na chos don du gnyer ba nyid dang chos la gus par byed pa nyid dang yid mi
375b7(brgyad stong): skyobs dge slong chos smra ba'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar bya'o zhes de skad kyang thos so/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus sgra de las rjes su bstan pa 'di blangs nas
376a1(brgyad stong): s har phyogs ga la ba der song ba dang ring por ma phyin par de 'di snyam du sems te bdag gis sgra de la ci srid du 'gro bar bya ba ma dris so snyam du bsams nas de sa phyogs de nyid
376a2(brgyad stong): du ngu zhing tshe ngos 'debs te mya ngan byed la smre zhing 'dug ste/ de 'di snyam du sa phyogs 'di nyid du nyin zhag gcig gi bar du nyin mtshan 'da' bar bya'o// nyin mtshan gnyis sam gsum mam bzhi
376a3(brgyad stong): 'am lnga'am drug gam nyin mtshan bdun yang 'da' bar bya ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par ma gyur gyi bar du lus ngal ba yid la byed pa mi skyed rmugs pa dang gnyid yid la byed pa mi
376a4(brgyad stong): s kyed bza' ba yid la byed pa mi skyed btung ba yid la byed pa mi skyed mtshan mo yid la byed pa mi skyed nyin mo yid la byed pa mi skyed grang ba yid la byed pa mi skyed tsha ba yid la byed pa mi skyed do snyam du bsams
376a5(brgyad stong): so/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu la la zhig bu gcig pa 'chi ba'i dus byas na sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de mya ngan gyis bu gcig pu yid la byed
376a6(brgyad stong): pa nyid ma gtogs par yid la byed pa gzhan gang yang mi 'byung ste/ rab 'byo de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus yang de'i tshe bdag gis nam shes rab kyi pha rol

376b1(brgyad stong): mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs shig bzhugs nas legs so zhes bya ba byin te 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod kyis tshig de skad smra ba legs so legs so/ / ci ltar khyod kyis da ltar yongs/
376b2(brgyad stong): su btsal ba de bzhin du rigs kyi bu sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na shes rab kyi pha rol

376b4(brgyad stong): n yid du song zhig dang rigs kyi bu 'di nas dpag tshad lnga brgya na spos dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i grong khyer rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyis rab rim pa bdun gyis bskor ba 'obs rim pa bdun dang
376b5(brgyad stong): shing hA la phreng ba rim pa bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba/ chur dpag tshad bcu gnyis zheng du dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa 'byor pa rgyas pa bde ba lo legs pa skye bo mang po dang mis gang ba/ bar gyi
376b6(brgyad stong): tshong khang gi phreng ba ri mo sna tshogs su bris pa lta bur blta na sdug pa phigs par gyur pa mnyam zhing mtshungs pa/ skye bo dang khyogs kyi bzhon pa dang rkang gis 'gro ba'i gnas 'dzer dog med par

377a1(brgyad stong): mnga' lab rnams ni 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser las byas pa/ mtho zhing tshad dang ldan pa mda' yab thams cad kyi rtse mo las kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi shing skyes te/

377a6(brgyad stong): rjes su mthun par 'bab pa'i chus yongs su gang zhing / chu ha cang yang mi grang ba ha cang yang mi dro bas gang ba dag yod do// chu de dag nyid la sems can rnams kyi sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin
377a7(brgyad stong): pas grub pa/ rin po che sna bdun rnam par bkra zhing blta na sdug pa'i gru dag yod de/ der sems can dag zhugs nas rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod do// chu de dag thams cad kyang ut+pa la dang ku

377b2(brgyad stong): rigs la de na med pa gang yang med do/ / grong khyer de'i nang na skyed mos tshal lnga brgya yod de thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin rnam par bkra zhing blta na sdug pa sha stag ste/ skyed mos tshal

377b4(brgyad stong): po rnam par bkra zhing blta na sdug pa dag skyes te/ de dag gis chu de dag khebs shing / ut+pal dang ku mu da dang pad+ma dkar po bzang po de dag thams cad kyang chu zheng du shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam ste/
377b5(brgyad stong): dri bzang ba sngon po kha dog sngon po sngon por ston pa/ sngon por snang ba/ ser po kha dog ser po ser por ston pa ser por snang ba/ dmar po kha dog dmar po dmar por ston pa dmar por snang ba
377b6(brgyad stong): dkar po kha dog dkar po dkar por ston pa dkar por snang ba dag yod do/ / rdzing bu de dag thams cad na dang ngur dang / khrung khrung dang / kA raN+Da dang / sA ra sa sgra 'byin pa dag yod do// skyed mos

378a1(brgyad stong): pa rjes su 'gro ba'i thos pa dang sems pa legs par rtogs pa/ yun ring por chos zab mo la mos pa'i sems can de dag nyid kyi sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas grub pa yin/

378a4(brgyad stong): su longs spyad pa dag rtag tu dga' ba zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal dang mya ngan med ces bya ba dang mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya ba dang / me tog sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal dang skyed mos tshal bzhi yod
378a5(brgyad stong): deskyed mos tshal de dag re re na yang 'di lta ste/ rdzing bu bzang po zhes bya ba dang bzang mchog ces bya ba dang / dga' ba zhes bya ba dang dga' mchog ces bya ba dang bde ba zhes bya ba dang bde mchog ces
378a6(brgyad stong): bya ba dang nges pa zhes bya ba dang mi 'bab pa zhes bya ba brgyad brgyad yod de/ de yang rdzing bu de dag gi ngos gcig ni gser gyi rang bzhin/ ngos gnyis pa ni dngul gyi rang bzhin/ ngos gsum pa ni
378a7(brgyad stong): bai DUR+Ya'i rang bzhin/ ngos bzhi pa ni shel gyi rang bzhin/ 'og gi sa gzhi ni kar ke ta na'i rang bzhin la gser gyi bye ma bdal ba ste/ rdzing bu de dag re re la yang them skas them pa rin po
378b1(brgyad stong): che'i rang bzhin sna tshogs pa rnam pa tha dad pas brgyan pa brgyad brgyad yod de/ them skas de dag thams cad kyi bar nas kyang 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi shing ljon pa dag skyes so// rdzing bu de
378b2(brgyad stong): dag thams cad kyi chu ni me tog ut+pa la dang ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po sna tshogs kyis khebs shing ngang ngur dang / khrung zung dang / kA raN+Da dang / sA ra sa rnams skad 'byin to// rdzing

378b6(brgyad stong): de dag thams cad kyang skyed mos tshal lam/ rdzing bu dag na rtag tu dga' zhing 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan nas dbang du gyur te rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod do// yang byang chub sems dpa'
378b7(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de dus de srid du 'khor rnams dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod par byed cing de na dus gsum du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston to/ / sems can
379a1(brgyad stong): gang dag grong khyer spos ldan ma 'khod pa de dag kyang grong khyer gyi dbus kyi bzhi mdor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi khri gser gyi rkang pa dang dngul gyi rkang / pa dang /
379a2(brgyad stong): bai DUR+Ya'i rkang pa dang shel gyi rkang pa btsugs pa/ shing bal bting bstan par tshangs can bting ba steng snying po can du byas pa ka shi ka'i gos bting ba 'phang du rgyang grags phyed yod pa bsham
379a3(brgyad stong): te/ steng gi bar snang la yang gos kyi bla re mu tig gis brgyan pa bres pa la ci 'di legs par gnas sam snyam pa/ legs par gnas pa sna tshogs pa rnam par smin pas lhan cig tu mnyam par rab tu
379a4(brgyad stong): 'dzin par byed cing sa phyogs de khor yug tu yang me tog kha dog sna lnga pa dag mngon par gtor rab tu gtor yang dag par gtor bar byed la ci ltar yang 'di chos kyi bsam pa rnam par dag pa dang / byang chub
379a5(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags chos la gus pas sa phyogs de yang dri dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyis shin tu 'dug par byed do/ / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
379a6(brgyad stong): chos 'phags 'dug nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ rigs kyi bu sems can de dag ni de ltar chos la gus par byed cing chos rnams la brten pa dang dad pa dang ldan pas dad pa dang
379a7(brgyad stong): dad pa skyed pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi drung du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyan to/ / de na gang dag nyan pa'i lha dang mi srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang srog
379b1(brgyad stong): chags stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po tshogs pa de dag las la la ni lung 'bogs/ la la ni kha ton byed/ la la ni yi ger 'dri/ la la ni tshul bzhin yid la byed pa
379b2(brgyad stong): rtogs par byed de sems can de dag thams cad kyang log par mi ltung ba'i chos can te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa yin no// rigs kyi bu khyod byang chub
379b3(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de'i drung du song zhig dang de las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu de ni yun ring po nas khyod kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen
379b4(brgyad stong): yin te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par ston pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa/ yang dag par gzengs bstod pa dang yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed pa yin no//
379b5(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu des kyang sngon de ltar khyod ci ltar tshol ba de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su btsal gyis/ rigs kyi bu khyod nyin mtshan du yid la byed pa rgyun ma bcad par bskyed
379b6(brgyad stong): pas song shig dang ring po mo thogs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus de thos nas dga'
379b7(brgyad stong): mgu yi rangs rab tu mgu zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes par gyur pa 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu mde'u dug can zhig gis phog na yid la byed pa gzhan mi skyed kyi gang bdag zug rngu 'di lnga
380a1(brgyad stong): sgrol zhing bdag sdug bsngal 'di las thar par byed pa zug rngu 'byin pa'i sman pa bdag gis nam rnyed snyam sems pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tung/ y
380a2(brgyad stong): ang de'i tshe gang bdag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de thos par byed cing chos gang thos nas bdag gi dmigs pa yid la byed pa spong bar 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu de bdag gis nam mthong snyam sems
380a3(brgyad stong): pa ma gtogs par chos gang yang yid la mi byed do/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus phyogs de nyid du 'dug pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
380a4(brgyad stong): chen po chos 'phags de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa thos so/ / thos nas kyang chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'i 'du shes bskyed nas/ de ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo du ma mngon du gyur pa 'di lta
380a5(brgyad stong): stechos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid la lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid shes pa las nges
380a6(brgyad stong): par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad tha dad pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad 'gyur ba med par mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos
380a7(brgyad stong): thams cad snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mun pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mi shes pa sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
380b1(brgyad stong): chos thams cad rnam par gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / me tog bkram pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos
380b2(brgyad stong): thams cad bdag gi dngos po mi bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgyu ma rnam par spangs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / me long gi dkyil 'khor snang ba sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
380b3(brgyad stong): sems can thams cad kyi sgra sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdul med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems
380b4(brgyad stong): can thams cad kyi sgra la mkhas pa'i rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgra dang tshig dang yig 'bru sna tshogs mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / khengs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i
380b5(brgyad stong): ting nge 'dzin dang / rang bzhin gyis tha snyad med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
380b6(brgyad stong): dang / ming dang nges pa'i tshig dang tshig dang yig 'bru zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la rnam par blta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad yul dang bral ba zhes bya
380b7(brgyad stong): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting
381a1(brgyad stong): 'dzin dang / gzugs kyi rdul sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal ba thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang
381a2(brgyad stong): phyir mi ldog pa'i mig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi dbyings las nges par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dbugs
381a3(brgyad stong): 'byin pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / seng ge mngon par sgrogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad zil gyis gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdul dang rnam
381a4(brgyad stong): bar bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / pad+ma bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nem nur gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
381a5(brgyad stong): snying po thams cad kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mngon par shes pa dang stobs dang mi 'jigs pa thob
381a6(brgyad stong): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la nges par 'bigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi 'byor pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad
381a7(brgyad stong): cad kyi 'byor pa'i rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad bye brag med par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / lta bar gyur pa'i thibs po thams cad rnam par spong ba zhes bya
381b1(brgyad stong): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mun pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mtshan ma dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chags pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba zhes bya
381b2(brgyad stong): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / le lo thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos zab mo'i 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ri rab 'dra ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi
381b3(brgyad stong): 'phrogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par sel bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'jig rten gsum la mngon par ma chags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
381b4(brgyad stong): 'dzin dang / 'od gzer sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
381b5(brgyad stong): t eting nge 'dzin de dag la gnas pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhal du med grangs med pa dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag la
381b6(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid rab tu ston pa dag mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis legs so zhes bya ba byin nas dbugs dbyung ba mdzad de/ tshig 'di skad ces rigs kyi bu nged
381b7(brgyad stong): kyis kyang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzhin du yongs su btsal te/ yongs su tshol ba na yang gang 'dir khyod kyis thob pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di lta
382a1(brgyad stong): bu nyid dag thob ste/ ting nge 'dzin 'di dag thob nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtogs par khong du chud par gyur te/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos la gnas
382a2(brgyad stong): pabar gyur to/ / nged kyis ting nge 'dzin 'di dag gi ngo bo nyid dang rang bzhin la bltas na/ gang mnyam par bzhag par bya ba 'am/ ldang bar bya ba 'am/ gang byang chub tu spyad par bya ba
382a3(brgyad stong): ram/ gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i chos de gang yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // rigs kyi bu 'di ni shes rab kyi pha
382a4(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa de yin te/ chos gang gis kyang rlom sems sam/ rlom sems med par mi byed pa la gnas nas/ nged kyis 'di 'dra ba'i lus gser gyi kha dog lta bu tho ba ste/ skyes bu chen
382a5(brgyad stong): po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang 'od 'dom gang ba dang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang / sangs rgyas kyi shes rab bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ bla na med pa
382a6(brgyad stong): dang sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin bla na med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rjes su thob ste/ yon tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la re zhig de bzhin
382a7(brgyad stong): gshegs pa dag gis kyang tshad gzung ba'am/ mtha' bstan par mi nus na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dag gis lta ci smos/ rigs kyi bu de lta bas na khyod kyis chos 'di dag nyid la rab tu don/
382b1(brgyad stong): du gnyer ba dang 'dod pas gus pa mchog tu bskyed par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu don du gnyer ba dang 'dod pa la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnyed par dka' ba ma yin no// rigs
382b2(brgyad stong): kyi bu khyod kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen la shin tu gus pa bskyed par bya'o/ / phangs par bya'o// rab tu dang bar bya'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
382b3(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes kyang gsungs so/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa'
382b4(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus 'di skad ces bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang lags zhes gsol to/ / de dag gis de la 'di skad ces rigs kyi bu khyod yun ring po nas byang chub sems
382b5(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas shing yongs su bzung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas
382b6(brgyad stong): pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bslabs so/ / rigs kyi bu de ni khyod kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su 'dzin pa yin te/ byas pa shes pa dang byas pa tshor bas des bsgo ba dang des byas
382b7(brgyad stong): pa bzhin du zung zhig/ rigs kyi bu gal te khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bskal pa gcig gam bskal pa gnyis sam bskal pa gsum mam bskal pa
383a1(brgyad stong): @/ brgya 'am/ bskal pa stong ngam/ bskal pa brgya stong ngam/ de las lhag par yang mgo la thod bzhin du thogs shing bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas te/
383a2(brgyad stong): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg pa ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad phul yang rigs kyi bu khyod kyis rigs kyi bu de'i byas pa de nyid la lan lon pa ma
383a3(brgyad stong): yin no/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu rigs kyi bu de'i mthus khyod kyis 'di lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin rnams rnyed par gyur to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pas thos shing shes
383a4(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob par gyur to zhes bka' stsal to/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dbugs phyung nas mi snang bar gyur to// /
383a5(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu de yang ting nge 'dzin de dag las langs te langs nas kyang 'di snyam du sems so// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud snyam ste/ de de
383a6(brgyad stong): bzhin gshegs pa de dag ma mthong bas rab tu gdung zhing mi dga' bar gyur to/ / yang de 'di snyam du sems te/ 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ni gzung
383a7(brgyad stong): thob pa/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/ sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams la lhag par bya ba byas pa ste/ bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yang dag par yongs su 'dzin pa/ yun ring po nas des
383b1(brgyad stong): bdag gi don byas pa yin gyis/ bdag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi drung du mngon par song ste nye bar phyin nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon// de
383b2(brgyad stong): bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud ces don 'di nyid dri'o snyam mo/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags
383b3(brgyad stong): la dga' ba dang dad pa dang ri mo dang gus par bya ba nye bar bzhag ste/ nye bar bzhag nas 'di snyam du sems so bdag gis ci lta bu'i bkur stir bya bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
383b4(brgyad stong): chos 'phags de'i drung du 'gro bar bya/ bdag ni dbul te gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bdag gis bkur stir bya ba'i gos sam rin po che'am/ gser
383b5(brgyad stong): ram nor bu 'am mu tig gam bai DUR+Ya 'am dung ngam man shel lam byi ru 'am dngul lam me tog gam bdug pa'am dri'am phreng ba'am byug pa'am phye ma 'am chos gos sam/ gdugs sam rgyal mtshan
383b6(brgyad stong): nam/ dril bu 'am ba dan de lta bu yang bdag la ci yang med na/ bdag 'di bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi drung du song na ni bdag gis mi rigs pa byas
383b7(brgyad stong): par 'gyur te/ bdag dga' ba 'am rangs pa yang mi skye'o snyam du bsams so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu de lta bu'i yon tan dag dang bla ma la gus pa yid
384a1(brgyad stong): la byed pa dag dang ldan pas song nas mthar gyis grong khyer gzhan zhig tu phyin par gyur to/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu grong bar gyi
384a2(brgyad stong): srang ga la ba der song ste de'i grong bar gyi dbus su phyin nas de 'di snyam du 'di ltar bdag gi lus btsongs la/ de'i rin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur
384a3(brgyad stong): stir bya'o/ / yun ring po nas bdag gi lus stong zhig cing zad de/ 'gags par btsongs so// 'khor ba dpag tu med pa na 'dod pa'i rgyu dang / 'dod pa'i gzhis yang dang yang sems can
384a4(brgyad stong): dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa dag myong yang 'di lta bu'i chos kyi phyir ram 'di lta bu'i sems can chen po la bkur stir bya ba'i phyir ma yin no snyam du bsams so/ / de nas byang chub sems
384a5(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus grong bar gyi tshong dus kyi dbus su 'dug ste mi su 'dod mi su 'dod mi su nyo bar 'dod ces sgra sgrags shing skad kyis bos so/ / de nas bdud sdig can gyis
384a6(brgyad stong): ' di snyam du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di ni chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag nyid btsongs nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur stir
384a7(brgyad stong): byed cing / ci ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhe
384b1(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas pa yongs su 'dri bar 'gyur te/ des thos pa rgya mtsho rjes su thob par 'gyur/ bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha dag gis mi thub par 'gyur/ yon
384b2(brgyad stong): tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rjes su thob par 'gyur/ der sems can mang po dag gi don byed par 'gyur/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
384b3(brgyad stong): rgyas nas de dang gzhan dag kyang nga'i yul las 'da' bar byed par 'gyur gyis/ bdag gis 'di'i bar chad bya'o snyam du bsams so// de nas bdud sdig can gyis ci nas bram ze dang khyim
384b4(brgyad stong): bdag de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus mi su 'dod mi su 'dod mi su nyo bar 'dod ces zer ba'i sgra ci ltar mi thos par 'gyur ba de ltar yongs su bsgribs so//
384b5(brgyad stong): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu gang gi tshe bdag nyo ba ma rnyed pa de'i tshe/ phyogs gcig tu song nas ngus te mtsha ma phyung nas 'di skad du bdag gi lus btsongs la byang chub
384b6(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti bya snyam na/ lus nyo ba yang bdag gis ma rnyed de/ kye ma bdag ni thob pa ngan pa thob bo zhes smras so// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang
384b7(brgyad stong): bo brgya byin gyis 'di snyam du 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di lta ste chos 'dod pa'i phyir/ bdag gi lus yongs su btang bar lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs
385a1(brgyad stong): pa yin nam ma yin pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu bdag gis sad par bya'o snyam du bsams so/ / de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin bram ze'i
385a2(brgyad stong): khye'u'i cha byad du mngon par sprul nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu ga la ba der song ste 'ongs nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces
385a3(brgyad stong): smras so/ / rigs kyi bu 'di ltar khyod yid mi dga' zhing gdung la mchi ma byung zhing gnas pa ci nyes de la rtag tu dus 'di skad ces smras so// bram ze'i khye'u nga'i lus btsong bar 'dod na lus/
385a4(brgyad stong): 'di nyo ba yang ma rnyed do// brgya byin bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugs can gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod ci'i phyir bdag nyid 'tshong bar 'dod/ rtag tu ngus de la smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u nga ni chos
385a5(brgyad stong): 'dod pa'i phyir bdag nyid btsongs te/ chos la mchod par bya bar 'dod cing 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la yang bkur sti bya bar 'dod na/ lus nyo ba de
385a6(brgyad stong): ngas ma rnyed nas de la nga 'di snyam du sems so/ / kye ma nga ni bsod nams chung bas 'di ltar lus btsongs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa bya ba dang / 'phags pa byang chub sems
385a7(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la yang bkur sti bya snyam na/ bdag gi lus nyo ba yang ma rnyed do snyam mo// de nas bram ze'i khye'u des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag
385b1(brgyad stong): tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so/ / rigs kyi bu nga la mis ni bya ba med kyi 'on kyang nga mchod sbyin zhig byed de/ der mi'i snying dang khrag dang rus pa dang / rkang dag ngal dgos na de'i rin gyis nyor byin cig/
385b2(brgyad stong): ces byas pa dang / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du sems te/ gang bdag gis bram ze'i khye'u 'di bdag gi snying dang khrag dang rus pa dang rkang nyo ba rnyed pa
385b3(brgyad stong): 'di ni bdag gis rnyed pa'i mchog legs par rnyed do/ / bdag gi lus ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro snyam/
385b4(brgyad stong): de sems dga' ba dang sems bde ba dang sems rab tu dga' bar gyur nas/ bram ze'i khye'u de la 'di skad ces smras so// bram ze'i khye'u nga'i lus 'di las khyed gang dang gang 'dod pa sbyin no//
385b5(brgyad stong): des de la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod rin du ci 'dod pa sbyin no zhes byas pa dang / des de la 'di skad ces smras so// bram ze'i khye'u khyod kyis gang yongs su btang ba de nga la byin
385b6(brgyad stong): cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu mtshon rnon po thogs nas lag pa g.yas pa phug ste khrag gzags so// brla g.yas pa sha med par gtogs nas rus pa
385b7(brgyad stong): gcog tu rtsig pa'i drung du song ngo / / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo zhig khang pa'i yang thog na 'dug pa des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu khrag mang po 'dzag pa dang / brla
386a1(brgyad stong): sha med par gtogs nas rus pa gcog tu rtsig pa'i drung du song ba mthong nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ci'i phyir bdag nyid la bdag nyid 'di lta bu'i na tsha byed pa

398a1(brgyad stong): 'jig rten ni gang du yang ma bzhud do/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sku rgyu med pa yang ma yin te sngon gyi spyad pas yongs su grub pa yin pas rgyu la rag las pa rkyen la rag

398a7(brgyad stong): mi 'gro'o/ / de bzhin du rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku yongs su 'grub pa yang rgyu la rag las pa/ rkyen la rag las pa dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sbyor ba du mas yongs su grub pa yin
398b1(brgyad stong): te/ rgyu gcig gis ma yin rkyen gcig gis ma yin dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi sku rab tu dbye ba ma yin te/ rgyu med pa yang ma yin no// rgyu dang rkyen mang po tshogs pa las byung ba yin te/
398b2(brgyad stong): de ni gang nas kyang ma byon to// rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa med kyang gang du yang mi bzhud de rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag byon pa dang bzhud pa de ltar blta'o// rigs kyi bu chos thams
398b3(brgyad stong): cad kyi chos nyid kyang khyod kyis 'di bzhin du khong du chud par gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang tshun chad de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dang chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med par shes
398b4(brgyad stong): pa de tshun chad khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur zhing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa la nges par spyod par 'gyur ro/ / yang de bzhin gshe

399a1(brgyad stong): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na rtswa dang shing gel ba dang sman dang nags tshal ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos

404b1(brgyad stong): mu med pa nyid do/ / ri rab sna tsheg pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sna tshog pa nyid do// nam mkha' rtog pa med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtog pa med pa nyid do// gzug mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha
404b2(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do/ / de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// sa'i khams mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha
404b3(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do/ / de bzhin du chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// nam mkha'i khams mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu
404b4(brgyad stong): phyin pa mu med pa nyid do/ / rnam par shes pa'i khams mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// rdo rje lta bu'i chos mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do// chos thams cad ma
404b5(brgyad stong): 'dres pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma 'dres pa nyid do/ / chos thams cad dmigs su med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa nyid do// chos thams cad rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid pas
404b6(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid do/ / chos thams cad byed pa med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byed pa med pa nyid do// chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid pas shes rab
404b7(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid du rig par bya'o zhes bya ba yin no/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu de ltar 'dug bzhin du de'i tshe chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya
405a1(brgyad stong): ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po skyes par gyur to/ / chos thams cad dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad g.yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos
405a2(brgyad stong): thams cad rlom sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad khengs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad ro gcig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
405a3(brgyad stong): chos thams cad mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad skye ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang
405a4(brgyad stong): nam mkha' mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgya mtsho mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ri rab sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' rtog pa med pa
405a5(brgyad stong): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzugs mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting
405a6(brgyad stong): nge 'dzin dang / sa'i khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin du chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam
405a7(brgyad stong): mkha'i khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams
405b1(brgyad stong): cad ma 'dres pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad dmigs su med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
405b2(brgyad stong): dang chos thams cad byed pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
405b3(brgyad stong): po rtag tu ngus de lta bu la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo brgya stong phrag drug cu rab tu thob par gyur to/ / 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las/ chos 'phag
405b4(brgyad stong): kyi le'u zhes bya ste sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o/ / / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo brgya stong phrag drug cu thob ma thag tu shar
405b5(brgyad stong): p hyogs dang lho phyogs dang nub phyogs dang byang phyogs dang mtshams dang 'og dang steng gi phyogs dang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye
405b6(brgyad stong): ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun du byas te tshul
405b7(brgyad stong): 'di lta bu nyid dang ming 'di nyid dang yi ge 'di nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'chad pa mthong ngo / / 'di lta ste dper na da ltar nga stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
406a1(brgyad stong): 'di na chos ston pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun du byas te/ tshul 'di nyid dang ming 'di nyid dang yi ge 'di nyid
406a2(brgyad stong): kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'chad pa bzhin no/ / de mang du thos pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang thos pa rgya mtsho dang ldan par 'gyur te/ gar skyes pa thams cad du yang nam yang
406a3(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas dang bral bar ma gyur to/ / skye ba thams cad du yang gang dang gang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon sum du 'gyur ba de dang de dag tu skyes te/ tha na rmi lam na yang sangs
406a4(brgyad stong): rgyas bcom ldan 'das ngag dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro dos mi khom pa thams cad ni spangs dal ba phun sum tshogs pa ni bsgrubs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la
406a5(brgyad stong): bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo rnam grangs 'dis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sgrub pa yin par
406a6(brgyad stong): rig par bya'o/ / kun dga' bo de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par 'dod pa dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyad par
406a7(brgyad stong): bya'o/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mnyan par bya gzung bar bya bcang bar bya bklag par bya kun chub par bya rab tu gdon par bya/ bstan par bya nye bar bstan par bya lung 'bogs par bya
406b1(brgyad stong): kha ton du bya bri bar bya/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis glegs bam chen po la yi ge gsal zhing rab tu gsal ba legs par bris te/ me tog dang bdug pa dang dri dang phreng ba dang
406b2(brgyad stong): byug pa dang phye ma dang rol mo dang na bza' dang / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang dril bu dang ba dan dang khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dang mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis bkur stir bya bla mar bya rjed par
406b3(brgyad stong): bya mchod par bya ri mor bya bsnyen bkur bya ste/ kun dga' bo 'di ni nga'i rjes su bstan pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
406b4(brgyad stong): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / kun dga' bo 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyi ston pa yin nam/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi
406b5(brgyad stong): ston pa lags so/ / bde bar gshegs pa bdag gi ston pa lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
406b6(brgyad stong): kun dga' bo khyod kyi ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa la kun dga' bo khyod kyis lus kyi las byams pa yid du 'ong ba dang / ngag gi las byams pa yid du 'ong ba dang / yid kyi las byams pa yid du
406b7(brgyad stong): 'ong bas rim gror byas te de lta bas na kun dga' bo/ / da ltar nga bzhugs te 'tshe zhing gzhes pa'i sku 'di la ci ltar khyod kyis dga' ba dang dang ba dang ri mor byas pa kun dga' bo de ltar nga 'das nas shes
407a1(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la yang byos shig/ kun dga' bo ci nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nub par mi 'gyur zhing ci nas khyod skyes bu tha mar mi 'gyur bar kun
407a2(brgyad stong): dga' bo khyod la lan gnyis lan gsum du yongs su gtad do/ / rjes su yongs su gtad do// kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'jig rten na ci srid du rab tu spyod pa de sring
407a3(brgyad stong): du de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs par rig par bya'o/ / kun dga' bo de srid du de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston par rig par bya'o// kun dga' bo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
407a4(brgyad stong): pa 'di nyan pa dang 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang / ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton byed pa dang / yi ger
407a5(brgyad stong): 'dri ba dang me tog dang / bdug pa dang dri dang / phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / dril bu dang / ba dan dag dang //
407a6(brgyad stong): khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis bkur stir byed bla mar byed/ rjed par byed mchod par byed/ ri mor byed bsnyen bkur byed pa'i sems can de
407a7(brgyad stong): dag ni/ sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang / dge 'dun la rim gro byed pa dang ma bral bar rig par bya'o// kun dga' bo sems can de dag ni/ de
407b1(brgyad stong): bzhin gshegs pa'i drung na spyod par rig par bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das dgyes shing de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs
407b2(brgyad stong): pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas
407b3(brgyad stong): pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las/ yongs su gtad pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/
407b4(brgyad stong): sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// // bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po shAkya sa na
407b5(brgyad stong): dang dz+nyA na sid+d+hi dang zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban de d+harma tA shI la la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab/ slad kyis dbang phyug dam pa'i mnga' bdag bod kyi dpal lha btsan po bkra shis lha sde
407b6(brgyad stong): btsan gyi bkas/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po su b+hI Shi ta dang / smra ba sgyur gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos 'grel pa dang mthun par bsgyur/ slad kyis rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta chen po dI pa
407b7(brgyad stong): kar shrI dz+nyA na dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos yul dbus kyi 'grel pa la gtugs nas bcos shing zhus te gtan la phab yang slad kyis kyi smad gnye zang na mo cher
408a1(brgyad stong): @##/ paN+Di ta chen po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang / lo tsA ba 'brom rgyal ba'i 'byung gnas gnyis kyis brgyad stong pa bshad pa'i dus su che long zhig gtan la phab/ phyis
408a2(brgyad stong): rasgreng gi gtsug lag khang du lo ts+tsha ba 'brom rgyal ba'i 'byung gnas kyis rgya gar gyi mdo gsum la gtugs nas lan gnyis gtan la phab/ slad kyis yang lo tsA ba de nyid kyis bshad
408a3(brgyad stong): pa mdzad cing phran tshegs kyang gtan la phab/ dus phyis lo ts+tsha ba chen po shAkya'i dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis kha che'i dpe dang yul dbus kyi dpe du ma bsags nas gtan la phab/
408a4(brgyad stong): slar yang snyigs dus kyi thams cad mkhyen pa chen po/ zha lu lo tsa ba dpal rin chen chos skyong bzang po'i zhal snga nas kyis rgya bod kyi dpe du ma dang bstun nas shin tu rnam
408a5(brgyad stong): par dag par mdzad pa'i ma phyi dang / rgya dpe gnyis dang / bod dpe bar ma rnams la gtugs te/ shAkya'i dge slong mnga' ris rab 'byams pa dpal 'byor rgyal mtshan dang //
408a6(brgyad stong): skad gnyis smra ba'i btsun pa kun dga' chos bzang gnyis kyis/ rnam 'gyur lcags pho stag lo'i mchu'i zla ba'i tsan+d+ra tshes kyi dkyil 'khor nya yongs su gang ba'i nyin/ yar stong
